name: Dora
review: This card is great just  I will be keeping got an increase .. love the card !! Had the card for some time .. Also , customer service is great !!! Love Freddys..

name: bcpatterson1127
review: US Bank's fraud prevention is a joke.  They have literally shut my card down 5 times this year and NEVER contacted me.  So, here I am trying to buy something and my card gets declined.  That is so embarrassing!  I have talked to every supervisor and every department and it still doesn't work.  They shut my card down for a gas purchase or store purchase in the town where I live.  The last one was because I made five .99 cent purchases from Google in a row!!!  Why can't they just let me set a limit like my other banks???  Hey if there's a purchase of $500 or more in one day we'll shut it down.  Great!  No, they don't do that.  I will be closing my account and moving things over to my other bank.  I have avoided it until now as I have many auto-drafts which will take some time to set up in the new account, but I don't care anymore.  I am so sick of my card being shut off with NO warning.  My husband lives and uses his card in an entirely different state, 1700 miles away and his card never gets shut off.  If I could give them zero stars I would.

name: amrita_panda
review: I would give 0 or negative stars if there was an option. Extremely unprofessional and ill-informed customer service reps. Each time you call they provide a different response as if rules change by the day at the bank. I called on Sep 3 to check on my pay-off statement as they had overcharged me on my PMI. The rep said they will generate a new pay-off factoring in my Aug payment which I made on Sep 1 and it will be generated in 24 hours and will be faxed to my new mortgage provider and emailed to me as well. I called up on Sep 4 to follow up as I hadn't received any email statement. The rep that day said it was a misinformation and they take 72 hours to generate the payoff statement and not 24 hours. I called up on Sep 7 and asked for my statement over email while I was on the call, the rep that day emailed me the statement and when I checked it was the same amount as earlier and they added an extra $20 for the statement FAX charges. When I asked. the rep said the Aug PMI payment isn't factored in until mid-September so the amounts are same. If this is the case why didn't the 1st rep I spoke with on 3 Sep tell me that? I wouldn't have asked for the statement to be faxed again in that case and wouldn't have to pay extra charges for the same statement. Glad I am over with them. Not sure how much I need to follow up to refund my overcharged PMI payments. They need to have a log of what interactions were done by which rep with each customer else there is simply no accountability and each rep provides their own information per convenience and customer is at a loss.

name: John Chambers
review: We paid off this loan in Aug. 2021 . While the processing was exemplary, we felt victimized by their mortgage unit. We needed to make some improvements and repairs, had an existing mortgage with them. We were sold a HELOC with assurances it could be rolled over into the mortgage at the low market rate. However, US Bank insisted as treating it as a cash out, even though no money ever left debts owed to them. We had to refi at a higher rate, with all the associated costs. We are now done with them forever.

name: aaronsmith123
review: We had a lease with US Bank that we bought out.  It took them almost a month to send the paperwork to us and now we owe a bunch of fees for the title transfer.  On top of this they pulled out an extra payment from our checking account that we have yet to be refunded for.  I keep calling them to get the money back and I just get the run-around saying that it's still in process.  I'm now in the process of moving ALL of our money out of US Bank.  I'm done.

name: Maria
review: I have paid my account in full on August 5th. And Today is September 1st. and it still shows my balance of 3,900.  Since I made the effort to pay my account in full.I sure expect U.S. bank to report it to the Bureaus as soon as possible.Please do something about it. Thank you.

name: Ezra
review: Great monthly use card - my favorite right now! The app is very easy to use and if you have a credit card with US Bank, you can open a gold checking account with no monthly fees.

name: Jon
review: I’ve had ten home loans and my US Bank loan has been the very best.no points, a great rate, and easy to use monthly statements.This loan also tracks my home value using a pretty accurate formula.

name: itsdarebear14
review: This is the worst bank I've ever dealt with. They deny money to their customers and do everything they can to keep you from accessing your cash. They employees on the phone can't seem to assist their customers properly. I've been denied money to my face with all necessary documents because I didn't have "an appt " when no one was even in the bank customer wise. WARNING. GO TO A DIFFERENT BANK.

name: Ashley
review: Very good I like it a lot thank you. I like using it so much very good should use too. Very easy and fast to use.

name: Daisy Lynn
review: I have been a customer of US Bank for about 15 years. Business acct, personal acct, loans, credit cards had it all. But lately they just don't care. From their branches to their fraud department to their customer service department. They give out your information to companies whenever they want. They have allowed a credit card I closed due to fraud to still be used, and instead of adress the problem they blamed me. So disappointed with this company. I use to tell people how great they were and now I'm seeing what they have seen. If you can stay away from them do so. GO TO ANOTHER BANK. Not happy at all.

name: Michael
review: Great bank! Started with 300 limit, paid on time 1 year, earned a jump to 4,400k and now on 3 year, 10k Wow! I worked and they worked with me to improve my life! Good partnership US ?? My FICO is now 725!

name: maureenbrandy
review: I have been working on closing my fathers estate and dealing with this supposed "bank" has been the worst experience I've ever had with a banking institution.  They have requested multiple copies of the death certificate and probate letters, do not share information across departments,  say that anything the bank manager scans to their cloud is not available to any other portion of the bank and  with all these mishaps may cause a delay in the closing of the house.  It's like they don't even want the mortgage or helo to be paid off.  Be very wary of ever using this bank.

name: Donald Walker
review: I made an online purchase thinking my CC company had my back. Not only was the site (venboutique.com) a SCAM but US Bank would NOT cover my loss of $100. US Bank told me to take it up with the merchant that doesn't exist and please do not call them again on this issue as there is nothing they will do. Really? lol (sometimes you have to laugh instead of cry...)

It is a good card if you don’t have any outstanding judgements against you. They froze my account and took all my money for paying what I owed. Goodbye 700$ I had no notifications beforehand. That was messed up.

name: Dj Brown
review: While I have only 5 days experience with your company I would say you seem very nice however you may want to reconsider doing business with Lithia Motor group operating under your the name Southwest Kia of Austin. They are practicing consumer auto fraud and using your bank to finance those deals. I fell victim unfortunately on 7/28/21

name: njluckett212
review: Online access is terrible. For the third time in 3 months they have dectivated my online account and no one can tell me why. I spend hours on the phone with them to correct this. I am a great customer and pay my balance off every month. Yet the customer service people are rude and no help at all. I never have this problem Chase or Capital One. Terrible experiences

name: jack
review: They were very professional and helpful in getting me the best rate for my loan...

name: Pointer Junk
review: I have no idea if this bank wants small businesses customers or not. They have a $500 a day or $1000 a week limit on mobile deposits for new business customers. That's ridiculously low, incredibly restrictive and just plain subpar compared to all the other banks in the country. I did not know this until after I wasted 2 hours of my day opening accounts with a business banker who was too busy answering personal calls on his mobile phone to explain any of this to me. Now three days later, I'm planning to close my accounts because I don't want to have to drive to a bank branch to deposit checks in 2021. Absurd. Sucks that I have to wait an entire week to get the checks I deposited out due to the 5 business day hold required on first deposits.

name: Robert
review: Easy to monitor online, and a convenient phone number that gets you to a real person quickly.  Tied directly to checking account so it can be paid in full quickly.

name: Steven
review: Thanks for the opportunity to get the loan. It was fast and easy and gave me the best price to continue to grow my financial standing

name: snow6960
review: Our nonprofit went with US Bank after our community bank moved. Everything was fine for the first few months but then was closed without notice or explanation. It took months, a lot of phone calls, meetings with branch managers and to find out we were closed because they flagged us as money launders. Considering that's happened during Covid when everything was shut down and we had very little money coming in or going out this was ridiculous. Trying to clear up this concern was also ridiculous. Everyone I spoke to claimed ignorance. For months we jumped through their bureaucratic hoops to clear up the concern. Finally, we just left and went to another bank. Horrible service. I would not recommend US Bank.

name: Jonathan
review: Far too slow in processing payments, even when done online.  Other banks I deal with credit immediately.  Quick to report a charge, but very slow to report balances after payments, even when you pay right after a purchase is processed, far before the due date.  Frustrating when we live in a digital world.

name: malletwiz
review: Worst bank ever!!! I informed them that my car payment would overdraft my account. They paid the overdraft and charged a fee. Which is fine but then they waited 3 days and decided to return the item. I get direct deposit to this account. I didnt care about the fees. I agreed to them. What is the point of having overdraft protection if you can never use it?! Of course they left the overdraft fee on my account while returning the item!! I cant wait to change back to bank of america because as annoying as they can be it was a much better experience with them. US bank is trash!!! These people need to be shut down. They got a sued a few years back and had to pay their customers for their screw ups. Sounds to me like they need to have action taken against them again. If I have overdraft protection I should be able to use it. If you re just going to return the item theres no point in having overdraft protection. This bank is dishonest!

name: Elle
review:
In my experience just being signed up for overdraft protection doesn't guarantee the bank will pay it.  They only allow you go so far into a negative balance and that amount is different for everyone, usually based on off how much is deposited regularly. Also you will be charged an overdraft fee regardless if the bank pays it or not. 
You can call to see if they'll waive the fee though after the fact. If they don't you may have a better chance going into your local branch and asking. A couple years ago i was struggling to get by and i had taken all the coins i could find to branch to avoid getting an overdraft fee. At that point i had already had quite a few throughout that year and i just was over it. The coins ended up not being enough and i was going to get 3 fees that day alone. I figured I'd ask the branch manager if they could help just so i wouldn't get the new fees that day. They ended up crediting 6 overdraft fees from previous months so not only did i avoid the 3 fees that wouldve been charged, i ended up with a decent credit back. 
Luckily I've been able to stay ahead even with the pandemic but I'd like to think banks will help with waiving a fee... certainly doesnt hurt to ask.

name: michelle_lacy
review: If I could give US bank -1 stars I would.   I was a US Bank customer for 30 years.  For the first time in my entire life I was a victim of an employment scam that cost me over $2000 that impacted my bank accounts.  Instead of working with me on a repayment plan (yes, I was willing to repay the bank because it was my fault for falling for the scam); US Bank decided to close all my accounts.  Their reason is, if I could fall for a scam once, it could happen again and they do not want that risk.  After 30 years, and being a victim, this is their response.   I just want others to know, that US Bank will not have your back if you are a victim regardless of the impact to you and your family especially during these times.  They closed my accounts, and no regrets, I have joined another organization that will treat their customers with the respect that they deserve.

name: Chris Liu
review: The REI-specific and general card benefits are fine, and are why I own this card. That said, the technology of US Bank is not great. For example, when contacting the back-of-card customer service number, I have to travel through two phone trees and enter my card number TWICE in order to reach a human. That said, if you want a card with REI benefits, this is your only choice. Just know what to expect.

name: Laura Lauzen-Collins
review: If I could give usbank 0 stars I would. In my 48 years of life on this earth,  I have never dealt with such a dysfunctional company. I have spent many hours on hold, and have been transferred dozens of times of the last several years of dealing with them. It has been more than two years and tens of thousands of dollars, and my issue is still not resolved. I am constantly promised calls back and never receive any. It has been the worst experience I have ever had with any company. Do NOT use this bank.

name: Shelley Carey
review: I have both business and personal credit cards with this bank.  I've called seven times trying to get online access to my personal credit card, which US Bank has tied to my business account.  I've asked for the issue to be elevated to a manager and was told there's no one I can elevate the issue to.  Ridiculous!

name: kevin_fitzgerald_vaughn
review: Used this card with my girlfriend for all groceries for 3 years. Forgot to change our address in the app and they closed our account without any warning. Took the rewards and said we can still send in a written letter to reopen the account. They said it was "security" issue to notify us of the bad address over the phone, after they had just asked us for our socials. Never missed a payment, never kept a balance, and my girlfriend has her car lease through US bank also. Never had an experience with a company like this one.

name: lisaloos_looselectric
review: If you make a cash payment on your credit card, you DO NOT have immediate access to that payment/ available credit for 24 hours …. Totally ridiculous that it takes  24 hours to process a cash payment…. but a purchase/ charge is instantaneous.  When I make a cash payment to  our Chase VISA , access to that payment / available  credit  IS instantaneous .  USBank, you really disappoint, are not customer friendly and  need to step up your game

name: Kathy Ott
review: First issue with US Bank and no assistance with a vendor charging me in error. Ran me in circles. Terrible service!!! Do not recommend their credit card or their app. Cancelled my card!!! Had to put a star to rate but wanted to give them zero!!

name: daniel
review: horrible business. they purchased state farm visa and refuse my payment. my bank manager tried to fix and my state farm agent tried. I'm currently disputing. I expect I will have to get the Attorney General state of Pa involved next

name: Michael
review: Highly underrated travel rewards card. Getting 3 points per dollar (worth 4.5 when used for travel) on all travel and mobile wallet expenses is hard to beat! It’s my go to for travel and Apple Pay.

name: jrep196451
review: I don't recommend, bad customer service. I call for two days one time I wait three hours and doesn't answer my call another day two hours and half doesn't answer

name: toodlebug27
review: Very confusing and complicated rewards program and very unhelpful customer service. Bank of America is MUCH better. Don’t bother with this card.

name: Ken
review: Run far run fast I spoke with 4 different people regarding closing my credit card account that had a zero balance four different people four different sets of lies none of the lies corresponded with the letter that I received in the mail run from this Bank they're crooks. Good thing I recorded my calls with these people, I will be turning it all over to the attorney general of Wisconsin.

name: Steven
review: US Bank has been my bank for nearly 6 years and they have always helped me in times of need. I especially love how I can pay my loans on their amazing app!

name: Sylvester
review: Excellent Credit Builder Secured Credit Card. Allow you to put $200 to $5000 to set your credit limit. Excellent. Offers rewards and cash back. Apply today!

name: Eletta
review: I have enjoyed the use of my US Bank American Express Credit Card.  Using the Card responsibly has been so helpful, as it relates to being able to maintain family needs during the months of Covid19 shutdown. The key is making sure to pay Card off in a timely manner.

name: Arde Shams
review: Since I had a mortgage account with them, they set up a premium account for me. I did a refinance my property with another company after a couple years and then without notifying me , US bank started to charge me monthly fee for nothing. Very be careful with them, since they are trying to steal your money.

name: Robin
review: US BANK has by far, exceeded my expectations. I like that purchased items aren't in pending excessively long and that payments go through very quickly. They make it much easier than other cards to pay off the balance before the due date before interest is applied.

name: Vevelyn
review: It works fine. This card does give reward points that you can cash in for a Gift Visa Card. I like to be paperless and on automatic pay.

name: STEVEN
review: Easy loan to pay with the mobile app which is quite good. I have had no problems with this bank except they sent a credit card promotion and it was nothing special

name: Wendy
review: I wouldn't apply for credit online, definitely call them to apply. Better credit limit, excellent BT rate of 0% for 20 months. Can't beat it!

name: sadjmi01
review: U.S. Bank aka Thievery Corporation: The bank recently acquired State Farm Bank. I had a small account that I opened a few years ago. Recently, I received a quarterly statement and a staggering $27 of the $100, that for years sat at State Farm earning interest, was deducted as fees. Had I not caught it in less than one year they would have stolen all of it. Now That's Banking at It's Worst. U.S. Bank Stinks. Small savers stay away or risking having all your money stolen.

name: Martin
review: A 0% introduction rate on purchases and generous rewards make this card an easy choice. 4 points per $ spent at Restaurant, and 2 points on gas and groceries.

name: George
review: Paid off since 2019 and don’t need to use it I have others with lower int rates.so not needing to make nourish any more interest on purchases by using this card

name: Kathy
review: US Bank was one of the few banks who would offer me a credit card after my BK. It was 4 years afterwards but they approved me with a 5000 credit line. Nice! 10+ years after BK, Chase still won't approve me...and this is my bank! If it wasn't such a pain to change auto pay on loans and bills I would switch banks to US Bank.

name: marr lars
review: Mom went into nursing home and I provided POA to main office in St. Paul MN. They received the POA as confirmed by USPS tracking information on May 24. No one has been able to track down the POA or willing to accept the POA via email or fax.  I called daily for a week, spoke to a different person each time, and no one ever called me back.  However, the last time I called, I was given a direct phone number for someone who does NOT take phone calls. It has been a nightmare trying to work with this bank so I can have access to her accounts for her benefit.

name: jaffe_e
review: If you dont mind U. S. Bank stealing money out your account, then this is the bank for you. They cover it up by putting fake agents on the phone when you call their 800 number.

name: Jamie Hays
review: Have banked with them for years but definitely going to switch banks. One thing you don’t want in a bank is GREEDINESS. And that’s exactly what this bank is. Not only has their ATM miscounted and eaten my money not once, but twice, but they refuse to give it back the second time. A million dollar bank refuses to give me $20 back that was an error on THEIR end. It’s only $20, but it’s the principle. And forget customer service, was on the phone for hours just to be transferred back and forth the entire time because everyone is clueless and has no idea how to solve an issue. So unprofessional and definitely don’t recommend banking here

name: william_holthaus
review: We were robbed by an imposter posing as my wife and I was stunned at how easily they were able to withdraw money from our US Bank checking account. The fraudster broke into my wife's locked car (smashed the window), stole her driver's  license and US Bank checkbook. My wife had a checking account with very little money in it, and they took the checkbook for this account. We also had another joint checking account with US Bank, but the fraudster did not have the checkbook (or account number) for that joint account. The next day, the fraudster drove to a US Bank location and provided my wife's driver's license to the teller. Astoundingly, US Bank provided the fraudster with the account number for our joint checking account (not the account for which they had stolen the checkbook) and the fraudster withdrew $5,000 from our joint account. Just an hour later, the fraudster drove to another US Bank location nearby and repeated this, taking another $5,000 (for a total of $10,000). There were no red flags issued and no security questions asked. The fraudster tried this again at a third US Bank location, but this time the teller noticed the fraudster's wig and called the police. The fraudster drove off immediately. When we tried to investigate, US Bank told us they do not have security cameras on the drive through lanes at these locations (only the ATMs) and they had no video footage of the fraudster. US Bank ultimately reimbursed us after 5 weeks (kind of a long wait). I was shocked, however, that US Bank's security at drive through lanes is so lax. Apparently, the fraudster needed only my wife's driver's license to unlock our bank account. And what kind of financial institution has no security cameras on the drive through lanes in 2020?

name: Dax
review: This is the AAA credit card, The website is fine, nothing special but it works. The card's benefits and interest rates are quite ok. The only issue is the lack of an app, what bank doesnt offer an app.

name: nicoles_126
review: Poor customer service. No one ever has a clue what’s going on. They have applied someone else’s insurance to my account two years in a row and it takes months to correct.

name: Ken
review: Boy isn't that the truth they're clueless

name: betsy_mccloskey
review: Don't send me an "ALERT!" via text that someone has asked for a verification code to my account, ask me to call if it wasn't me and then NEVER answer the phone. I gave up after being  on hold for 15 minutes. Becoming less happy with my business card every day.

name: zoecczoe123
review: Very bad!!! I recommend considering any other bank!! Extremely horrible!!! I have been using it for 8 years. Now i switch to other bank. They are getting worse and worse now!!!

name: Nicole
review: Good card to rebuild your credit. Easy use as it is connected to your bank account. Us bank also sends ratings to credit bureaus right away.

name: Alma
review: I love this card it’s improving my credit already and I haven’t even have it a long time I totally recommend people to get it especially if your credit is poor like mine was

name: volunteers
review: CUSTOMER BEWAREUS Bank credit cards are "bar-none" among the worst credit cards. I had some financial difficulties due to loosing my job, and I was able to consolidate most of my credit cards with the exception of US Bank. US Bank sent my credit card balance as a write-off (even tough I was in the process of consolidating my outstanding balances). After two years, I was able to pay the full amount of the money owed to this credit card, but my credit still shows a "Writeoff" on every single month that the amount was outstanding. It is worth mentioning that I had come to an agreement to pay monthly balances (which I did without missing my payments), but my credit report showed every single month that the amount was outstanding as a writeoff. Please avoid getting a credit card with U.S. Bank.

name: Tim Andes
review: Terrible service...wasted 3 months of my life and ended with no loan or anything! They caused my credit number to plummet as they kept checking my credit! Terrible company that never emailed back or answered calls at the end!

name: K Kristina
review: They didn’t want to work my Acct. things out with me, I contacted their Bank and customer service several times But to no Avail, So I closed my account Because of poor customer service and bank!

name: Douglas
review: A very good bank to do business with!Friendly, knowledgeable staff that goes out of their way to help with your needs!!24/7 1-800 number always ready to help, and you actually talk to a real person too!!

name: mbaldwindive
review: Took out a boat loan 10 years ago-never missed a payment. went to upgrade and paid off loan. Then it starts... Needed payoff letter and was told it would be 7-10 days. after day 15 called back and they apologized and said it was in the mail and would receive in 1-2 days. waited 5 days and was told it only cleared two days ago... (so three weeks to process a pay=off) and you guessed it-I would receive letter in 1-2 days. Asked speak with a supervisor who apologized and said there was coaching to be done (don't care) and he would personally get letter and mail and fax it to me. /What's the fax number? And I would receive it in? YES, 1-2 days. here we are on day five after the 1-2 days-no letter no fax, no response to my emails to the supervisor. Called to make complaint against supervisor and asked for his boss and was told (by one of his workers) that they would take the complaint (against their boss) and forward it on...

name: Bobby
review: Car was very expensive but I truly love this car everything u could ask for just a high monthly payment. And a very expensive car to keep up repairs.

name: Terry E Lowell
review: I have always used US Bank. Knowledgeable, friendly helps make every transaction great. The convenient locations and good savings programs help also.

name: Cleo
review: Since they took over State farm they have been reporting my balance incorrectly. I am ready to leave this bank and hope they do better. I was a customer for over 20 years with State Farm and US Bank is a disappointment, to say the least

name: Ana
review: Great starter card. My score went up 39 points just by opening this card. I love the customer service and ease of paying it on the same app as my checking and savings account

name: ray
review: Great Bank and Service.  Always professional   Have been banking with US Bank for 20 years. Family members have and are using US Bank services also.

name: rkscsmith
review: This is a terrible rewards program.  You cannot book Southwest online so they charge you 39 to book through the travel center.   Half the time my seat selections do not take and I have to go back to the airline to get seats.   This morning the price changed during the booking.   It went up 100.   When I went back to the airline website there had been no change in price.

name: Jeffery Cole
review: Our experience with US Bank auto leasing has been terrible! We lived in IL where taxes for our leased vehicle are calculated into our monthly lease payment and paid in advance. We moved to FL and after acquiring registration at the DMV, US Bank informed us they would add $25/month to our monthly bill now for taxes in FL! Now we are at the end of lease and tried to sell our vehicle to Carvana and received the following email from Carvana. Apparently they won't do business with US Bank! Save yourself a headache and tell your car salesman that you will not let them set up your lease through US Bank!"Thank you for taking the time to submit your vehicle for a value with Carvana. At this time, we are not able to move forward with purchasing your leased vehicle as Carvana's policy does not align with US Bank policies, and this prevents us from being able to purchase leased vehicles from this provider.We do apologize for any inconveniences at this time and hope that you'll consider Carvana in the future for any vehicle purchases and/or sales.Please do not reply to this message. Replies to this message are routed to an unmonitored mailbox. If you have questions go to http://www.carvana.com. You may also call us at 888.819.0996."Regards,NaeishaSell to Carvana Team1930 W Rio Salado Pkwy /// Tempe, AZ 85281

name: Courtney Lane
review: Customer Service is horrible! I paid the card off through my checking account then they blocked my card until I verified my checking account with a notary.  Totally a mistake signing up for this one.

name: SHERRI Pear
review: Unbelievable.  U.S. Bank sent me a pre approval for a personal line of credit for existing Customers.  I applied, then was told that my debt to income ratio was too high (even though I have over $4,000.00 reserve at the end of each month after paying all my bills) so the Branch Manager knowing my excellent history with their bank attempted to get me approved but was unable.  Then, a few days later I get yet another pre approval for a business credit card from U.S. Bank as I also have a business checking acct with them.  I walked in to apply and was told that I would receive approval by email.  After one week I called the 800 number and was told that I was not approved even with my perfect bank history with large deposits made to my accounts each month.  So.  2 new hard inquiries on my credit report lowered my Credit Score to 756.  Thanks U.S. Bank for wasting my time.  I trust you with my money but you can't trust me????? Well, I went to another company for a $20,000.00 loan and it was approved in less than a minute.  I don't recommend U.S. Bank due to their unethical practices and I can't believe that they are named the most Ethical Company?????   Unbelievable.

name: Patricia
review: I love us bank. They are always helpful and we have never had an issue with them. Staff are always friendly and very helpful when we need assistance.

name: Jeremy Crews
review: (HEARTLESS) I recently had my account drop in the negatives ($8.03) for merely hours which I had corrected and was charged $36 . Furthermore the fee originally showed on the 26th and now shows it on the 27th instead.. Unemployed and not on unemployment and they refused to make things right.

name: Laurie
review: Quick and easy if you need cash fast. Interest rate is high but gets you out of overdraft fees. Have dealt with US bank in the past. Easy to work with. Quick and efficient.

name: spotless_92
review: HORRIBLE excuse for a bank. This is my 1st step. I'm moving along to organizations that deal strictly with poor business/bank experiences. STEER CLEAR OF US BANK!!!

name: ortizjaime083
review: No good customer service, they have you calling and never give you answers about my accounts. And canceled my account and they don't give me a straight answer

name: Wayne
review: I don't like that this card takes forever to report to credit/update to agencies. It’s March and the last time they reported was March 31st.

name: Rui Wang
review: My wife wanted to close her account with $120k balance but was told there was a hold on her account. No explanation was given why there is a hold. She was told only the branch manager can remove that hold. However, neither people at the bank nor my wife could reach that branch manager by phone. My wife made many phone calls over a period of multiple months (from Jan. 2021 to 4/30/2021). The account manager could never be found. We had to call the bank. Every time someone from US Bank would tell her they couldn't reach the branch manager. They promised to call my wife back but they never did. So we had to call them again, and the same story repeats. They even suggested that we visit that branch office in person. We live in Boston. The branch is in Minneapolis. My wife opened her account while attending U. of Minnesota Law School. Today, after months of failed attempt, we told U.S. Bank that we cannot reach that branch manager and it was not our responsibility to find that branch manager.We told the bank employee on the phone that we will file a law suit. While my wife was filling in the form to file a law suit, the bank called her and told her the account was closed and a check will be sent. No explanation was given regarding why there was a hold on her account in the first place.You have to threaten to file a law suit, or you won't get your money back. This is customer service of U.S. Bank. I will call to close my account tomorrow. Avoid U.S. Bank like a plague.

name: spencerjohnd1
review: I called to have my fiancé added to my credit card last night and spoke to somebody named Michael. I was asked to verify information on my card that was correct, but since my phone wouldn’t allow them to send me a verification code (which I do not know why) they blocked my account and hung up abruptly after promising to contact me tomorrow about what I wished to have happened on my credit card account. If you guys, as US bank, read this review, this is UNACCEPTABLE! Let Michael know that he’s not very good at his job

name: DON
review: Great card, need a higher credit line though. I keep having to make multiple payments monthly to keep my credit usage down. I would use it a lot more if I only had to pay once or twice a month

name: Penni
review: I love this card, I earn Harley Davidson gift cards with my points. I would encourage people to apply for this card. The customer service is excellent and they are always willing to help with any problems.

name: Kenneth Ament
review: Poor customer service!  I’m sorry to say.  Been here a long time ..  just a lack of passion I suppose.  So many people walking around and nobody to assist.

name: Russell
review: Never an issue nice increase after a month or so. Happy to have your card. Looking forward to seeing additional increases down the road. Thanks for all you do.

name: Grace Lloyd
review: I was victim of a scam, US Bank filed a claim but did nothing to collect information in regards to it. The claim was denied and when I asked if there was any way I could appeal or do anything else (I have documentation to show it was a scam), they said that the scam was common but there was nothing they could do. Because of the claim, my online banking was locked. They gave me a phone number to call, when I called they told me they would call back. They never did. I went into the bank to get it unlocked and they said there was nothing they could do and I had to call the number. I called again, they told me I had to reset my username and I needed some information that I didn't have on me. I called back once I had the information, this time they were able to just unlock my account. Didn't have to reset my username, I didn't need the information I had been told they needed. This process had involved many phone calls and trips to the bank and I never felt like they cared about the service they gave me. Telling me they couldn't help me and continuously transferring me to different departments, sending me in circles. Not happy with the lack of support they supply their clients.

name: bn_backes
review: I have been with U.S. Bank for 11 years, and I absolutely hate them.  Everything is in slow motion.  Deposits, withdrawals, charges happen 2-3 days later than my other bank - which makes it hard to keep track of what is actually available.  They do not care about their middle-class customers - only the rich ones.  During the pandemic, their services have been non-existent or severely inconvenient.  I am in the process of transferring everything to another bank.

name: Ben Scherling
review: De-activated my debit card before even putting a new one in the mail for me.. thank you so much. So I go in to my local branch and order a temporary one.. one that’s good for two years. I update my billing address and they tell me they can’t mail me a new permanent card for 60 days after the address update. Fine, my temporary one will be good still correct? “ yes it is good until you activate the new card we will send out in 60 days.” Exactly 60 days later they de-activate my temporary card and I've  not received my replacement. I don’t need this in my life, I’ll bank elsewhere.

name: Michelle
review: Interest rate is really high at 23.99%.  Rewards program is offered, however, it is not competitive.  If you shop mainly at Kroger it may be worth it.  Really need to change to a  card with better rates and a better rewards program.

name: sue_davidson321
review: I have been doing online bill pay for decades and US Bank totally screwed this "feature" up and cannot seem to fix it.  You can only pay bills "today".  Not in the future.  Isn't that pretty basic - account, amount and date - really not that hard.  So I called they said it would be fixed in a week - it wasn't.  Called again and was disconnected!  Horrible service.  Absolutely would NOT recommend US Bank to anyone, ever!

name: jenjschreiber
review: US Bank is absolutely horrible!!! I highly recommend banking elsewhere. Their staff never knows the answers to basic or advanced questions. US Bank will keep you on hold for crazy amounts of time. Once I started banking elsewhere, I’ve noticed a tremendous difference and am very satisfied. Don’t waste your time here!!!

name: Mary Whitehead
review: I was in the Adelanto branch on Thursday about 10 am there was a homeless man in the bank I had an appointment he sat in the chair to wait the teller came to ask how to help us the man said he just needed change for a $5 bill the respect and courtesy the teller and manager showed this man was so inspiring this is my new bank I would recommend this branch to anyone great job us bank!!!!

name: Rotanak
review: Korean Air offers $1 per 1 point. This card doesn’t come with any benefit. You wanna keep it for $50/ year so the Korean Air Skypass mileages will not expire.

name: neadshlp
review: Wow does their new online banking SUCK! They removed the ability to view payments, you just get the bare minimum and you can't print them to PDF to file on your computer. The payment screen doesn't give you the payment information and you can no longer view your payments as a group, you have to look at them one at a time. There is no option to print one so if you need to prove you sent a payment, you have to take your laptop into the office, log into their wi-fi, log into your online account and show it to them in person. After 30 years with US Bank, I am now LEAVING so I can find a bank that doesn't purposely make it harder to do business with them. I hope EVERYONE who uses their online banking leaves so they won't have to worry about having so many pesky customers who want a user friendly online banking experience.

name: John
review: They did a great job with the financing and always answer the phone if I have questions.  I had my mortgage thru them also and was very happy!

name: Luffy C
review: US bank has the worst credit card fraud protection. Someone stole my credit card and made several transactions. US Bank wants to charge me for that although I clearly stated that I have never received the card, I have never activated the card, and I have never made those transactions. DO NOT bank with US bank. They do not protect you from fraud.

name: Emily Kennedy
review: Choosing to bank with a company for 31 years and receiving no comments, other than a form letter, on acct closures is just strange. Yes, banks reserve this right but slightly comical coming from their customer satisfaction team.  In 2021, there are an abundance of fee free banking options, without silly $2500 daily mobile deposit limits and excessive wire charges. My individual and business accts deserve friendly professionals.  Farewell US Bank and your antiquated ways!

name: Glenda
review: People who work there are nice and always try to help me out with what to do. They give out good advice. Some very nice ladies and gentlemen. Thank U for helping me.

name: vmartin0986
review: These people will try their hardest to screw you. No straight answers from customer service! Paid off my car loan then all of a sudden a $16,000 bill showed up and nobody can tell me why, just that I need to pay it.

name: Edward
review: US Bank does not report your business, so you have no business credit score. Thus keeping you from ever getting any good cash back credit card. So they make more money off your hard work, and treating you like you don't deserve to make any more income.

name: nascar4janet
review: Well I received a letter in the mail saying 15 months no interest transfer balances and save money. From the time I called I was lied to by Annie Smith. Then Scott leaves me on hold 45 min only to hang up. This bank has the WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE I have ever experienced. Lies and more lies. I now have to wait till Monday to call underwriting. Lol I would not recommend this bank ever.

name: emmettj_2
review: Great Card with a long balance transfer period of 0%. After the promotion is over the Apr is going to be pretty good. Not using it until I get my balance down.

name: Martha E
review: Nothing important to say. I just pay my lease and I am planning to do not get that kind of account again. It is not worth it. I just want to buy a good car, pay for it in cash and not go back to acquiring bank debts that consume your life.

name: Karim
review: The worst credit card every month I paid full amount then they reversed the payment to my account after that charged late fees 35$

name: edmund
review: It’s a great card very happy to be with US Bank the extra mile for you Customer service is awesome anytime I got a question they always answer it I am very fortunate to be with them thank you very much you are

name: mandy_ryan1
review: I will never use this bank ever again. I needed assistance due to COVID and I was charged fees that were not disclosed to me when I asked for assistance. My payoff was 179,000 and I ended up owning US bank 197,603 from all the fees.  You think people are helping you but they screwing you.

name: Victor Salazar
review: US Bank needs to be upfront about the charges which they add to my loan.  Currently, my online account shows all the payments I've made, however, they do not show the fees and interest which they underhandedly are charging me. There is currently a deficit (difference) between my payments and the amount I owe. This is unacceptable, and the main reason why I am choosing a different bank for all my loans.  My paper statement has $132 in interest charged and a balance of $61,910....but online the deficit is close to $400.  How is that possible???  I feel cheated by US Bank!

name: matthew
review: They gave me a shot after chapter 7 and this card brought my credit score up 85 points, amazing. Not saying it'll work the same for you but so far so good.

name: Douglass
review: Great card, love the Harley gift cards I get for accumulating points. Everyone always comments on the excellent Harley graphics on the card.

name: Walter Tuberville
review: Horrible process for establishing business checking online. It was a like a bad comedy. First, no auto acknowledgment from US bank that my application was received. Four days later an email tells me I need an EIN even though Phone support that I had called in advance assured me that my SSN was perfectly adequate. Two more days to ensure that they need it. So I established an EIN with the IRS even though the IRS does not require that I have one. Gave that info to US Bank. Got an email back asking for permission to use the EIN I just gave them.  Really? Isn't that clearly why I sent it? I see that the $100 to fund this new account processed from my personal, non-business account that same day. So I'm clearly near the finish line - right? Wrong! Four days later I get an email - my application creation failed due to a system failure. I can apply again. No mention about my $100. I ask the US Bank rep I've been in contact with previously what the heck is going on? He says he'll have me approved 24 hours if I re-apply. Sounds like a good customer service attempt. I roll the dice and re-apply.  I also ask him how do I get my $100 back since I had to re-fund this new application? Sure enough, next day I get an approval notice. I click the links to login to my account first time. Says I need my account number . The account they sent was like ********1234 - incomplete. Presumably because email is insecure. Fair enough, but how can I access my account? So I call my US Bank rep. He's not allowed to give the account number over phone. Also, he was unable to put the previous $100 into this new account? He'll work on getting that returned to me. I guess they expect people to wait another 10-14 days for the U.S. mail to arrive - like my account number is super secure via U.S. mail delivery. But if that is their expectation, they should at least say so in their email. I actually have no information telling me how to get my account number.  BTW, my account number will be on all of my checks if I write any. It isn't a big secret - right? Anyway, the rep refers me to their Business Service Center. The hold recording tells me to expect a 30 minute wait. I stay on hold for over an hour and am never picked up. I'm done!So I emailed the US Bank my rep and told him to close the not-exactly-opened account and get me my $200 back.  I then went, in person, to another bank and was all set up with an account,  account number and courtesy checks in about an hour. Online account access is supposed to be delayed another 48 hours or so. Business accounts are more complicated than personal accounts. But still, this was pretty simple.US Bank might be an OK small business checking bank if you just apply in person. But they haven't figured out online application for business accounts well at all. Even if everything went perfectly according to their plan, this was destined to be frustrating at best. Poor support. Systems don't provide status feedback via automated emails. Only saving grace was I did have a personal contact - but he's handcuffed by their poor system.  BTW, BBVA was worse - but I gave up sooner on them. Establish business checking in person. You'll thank me.

name: sravani6817
review: If I could give below one star i will give that. This us bank will screw up everything in loan process. they will make your life every day drama. worst experience i have ever had. They are such unethical people they can capable to  change the interest rate after they have locked. They never respond to your calls. firstly you will not get your appraisal what you expected for. due to this you need to pay lump sum amount in your down payment. and they will not give incentive what they promised for this called cheating your customers.  and you will not get tour loan approvals in a given time frame. after extending thrice my loan is still in process. it supposed to close with in 30 days now its more than 50 days still it is in process. i gave notice to my landlord as per their time frame. now i become homeless. on top of that i am under lot of pressure from seller. they don't feel guilty for their blunder mistakes and  never pick your calls even after all of this. please i am requesting don't go with this bank for mortgage.

name: Seyed Shirazi
review: I just applied with their special 20 cycle 0 APR offer. Got $600 CL with a score of 730 and $70k total CL. Declined the offer. Feels like a joke. I definitely don't recommend this card to anyone who wants a serious account.

name: Michael Nuckols
review: Dealing with US Bank has been a real pain in the buns!  Their title department is obviously the most mismanaged I have ever dealt with.  They could not tell me where my title was or if it was even being processed to be sent out.  I finally got a straight answer a week and a half after I had paid off the balance, but it was still at least 3 days out from when they told me to expect it in the first place.  I will never use US Bank for anything again!!  Please avoid their leasing department at all costs!!!  They were going to charge me excessive wear & tear charges even though my vehicle was cleaner than 90% of 3-year-old vehicles on the road.  I decided to buy out the lease in order to avoid paying those fees.  Now I have $5,000 equity sitting in my driveway.  I cannot believe I was going to pay to give it back to them!

name: kiranpatel0565
review: I have had my mortgage with USBank for I don’t know know how many years now. This last time when I wanted to take advantage of the lower interest rates it took them forever to close on my loan. I have always been happy with the bank associates but I don’t know what is going on with their Elyria, Ohio location they have some new employees and have lost the service culture to the point where the managers/supervisors are rude and don’t seem to care about their customers. I am almost to the point of moving my account to another bank if things don’t improve at this location. I have been banking at this location for 20 years.

name: Jennifer Chandler
review: I acquired this card 2/2018 its been the same amount with no increase. We are now 3/2021 and the account is always paid in full, when requested an increase, I was denied yet I have good credit.   Not so interested anymore

name: Dannetta
review: Love this card and bank. I’ve banked with them and never had a negative experience. I can’t speak any higher of them regarding my credit card.

name: Christopher
review: I First applied for a US Bank SECURED credit card with a $4000 deposit.  It helped raise my credit score in a few months. Always paying my balance on time. After a year and a half, I applied for an upgrade, it was approved. Now I have my platinum unsecured Card with a $4000 limit.... within a week I received my deposit back. Never had an issue with my card, and customer service is always providing hustle-free support. I was skeptical at first but I must say, after a year and a half and going, I highly recommend US Bank, thank you US BANK!

name: Hassan
review: They are ripping you off .they charge you automatically for late payment and they do not give you any break .very poor customer service and high interest

name: Chris
review: US Bank has  been great for me, plus they're local for me also!!  My whole family had used them at one time or another!  I have never had any disagreements with them at all!!

name: Arthadius
review: Really nice company I love the people they talk to you as if they were your own. Service is very good I will not trade them for anything

name: Manal
review: I don’t like it us bank

name: Kami
review: I've been banking at us bank for three years and love it always nice tellers to help me and everytime I have a problem they always help me find solutions

name: Cynthia B
review: So far so good with this card. It is used solely for the purpose of paying off another Credit before its interest rate started to kick in

name: Ashley
review: This is the absolute best card to have! I love that you get 20 months of 0% Interest with this card! It is super helpful having the zero interest!

name: j7hi
review: US Bank is the worst customer service in the industry. Phone wait times are over 40 to 60 minutes. There is no online chat option. Even an e-mail question takes 3-4 business days! I cannot recommend this US Bank.

name: Allen Hahm
review: They keep changing the software for the phone app. Now they've eliminated the scheduled bill payment section.  This makes it very difficult to see exactly what's happening with your account at any time you never know how many bills you've got scheduled and how much money you've got scheduled to go pay out. I have complained about this numerous times to no avail. Currently searching for a new bank.

name: anwar_rabadi
review: Total bogus and a total frustration that is going to reflect badly on your credit report and the authorized users credit score. They give you a lousy line of credit that you and your authorized users feel dengraded. I pay my balance as fast as I can just not to carry a balance onto going cycle just to keep my score up because any  balance would show negativity because of the lousy line of credit. Don't waste your time and make the crappy mistake. Go somewhere else. Try Sam's club.

name: Timmy
review: Thanks for your help on my recent home loan. 2020 was a bad year in buying a home. but with the help your financial help all is well

name: Abraham
review: This is an excellent card! It truly is very helpful in the way it does its rewards program. I have so many options to get rewards in many categories.

name: Cass D
review: I wish I could give this bank a NEGATIVE ZERO. Customer service agents are extremely rude and unprofessional. They lie and when you catch them in their lies, they put you on hold never come back; agents have no idea what they are talking about; they keep contradicting themselves. I had one of their agents telling me "you have a terrible accent you know..." she then put me on hold and never came back.  I have never missed a payment and they more than doubled my monthly payment for no reason; sadly none of them has been able to provide me with a clear explanation as to why my payment was more than doubled. The poor service they provide is very frustrating.  They do not listen to their customer, they talk over you , and try to bully you. I call the behavior a defense mechanism due to a lack of knowledge. Do yourself a favor; run away from this company if you can.

name: mpgahagan
review: is there a way to give MINUS five stars?  If so, this company would earn it in spades.  No aspect of their "customer service' is even remotely customer focused.  if you have the misfortune of trying to contact these people know that you will be a) on hold forever b) speak with someone who is unable to help and c) frustrated beyond the tolerance of most people.    Hiding behind a phone tree, and mumbling scripted text is what US Bank calls service.  The worst experience of your week (short of visiting a tooth extraction dentist) awaits you at US Bank.  As an example of how corporate America has lost its way, look no further- the textbook example of "whatever is the cheapest way to operate" is alive and well at this sorry excuse for a business.  I'm sure they are very profitable they will just have to do it without me.

name: Cole Cozner
review: Wish I could give a 0 star review. Called with a question about why my work share debit card was frozen, and was hung up on 4 times by various employees. They were extremely rude, condescending, and either claimed they didn’t know or criticized me before hanging up. All I needed was help, and this is simply outrageous to be hung up on 4 times for no reason.

name: doggiejlm
review: all their systems state something different, we can look at the app and web browser and they match but if you call about issues related to your account "their system will say something different and then they will email you something different. getting tired of being robbed by this company.

name: Michael
review: This is a good card.  I use it to purchase outdoor gear for the REI perks.  Had a great balance transfer rate as well and utilized that benefit as well

name: Ruby
review: The best credit card out there. They are always helpful when I have a question. Never had any problem out of my card. Customer service is great.

name: jeffslittlesister
review: The update to Online Bill Pay is TERRIBLE! You can only pay one bill at a time and it does not show you the total of your bills coming out for the month like the previous version did. Nothing about this update is good! Why make changes that are not for the better?!

name: Ron
review: I asked for the card and got the maximum credit on the best card. Charged it to the max and paid it off the next month..waiting to see what they do now.

name: Bob Kaufman
review: Bank service is slow!  Right now we have to use the drive through or ATM. The drive through is very slow. It took me a half hour to make a deposit and small withdrawal. Thinking about changing banks.

name: Ryan Malloy
review: Avoid this card and lender.  It is a shame that REI deals with U.S. Bank.  They are HIGHLY predatory.  After speaking with a representative about an issue impacting my ability to make a single payment due to COVID 19, I was told that the late fee would be waived and that the missed payment would not be reported.  I immediately made my payments, to find out months later that I was reported, had my credit limit dropped and my credit score significantly reduced.  I would recommend that any individuals looking into this credit card avoid this unethical institution and opt for a credit card through a local credit union.

name: John McElwain
review: Don't imagine you can travel with a US Bank debit card. I just spent hours on the phone trying to get them to let me use my card on a trip. Seriously, 7 phone calls over a couple days and over and over they would tell me, they have cleared the block but then it would never work. They finally pretty much admitted that whatever fraud protection block their system was putting up, they couldn't override it. Same thing happened to me last year, but I gave up after a couple calls, thinking it was a problem with the card -- but when I got home, it worked just fine.

name: tessafronan
review: Never open credit with US Bank. They do not notify you when you have a balance. They do not notify you when you have a late payment. When you ask them to do something they act like they don’t know or they can’t and just transfer the call to another person who does the same thing. Terrible customer service. Terrible bank.

name: Your a piece of shit Ass hole
review: US Bank is extremely unhelpful. When you ask them to do something they act like they cannot do it but you can do it online. Speaking to a live person is pointless. They don't want to talk to you. They want to take their fees and have you do everything online.

name: Travis
review: I got approved for a 7500 limit! They pulled my transunion report! Which is my lowest score! I think the score they said i had was wrong! They said i had a 628! And they gave me a 7500 limit?? Doesnt seem right!

name: Travis
review: By the way I have a platinum card with US bank also! And a checking account and savings!

name: Mary
review: This was a loan that has been paid off since October and still holds a balance on my credit.It was like a 90 day note paid off early.

name: Mary
review: I got this card to establish credit.  It's done nothing for me at all.  I never spent more then a 1/4 of my balance and my credit goes down.  So I  tried spending more and making monthly payments  and it's not helping.

name: toubikat2
review: US Bank, Calabasas Branch, is the worst Bank that I have dealt with. They don't know how to answer your questions. The bank by itself has the worst transfer regulations to another account with a very low limit set for new clients! Even their IT personnel sometimes don't know the answer to your questions. Stay away from this bank, especially its branch in Calabasas. They have used to cater to elderly clients and are not up to date for handling the business needs of the younger business customers. The branch manager has a very macho attitude and not very accommodating. I learned not to deal with the smaller unknown bank from now on. A lesson learned a very hard way!!!

name: Ilea
review: This credit company has been a blessing all throughout my time with them, including when my identity was stolen and my credit limit of $10,000 was used during that time! Their customer service is absolutely tremendous! Thank you for treating and loving your customers like family!

name: Bill Graham
review: This Bank has the Worst Customer Service that I have ever had the misfortune of dealing with.  Their Automated System is complete trash especially if All You have is a loan with them. You have to cycle thru multiple menus (over and over) even After you have entered your account number and zip code just to get the Balance on the loan. When I called to inquire about their Annoying Automated System and waited on hold for over 45 min to speak to someone, I was politely informed that my problem could be corrected if I Just opened a Credit Card account.  I couldn’t believe that they suggested something so ridiculous!

name: darren
review: they lower you credit limit when you lower the usage. they also lowered it without notice and it cost me 20 points on my fico. smh..very disappointed about this.. just as hop over the 700 threshold..

name: David Johnson
review: Awful bank, you can not get anyone by phone, they screwed up my mortgage application, took 4 months to get a refinance.  If you phone fraud you can be sure of being on hold at least 30 minutes.  Banks are all about phoning now and this bank is terrible.

name: Tom Van
review: Absolutely ruthless and don't care about the customer at all. Their customer service will transfer you for an hour to get nowhere, usually ending in just being hung up on or an answering machine that never returns calls. They are currenlty trying to scam me for 2,000 dollars even though eveything was fully paid off.

name: greendadawg
review: They would not send me out a statement but would then send a late letter. Worst card I ever had. customer service support was no help whatsoever. I maintain at least 10 other cards. I use them in my business to get rewards. every other company sent out their statements and I paid the invoices completely every month.

name: Anthony
review: I'd like to thank you for your great service and your ability to stay ready at all times of the day even the we hours of the morning you couldn't imagine the ups and down I got through late nite been a truck driver so thank you guys for being here and attending to my horrible schedule

name: curiso2011
review: I have been a us bank member for 12 years and wanted to boost my credit score so got the visa card. I totally regret it now after getting my score to very good standing they are great for advertising special. But honestly, I have tried to get my interest rate lower my credit good but because they lock me in on high interest said once my credit was good they would lower my interest. But now my credit good they do not want to lose the money they make on my interest and keep it high. and will not even try to help me out right now in my time of need. they have made a lot of money and I feel they could help me out.

name: David
review: I really appreciate that they worked with us to get the lowest possible loan interest. After getting medically discharged from the Military,

name: Leah Hourigan
review: Called customer service today. The guy was rude and NOT helpful at all. Even more frustrating when you say something and their  response is apparent they are NOT listening!

name: Norman
review: Should be $0 balance since November 2019 since paid this off October 2019. I have never used this card for more than a year. Received a letter December 2019 that they are closing my account so they closed but never fully closed. This account should have been closed too since November 2019. Ridiculous!

name: Michael
review: Easy approval. New web site works. I have had no issues, but I have never needed customer service for anything. No fee was my reason for apping this.

name: DERBYLINE
review: I really regret doing any kind of business with this Bank they can't keep up with mortgage payments even when you go to the store and you get a refund & the money is put back on the card they still want you to pay all over again from your checking account for money that they already received this is a horrible incompetent institution and I'm really sorry I do any business with them I really hate this institution and if you're wise you will not get involved with these people and I mean that even with  having exceptional credit you will be better off banking somewhere else please trust me they have customer service supervisors that start screaming at you is if they're talking to their personal relationship person very impatient I see why so many of them are closing I can truly say I hate this institution I wouldn't leave this dump if I could please take your business elsewhere

name: Bruce
review: You can choose 2 5% categories and 1 2% category every quarter.  Lots of good categories are available.  I use department stores, electronics and grocery categories.

name: Carolyn
review: I've had this card for over sixteen years.  Their customer service is top-notch.  Their card, in my book, is the best credit card I've ever had.

name: Haley
review: So far it’s been great use it usually on just vacationing every six months or so. Enjoyed the card so far! Would do it again. Thanks

name: Haley
review: It’s been ok. Not exactly sure what to expect since I’m a FHA. So I think it’s been good for the loan type. Next time it’ll be different I’m sure.

name: Patricia
review: the interest rate never changes... and that is a plus in my favor. Also, my daughter can use this for her credit score... never had any problems occur on the account.

name: Joshua
review: One of my favorite credit cards, easy to make payments and to monitor through my US Bank phone app, plus I get mobile alerts every time it's used!

name: Customer Customer
review: Save your time and money, don't waste your time opening account in this bank because they will give you a lot of headache. Every time I call their customer service I always get different answers about my dispute, and they aren't willing to help resolve your problem. When I opened this account I went to the branch twice, first was to add my husband on my checking account and provided all our information and signature. Then after about a week they closed my savings account that was open over the phone because they said there was no signature. No one has even bothered to reach out to us about the form that needed our signature and the fact that we went to the branch after opening that account, the person at the bank didn't even mention that to us. After this incident, I went to the branch to ask for a limit increase on my debit card spending, and she said you should be receiving a decision if it is approved or not, and again they failed to do that. I can just go on and on with not just once, not twice, but many more incidents that I never felt valued as a customer. I have been with Capital One for so many years and never had this bad experience. It is just because they don't have a branch here, so I decided to open US bank. But definitely closing my account with them after withdrawing my money in checking. We will NOT gonna do any business with them ever again. And I also warned friends and family.

name: Kevin
review: It’s a decent card, I had Really good credit a few years ago in my life but medical bills has made it so I’ve been having to rebuild it these past few years and this card is very easy to get

name: Ly S Dye
review: If, and I stress, if either their site or their app functions, you might be able to do remote banking. Don't count on either working.

name: Doug Jones
review: Fantastic credit card for balance transfers - the best I've had.  Curious if there are others that are better on the market.  The others I've tried fall short on multiple dimensions.  I'd recommend this card to anyone looking for a balance transfer.

name: Joel
review: Seems like a good card to me. I pay my bill in full every month, and they continue to provide credit services. That is what I expect a credit card to do.

name: Deanna
review: The US Bank app is not user friendly. It is difficult to use and make payments. The autopay option does not allow you to pay an amount other than the minimum. If you want to pay a different amount, you have to enter it manually each month.

name: Dianne
review: I use for gas and groceries and prescriptions. I earn points for discounts on gas and groceries. I love getting paid for buying necessary purchases.

name: Jenn Swanson
review: Great for balance transfers but not for much else. Even after I submitted every item they required to dispute charges for concert cancelled due to covid they refused to reverse the charges and the tix retailer is downright crooked. I've been a loyal customer here for almost 20 years but I think it's time to shop around. Oh and be mindful if you use this or any other credit line for overdraft protection. They will continue to charge you over and over for something that never would've put your account in the red if it hadn't been for their 'oops technical error'

name: nancya2006
review: I had a credit card for six months and I lost it and I reported immediately , but the bank still charges 21 dollars every month for late fee . They charge me even when I didn’t get my card I got my new card in 1 month and half. I decided to close my credit card and they still charge. This bank is really stupid they’re thieves. They don’t care about you as a client .

name: Mary Janelle
review: there's different ways to use and gain points or cash back. use your cc for Utilities, streaming, cellphone,..I like all the different categories that you can choose from.

name: Helen Y
review: Excellent overall credit card. You can't go wrong with the 0% interest offer, especially, if you are considering debt consolidation. I would highly recommend

name: Barret Adsleaux
review: US Bank is a dreadful enterprise. They build in profits that are dependent on discouraging lessors from buying out their leases. They quote your payoff with sales tax (even if you are not keeping the car) they also take 4-6 weeks to get your title to you, If you return the car they pad the damage/use bill with ridiculously over stated costs. They are slippery and mendacious. I will walk before leasing a car from them.

name: Natasha Y
review: Fortunately, I've never had a credit card with U.S. Bank. As a mortgage lender their business practices are horrible. I did a "Cash for Keys" type of agreement with them and surrendered ownership of the house back to the them. I did not destroy the property and I moved out in October and turned the keys in. Here we are one day away from January 2021. I have yet to receive my payment. Calls and emails from my attorney to their attorney go unanswered. This is a very valuable lesson learned. I will never do any business transactions with U.S. Bank ever again!!! I would not have given them any stars, but this site would not let me leave the review unless I gave at least one.

name: billydagoon1002
review: Worst experience ever. Being on the streets during the holidays, the cold, and oh yeah this pandemic is hard enough. But wait, there's a ray of sunshine...a rewards card for $500 gifted to me while at a shelter for dinner. That's what I thought until the owner of Eastside lodge got done with it. All in all he clipped me for "incidentals" totaling around $100. All of which will be locked up for 31 days until returned to said card.i never agreed to these charges. All I wanted was a warm bed for a few nights. Us bank is doing absolutely nothing to help. Nor can I press charges because everything is pending. "Just be patient" they said but they aren't the ones on the street cold and hungry. Thanx us bank. Merry Xmas.

name: helphinstine0659
review: They charge you money to have a checking account if you aren't rich. They also have an app that don't work, and they lie to you about deposits. They will financially fraud everyone.

name: Judy Beth
review: The lease is paid by auto draft, so I don’t worry about it being late. I believe the lease ends in less than a year at which time I’ll make a decision.

name: Ian McIntosh
review: Worst customer service on the planet, they make promise they don't keep, they transfer your call and hang up on you, they try to blame you for their issues and to top it all off they kept calling me by the wrong name! Over a month to receive a new card and now they are having issues activating and I need to call back the next day and the next day and so on.. Do they care, absolutely not, move on to the next sucker! Just so you know, ask for a US based call center and they will totally lie about where they are located and then evade any question about getting to a US call center. 5 calls this morning, still never resolved the issue

name: Randy Dickson
review: When they switched from US Bank, everything went downhill. I signed up for auto pay a couple of months ago. The next billing cycle they dinged me a late fee and submitted a negative note on my credit history - even though they didn’t get the auto-pay processed. This month I paid more than the min amount due early trying to get the balance down. On their app, it kept showing $0.00 due. Then yesterday they automatically deducted $121.00 from my checking account as an auto pay - even when there was no payment due. I called to see why and the person I spoke to was EXTREMELY rude! She said they could do that because it was in their “Terms and Conditions.” I’m done with them. I will be opening another cc  account and transferring what little balance remains. Pay no attention to what they say you’ll be paying in interest. They’ll get to you any way they can.

name: best0115
review: $1200 balance transfer offered. with  810 fico with excellent credit.don't waste your time & a hit on your credit.i declined acceptance of the card, since i was looking for a higher transfer.  on  the application i had requested $4200 on the balance transfer.

name: joseph
review: You'd b better off with credit union credit cards..rates are lower and credit limits are much higher penfederal credit union https://www.penfed.org/

name: Michael
review: I had 98% utilization, across 5 credit cards, totalling $42,000.   I paid them all down to 2% utilization, all at the same time, and US Bank was the only credit card issuer that reduced my available credit limit.  Not only reduced it, but reduced it SIGNIFICANTLY!  Hopefully, once all of my balances get reported to the bureaus, US Bank will reverse their decision.  If not, I'll be closing my account with them!

name: Kavin Nilpradab
review: US Bank's systems and processes are the most archaic of any institution I've ever banked with. They have tons of processes in place to ostensibly protect you, the consumer, but providing verification to get through those processes requires jumping through hoop after hoop. On top of that their portals for bank, mortgage, & credit card are all disconnected and often down or outright buggy preventing login in the first place. The lone bright spot is the mortgage advisor I've been lucky enough to be paired with. As great of an individual my mortgage advisor is, the rest of the organization is sub-par in almost every way. This bank is decades behind other large banks when it comes to online accessibility and ease of use, stay away unless you enjoy spending time waiting in long lines at physical branches to get anything done

name: john
review: I only carry a US Bank Fred Meyer Rewards card; a CITI bank COSTCO card and a Boeing Employees credit Union card. The FM rewards are really now US Bank rewards and are paid quarterly for doing nothing except spending on everyday stuff. The CITI card pays yearly as an Executive Member bonus. It essentially pays for my membership. The BECU card, I use for special offers and unexpected needs. No other cards come close. I pay everything off at the end of the month. I don't buy if I can't pay it off in 30 days. I don't pay interest, so it doesn't matter the interest rate but all of these cards for me are below 8%. I refuse all cards with an annual fee; high interest rates or transfer fees. I would not give these cards up and have no desire for any other cards which can't beat the benefits of these cards. I buy everything with these credit cards and carry no cash. I carry no balance unless it is at 0% interest.

name: kfsrails
review: Half hour wait outside Citrus Heights branch - due to Covid restriction of only 6 customers allowed inside. They let three out, and no one in during my visit.

name: Jonathan R
review: Very good company. Great customer service as to be expected out of AAA.  CAN'T COMPLAIN. They have denied credit line increases on me several times though.

name: Christina M Widmyer
review: The address of 100 S Third is my business address.  I live at 46 N Gould Road 43209I like US Bank but not sure about this address issue

name: Ms B
review: I thought their Rewards on the credit card would be worth opening an account. NOT. Someone used my number to get gas on the same day for $99, then again for $75. I got a phone call alert of fraud in Oct.2020. They removed the charges,  I closed that card and got a new number. Now in Dec. they put the fraudulent charges back on my card. Someone got away with 3 or 4 fill ups at my expense. Good bye.

name: Justin
review: Worst customer service ever.  I’m incurring high interest because they will not give me a phone call back to unlock my account for some stupid reason that they didn’t even know about when I first called!!! I was supposed to get a phone call back from their fraud department a week ago to confirm it’s me, which I still don’t get why but okay, and they are not keeping their words!!! I’ve called in numerous time again and again, and all they kept saying is they need to confirm it’s me and that department is only an outbound and I have to wait for their call.  Then CALL ALREADY!!!!!!! It’s almost two weeeks now that I’ve been waiting!!!! And now another day is about to pass by. And all of these their regular level agents couldn’t even fully explain.  Had to demand a supervisor to get a real explanation (which once, they even hung up on me when I demanded a supervisor, had to call back again).  Another thing I could not understand.  They said they tried to reach me on my primary phone number which turns out it was my home phone number from 10 years ago.  They also did have my current cell number as a second number on profile.  But they didn’t bother calling the second number, instead they just locked my account up.  Which they didn’t even know about when I first called for a business.  SCREW USBANK!!!!!!
