name: Wesley
review: Customer service is very nice always willing to help always have offers and ideas of making things a little bit more palatable in these trying times

name: Jay Jones
review: They don't deserve 1 star ? by far the worst establishment i ever did business with. What ever happen to professionalism ?‍ makes you wonder. Rude obnoxious operators with no sense of direction. How can you actually work for a place and have no clue on whats going on ? I was put on hold for 15 min ? just to get hung up on. Called again and was hung up on again ?‍ after getting through finally i was requiring about a transaction which was declined and they couldn't even tell me why?‍they sent me through a bunch of BS to prove my identity just to tell me the same BS ? never got the answer I was looking for and ended up loosing money. So you us bank and your account your business and everything about yall ? time to go to a real bank that makes sense

name: Mercedes
review: Great card it is what I needed to take my credit to the next level. Response to request are always prompt and informative I recommend this card.

name: Randy
review: Great card and customer service. I have had this card for years and it never fails me. Great interest rates and they appreciate my business.

name: Alex Breen
review: Given their high points value, U.S. Bank FlexPerks consumer and business credit cards are a hidden gem for credit card rewards enthusiasts.

name: Rhett
review: They have given regular CL increases and customer service has been helpful when my card was hacked. The rewards are good for the categories I use.

name: Dean
review: This bank is very slow in applying payments or handling transfers. I would use it more if they were as quick as other cards in applying transactions. Very low credit line. Dissapointed in US Bank all the way around. I have a checking and savings there

name: serenajackson08
review: I just called US bank waited for twenty minutes explained to guy I need to speak to a nanker AT MY BANK NOT 1-800 nb he put me on hold again came back 10 min later with woman from bank i told her i need to make appt with banker she put me on hold again to the beginning of automated system. STILL HAVENT SPOKEN TO A BANKER STILL CANT GET BUSINESS IN ORDER CAUSE ALL THE BANKS IN THE INNER CITY CLOSED!!!!!!

name: Rainer
review: Thanks US-Bank. You are a wonderful, caring company. God bless You. You service is outstanding, unfortunately your online service does not work accurately.

name: Alap Modi
review: Home Mortgage - It has been a nightmare working with the U S Bank. They just keep asking one document after another every week and that just delays the process. My home should be closing in next 3 days but I still don't  have a clarity if loan is approved or not. They are still asking for documents. Sales team is just over promising and under delivering. And then they will blame it on underwriter. DO NOT go with U S BANK for Home Mortgage.

name: Raju Dave
review: Same situation, my loan is in process for 3 months now and every week there is a new promise of closing week after. No one takes responsibility and just keep making excuses that file is still inline with underwriter. We are almost without home, gave up our rental property and now we dont know when we will close new apartment and move. So sad

name: mrcswks
review: US Bank has to be the worst bank I’ve ever had to deal with and highly DO NOT recommend anybody bank with them. All I have been doing is trying to get a statement from the past two months today so I can close on a home I am purchasing in 5 days and I have spoken to 8 people and nobody has been competent enough to help me with this. All of the supervisors are busy and don’t have enough time to talk to me, they told me they would call me back tomorrow. Do not think I am a complaining person, I work and sales and understand how working with the public can be but this is ridiculous! Now my closing is getting pushed back and nobody in that department cared! I highly advise against working with them! I’d rather keep all of my money in cash than deal with this horrendous bank!

name: george
review: Quick, easy auto loan. Had several auto loans/leases with U.S. Bank in the past. Never an issue. The process can be 100% online which saves time for everyone. No needless paperwork or documents to slow the process.

name: trina lee
review: They are extremely difficult and uncooperative.   State Farm Bank transferred(or was bought out by US Bank) all its customers.   It included my CD accounts that were with State Farm.   So far it has taken me 23 days working to get my CD funds sent to me, with many conversations and emails.  They refuse to do wire transfers to my bank and now they are saying they are sending my  checks by regular mail.   So far still no checks.    I hate to think about how they will handle the credit card holders that were with State Farm.   Shortly they will be issuing new US Bank cards and the State Farm credit cards will be cancelled  WOW!!!

name: deckmasteroc
review: Checking/Savings Accounts: Worst bank I've ever had to deal with. My accounts were transferred over from State Farm when US Bank acquired them. First, US Bank lost $5,000 of my dollars. Then their customer service was rude and unhelpful. Now I'm getting fees we never had with State Farm and my savings account interest rate is close to 0. F this bank. Taking my money elsewhere.

name: Shannon
review: Thanks to Us bank for allowing me to establish my credit! Us bank has Always been good to me and I have been a customer of nearly 3/4 years now, and without your help I wouldn't be where I'm at on my credit score today! Thank You Us bank!!! Your totally amazing? ******Update wow I just love how this bank has helped me to progress...Thanks for the opportunity

name: Samantha
review: Good card but don’t like the annual fee will update after a year of use. Over all a better option for rebuilding credit than most..

name: Sushil Sharma
review: Applied for card Oct 24th and Was approved for 1K at 0% for a year and happy with the service. U.S. Bank was one of the only banks to give me trust out there with a 669 Trans score that did not want hight interest.

name: renokev
review: Without question USBank has the worst customer service in practice. Not saying the people are but their practice is unacceptable. They block transactions and if it's crypto related you're a victim. Wake up  US B you're shitty and the world is changing whether you like it or not. Even the input on this crappy review form is ridiculous. You're Fired! I'll be changing soon.

name: Dara Roy
review: If there was a zero rating I would give it to you! You guys suck!!! I have NEVER BEEN SO SHOCKED AND UPSET WITH A FACILITY THAT HANDLES MONEY!!! I receive my measly amount of child support on a usbank ReliaCard which has recently had unauthorized withdrawals on my account so I went to the usbank ReliaCard app on my phone, accessed the customer service phone number and spoke to a very nice lady who was very helpful and walked me through what it would take for me to resolve this issue. Since I am traveling with my job and not home, she said I would have to change my address and she would cancel my card and reissue me a new one. I didn’t know the address for the motel I’m staying in so I asked if I could get that information and call back and when I called back five minutes later, the second person that took my call said that I have to go online to change my address and then I have to wait 5 business days before I can request a new card !!! What the hell???!!!

name: Gil
review: I love my us bank card.  It has helped me through many times.  I pay my balance in full every time all the time.  I have referred my bank to my friends and relatives and some of them are thinking of applying.  I hope to stay with us bank for many years, love their customer service always knowledgeable and courteous.  Will continue to be a us bank customer for a long time, God permitting.

name: jstalcup
review: Receiving unemployment via the debit card sent out through US Bank Reliacard has been single handedly the worst customer service I have ever experienced in my life to date.  The process itself has been strung out over two months. (Keep in mind, these funds are to meet emergency bills such as rent and groceries. By the time anyone actually receives their assistance they are far too late to even help meet basic needs.)I have started calling in on a daily basis because the information I receive is so conflicting. Every agent I speak with tells me something different, including the supervisors. Each time I call in I am told that there is something different restricting my account. No matter what I am told, any time I fax in what they say I am missing or contact my state or do any of a vast number of things I have been told that I need to do, the problem is never resolved and they just change what they say is the problem the next time so that they never have to release my funds.I have tried to explain to the supervisors that their agents are not following a consistent protocol because no matter how many times I call in I am given different, often completely false information by their customer service representatives. However, no one is taking any responsibility for this information. The supervisors just say, "I don't know why they said that" or "I have nothing to do with that". In addition, twice now the supervisors have pretended to transfer me and then hung up on me. I worked in a call center during my college years--I know what fake hang ups sound like on the phone when pretending to transfer. I have told them over and over they need to go back and listen to my calls to hear what their agents are saying and to retrain them instead of just denying responsibility for their agents' actions. However, they refuse to do this.My state gave US Bank over $4,000 that they were supposed to distribute to me in unemployment. What a joke. I don't where all their funds end up sitting long term when they restrict access for months on end but they definitely are not going to the people the state designated that money for.This pandemic has been excruciatingly painful for our economy and our households. I hope if any other states have been considering US Bank Reliacard as their means of distributing funds that this is just one of many voices begging them to reconsider. I am daily losing hope of ever receiving the funds that I payed into for unemployment and am left just praying that God somehow intervenes to cover my emergency bills.

name: Dara Roy
review: This bank is absolutely incompetent and I’m going to go all the way to the top with the people who have a voice and authority to make some critical changes since they have proven that they aren’t capable of handling Oregonian money that families receive from unemployment, child support, and who knows what other critical types of currency exchange accounts millions of people receive money through! I’m sorry you’re going through such a terrible thing with these morons ...I am too and it is absolutely unacceptable! Be a voice with me to see about bringing change to our piece of crap broken system! Us bank ReliaCard is  literally stripping us of having any control over our own money and then refusing to address and resolve anything to see that we are able to access the money that we have been forced to keep in their pice if crap bank! These issues are unacceptable and are directly causing devastating loss For a lot of Oregonians I would guess. All this unnecessary stress during an unbelievably difficult time that we are already suffering from in pivotal ways Is enough to push someone to their breaking point! I’m late stage heart failure and I literally feel like I’m about to stroke out after my interactions with those idiots. Are they even using Americans to receive and handle our sensitive information and finances? I could barely understand the second person I spoke with there. I hope something happens for you. Nobody deserves to receive “benefits” of any sort and then not have access to the funds and also has no way to resolve anything with the current systems in place. Talk to anyone like the governor is a great place to start I think!

name: Katie
review: Good bank, good service, have been banking with them for many years. Also got my PPP SBA loan through us bank.  us bank has been helping me for many years.

name: Ariar Hart
review: The worst  customer service you can ever find in any institutions. They need to learn and be more educated about their jobs instead of passing you around from one dept. to the next without your knowledge.

name: mary_3957
review: Why does US Bank penalize West Coasters? Try paying your mortgage after 6 pm. You can't because the mortgage office closes at 8 pm CENTRAL Time. That means you're going to get a late charge if you do, as I did, and try to pay before the grace period ends. Turns out the end of the day is 8 pm. Awful, awful customer service.

name: aawendorff
review: Someone went into the bank with an ID with my moms information on it. They asked an associate to take $4500 out of any of the accounts associated with my mom's name. She didn't have any information besides the ID. The bank associate GAVE THEM MY ACCOUNT NUMBER to take the money out. The branch they went to isn't even in the state that I live in. While I am getting my money back (in a couple of weeks) and am having to close my account, it seems as though the associate should not be able to simply give bank information to someone with just an ID linking them to the account (as a co-signer). This makes the bank seem incompetent and not able to protect from in-person fraud.

name: Adan H. Carpio-Bernal
review: Love this credit card super easy to manage on the mobile app and love that it’s zero interest for the first 20 bill cycles great customer service too.

name: Jason Jones
review: My wife and I deposited $960 into a US Bank ATM. It errored out. We have the proof that we were there we have the time and pictures of the ATM. they are not returning our money they keep closing our claim and saying that they couldn't find any faulty ATM transactions. this billion dollar institution thinks that it's okay to steal from working class teachers and construction workers. Thinking about filing a police report.

name: renokev
review: Unbelievable, this bank should be sued and repay millions in claims for their incompetence.

name: Alex Wikstrom
review: This card helped build credit for sure... covid times right now though and so they closed my account without notification.  Every month I call them to see if they are going to return my money and they give me a new date to expect my check.  But every time I call they still haven't sent it.I can't recommend this card unless you are ok with a lot of waiting (75 days so far) and hold time/call transfers to ask for your money back.

name: ember_newbornriot
review: once again LIVID with this bank. I was with Statefarm bank and they recently transitioned under US Bank. Well of course this weekend I buy a new car and can't pay my down payment because apparently there is a limit to how much I can spend a day on my debit card. So Monday rolls around and I try to pull out money orders, and I am only able to get 2 and not the others that I NEED before 6 that day. well after over 20 phone calls to the bank some including an actual statefarm agent making these calls, I was unable to gain access to MY MONEY all day. When I get home at 6 (missed an entire day of work bc of this) I look at my app and it looks like they upped my limit so I'm like whatever I'll try tomorrow morning. Well this morning I went to get my remaining money orders and today I was only able to get ONE! and my card declined. so I am currently on the phone with the damn bank AGAIN! it's already been an hour. NEVER EVER EVER use US bank. they have awful customer service and ridiculous "safety" features which does not allow you to access your money. They are holding my money hostage and completely fu**ing me in the @$$! After I get this last money order I am fine with not being able to get gas or food for today but I AM switching banks ASAP!!! I'm thinking Chase or Discover idk. If anyone has advice please help me out.

name: tammylmayfield
review: Being an excellent customer for 9+ years was recently declined for $5,000 personal line of credit even with 730+ credit score, never any late pmts. on US Bank credit card or any late pmts. on any accounts I have & never any overdrafts.  I am right now closing this account & going with a local hometown bank & would never recommend US Bank to anyone again.

name: stvenkeslar
review: US Bank has got to be the worst bank out there! I had an account from 2018 that I went in paid every account to zero and closed every account. They did not close my accounts instead tacked on fees for maintenance then proceeded to turn me into collections on money I didn't owe them. After fighting with US Bank they finally cleared two of the accounts off my credit as paid. But my credit report shows that I was late on payments that I never was. I recently found out that I have another account that's open with them says I owe $38 again that never got closed and now I can't access stuff in my current bank because they sent that to collections so livid worst bank ever

name: Damon
review: Three years of on time payments, perfect utilization and not once did US Bank offer an unsecured card and didn't even care when i canceled. All scores 750 plus with zero negatives and a great profile. Closing was the best thing to do.

name: Miranda Monson
review: Was on the phone with US Bank Credit Card Fraud and I had an unpleasant experience with the representative. Her name was Rebecca and I was confused about what had happened on my account. She yelled “excuse me!!” At me while on the phone and proceeded to have a terrible attitude afterwards. She never elaborated on the issue I was calling about and didn’t take the time to explain it in a kindly manner.  This is unacceptable behavior in my opinion. I will be leaving this bank and moving to somewhere I feel more appreciated.

name: Andrew
review: US Bank is amazing to deal with. Super easy and friendly always. I have never had any issues making a payment or receiving support from them

name: Kevin M Beasley
review: Great service easy to use I’m looking forward to watching my credit score increase. Much better than other sites by showing all my information as it’s tracked.

name: Robert P Groschen Jr
review: There's only one bank that's more customer abusive than USBank and that's Wells Fargo.  I have no plans to use this card any more.

name: ajpayne8
review: I originally really liked this card for the rewards. The biggest con is that I have to remember to go in and make selections for the 5% and 2% cashback regardless if I just want to keep them the same as last month. It stinks that they just wouldn't rollover or they would not make clear mention of it when enrolling. Leaves a bad taste in your mouth when you find out after you get your bill and see you have only received 1% cashback.

name: Timothy
review: US bank has great customer service.  This was an initial card received when opening my account.  I have a cash back card that I use daily from U S Bank

name: Adam Jacobs
review: If I could give this company negative stars I would. I was dragged along for over 4 MONTHS on a refinance. I was originally told that it would take up to 90 days at the very most. Communication was horrible throughout the entire process. I was also not informed that 3 months into the process that my loan officer had quit or been laid off. Two weeks after no communication I had called to see why  it is taking so long to close on the loan and they then reasigned me to a new loan officer who asked for EVERYTHING I had already submitted to the previous one. Never go with this company for anything in regards to mortgage or refinancing

name: jmwood42
review: In order to add a spouse to this card within days of opening it (you cannot do this at the time of opening and must instead mail a special form after opening) they insist on doing a second credit check. Seriously? So i have to have excessive, extraneous credit inquiries impacting my score because these incompetents can't handle such a basic use case of originating a card. Add on the 30+ minutes stuck on hold dealing with this and I'm ready to dump this garbage bank at the first opportunity.

name: info_327
review: Spent the past 2 months in process. We have 800+ credit scores. They had all information up front, when requested, we held nothing back. In this 2 months time they have changed rates, what loans were available, even thereafter they added additional requirements, changed their mind and total waste of companies time. Although nice personally, the company clearly is not well organized in the offering of their commercial products.

name: Raymond Niblock
review: Card is a good one. Great rewards for the categories if you use them. Website and app are easy. Payment is easy. Credit limit increase was Easy after 6 months.

name: Joseph
review: US Bank has excellent customer service both at the branch and for their global team they work with you at every turn to make sure you have the best experience

name: jasminebatiste
review: Do NOT get this card. I had this card for 3 months with the maximum credit line and they closed it all because...I paid the full balance with an out of state checking account. They wanted me to submit my bank statement to prove I was the owner (which I did) and swore it was not closed, only blocked ( which is a lie because they reported it as "closed due to credit grantors request" to all 3 credit bureaus) I haven't had a transaction since July, yet they still have not returned my $5,000 security deposit! This card is more trouble than its worth. If you want to build credit with a secured card, you're better off with Discover It Secured Card or Navy Federal Credit Union's secured credit card.Sincerely,Still waiting for my ?

name: DejaVu1669w
review: This is a great card in my opinion, but it must be used often or they lower your limit due to inactivity. This is the first time I have had this happen with any CCard I have owned.  And - it is not mentioned in their fine print.

name: nicholaslstephenson
review: A complete joke of a bank. They put a hold on my account, don`t tell me, then ask for a fax and say it will be a week before I can access my money

name: dave glasgw
review: Been trying to get the title for my car since this past May after it was paid off. Still counting...Seems like a terrible place to work too.

name: None None
review: We attempted to refinance our house using US Bank. Despite having enough savings to purchase the house outright, they spent over three months requesting documents, credit reports, and more even though my credit score is over 850. The process was incredibly time consuming and invasive. In contrast, when we pursued a loan with JP Morgan, it was an effortless, concierge experience. Ultimately, we had to terminate the loan process with US Bank because it took up too much time and there was no end in sight. You may gain a few bps by obtaining a loan from US Bank but any gain will be offset by the time they chew up and the stress they create. Their process is incredibly adversarial as well.

name: Joey
review: Excellent Customer Support and Service. I would highly recommend them for your personal as well as your Business Financial Services.

name: Elaine
review: Many costly errors on all their accounts that are slow to be corrected and cost the customer extra money in erroneous charges as a result. Also errors in reporting to credit bureaus which are also slow or nonexistent in being corrected. Do well to avoid this bank. Many Class action lawsuits in favor of customers abound .

name: ed
review: I don't understand your report since I now have confirmed that my payment cleared my bank three days ago , well before the due date of September 10, 2020.  This is unnecessary harassment .  This kind of a report is frightening to the elderly .

name: eliot
review: Great card, earnings rate on dining is solid and nice $200 sign up bonus after spending $1000. Very sleek design and high credit limit. Would highly recommend

name: Judith
review: I use it just for AAA insurance expenses.

name: Paul
review: Nice Morgage, never bothers the customer, always willing to put you first, they never hound you with emails or US mail crap. Try them they`re decent.

name: Lillian Mendoza
review: Very Disappointed. Due to Covid19 I had loss of income, Prior to Covid19 I had a great paying history, always on time,  I was going through hard times and U.S. Bank did not care about a good paying long time customer, they Closed my 2 Credit Card accounts, Will NEVER  do business with them ever again. The times I called to speak to a rep, not once did I speak with a compassionate agent, In these hard times is when I saw who really appreciates their good loyal customers, US Bank is not one of them.

name: Muhammad
review: secured card holder since 2015.I am still waiting for unsecured version of US Bank card...very very bad card if you want to rebuild your credit with this.I would like to recommend Discover it and Capitalone platinum secured card for rebuilding.

name: adkwinter
review: They suck.  Don't waste your time and money with this company.  I am buying an "as is" house.  I put 20% down already.  U.S. bank wants me to put a roof on before I buy it.

name: Celia
review: A+

name: Nia McLeod
review: Do not use! US Bank screws its responsible, supposedly "valued" customers who pay their bills in full & on time! Ridiculous fees!

name: judy eagle
review: US Bank failed to inform me that when you have promotions on a credit card,  even though it states an expiration due date, they will not apply payment to it if you have a promotion due after that date because I made this purchase at a later date.  All other charge cards don't care when you made the purchase, they honor the promotion expiration date.  US Bank doesn't care if it says expires 8/20/20 and you send them money to pay it off only to find out they applied it to the promotion due 9/20/20  Lack of information to clients.  This is a way of getting their interest.I will never bank at US after this experience

name: Violet Sigala
review: this is the worst bank ever. they arent helpful and locked my account multiple times but can’t find the reason as to why. can’t wait to switch

name: Louis V
review: New credit card issued by U.S. Bank. It has good rewards ( 1 point = 1 cent ). This is a selective card for people with excellent FICO score. It is among the best rewards credit cards. I want one next year.

name: lashawn
review: Terrible credit card.  Started off as a great card with a low interest rate.  A year after having the card,  I was a victim of identity theft. So the bank closed the checking account to prevent further damage and put a fraud alert on all credit accounts. Since they were on auto draft from the account, they  did not get a payment.  They never called to say they did not get paid, even after they tried  to withdraw the money twice. All my other creditors got paid and the account information simply changed to the new account except for them.  I still don't get that.   I got informed from a fraud alert service, that I had a 30 day late that suddenly appeared on my credit. I contacted them immediately and informed them of what happened with the bank fraud.  They refused to remove the 30 day late.  They reduced my limit to what I owed them which made it look like I had maxed out my credit card. They also raised their interest rate.  The only 30 day late payment I have had in years.  Terrible customer service. Not very helpful.

name: mnmatson
review: US Bank Mortgage department is a complete nightmare to work with. I have had my loan with them for about 10 years and have made every single payment several days before the date due, but I have unending problems with escrow. They demand copies of the building insurance policy yearly, but my agent has to submit multiple copies and have multiple conversations with them before they finally acknowledge receipt. They have demanded policies from the insurance company that insures a different property than the one on which they hold the mortgage. I had to call them to point out that the property address they listed in their letter was not the address of the mortgaged property. A year ago they sent a letter stating that they would no longer escrow the insurance premium on the mortgaged property and I would need to pay it myself. I didn't find out that this was an error until today when I called to ask why they were still escrowing the premium. By this time I had already paid my insurance premium and so had they. I had also called US Bank Mortgage two months ago about why they were still escrowing the insurance premium. I was on the phone for one hour and 45 minutes, was transferred 4 times, and finally gave up after being placed on hold by a customer service supervisor for over 30 minutes. Every time I need to call them I have to be transferred multiple times and there is great difficulty getting to the person who can solve the simplest problems.

name: gregconway
review: I believe US Bank committed fraud on my credit application. They have been completely unhelpful and made numerous false statements to me. I'm closing my business account with in my opinion these crooks. I'm looking elsewhere for my business banking needs now, and I would suggest you do the same.

name: James
review: I’m very happy to get approved for this card. The application process was very easy and I was approved instantly. Just so everyone knows they check transunion only. My transunion score is 764  . I was approved for 6,500 dollars. It’s not my highest credit limit on a card but I was still happy with the limit they gave me. I’ve had it now a couple months and I really like it. So yes I do recommend this card just make sure your transunion score is 750 or higher before you apply

name: Arvind
review: Easy to contact by phone or online, friendly 24 hr customer service, fast loan processing and super rates.Will use them or future automobile loan.

name: Armin Assadi
review: In my 20+ years as a business owner/operator, I have never experienced a more Uninformed, unavailable, unreliable, and infuriating group of employees to work with. If, as a business owner, you do six to seven figure transactions or international business of any kind, avoid at all costs because you will know more than any banker at US Bank will. Prioritize your sanity and work with a bank that can actually help and support you. Not create problems for you and infuriate you.

name: John
review: No problems,  I pay extra every month and like that you have the option of paying forward (or) principal reduction.  Website and APP are really easy to navigate.

name: austindurant9
review: I’ve been banking with them for over 6 years & They charged me 4 over daft fees on an mistake they made on the mobile banking app With my account balance and only gave me an refund on one over daft fee it wasn’t a full 24 hours the account went into the negatives to even start I wouldn’t recommend this bank to any one you guys take more money than you hold if I could close my account I would right now but I’m too busy waiting for you guys to process pending transactions right now

name: Daniela Williams
review: US bank me sent me an application with a confirmation code..I didn't even needed a credit card but since I thought it was already approved I applied on line.I got an error message and I just let it go I really could care less about having the card..Couple days later I got a message from Equifax that us bank had done an inquiry so I was little confused...I called the bank and they told me I wasn't approved and told me that it didn't matter that I got a code....So now I got a hard inquiry and no card...REALLY??This is the first time that something like this happened to me..What a joke...I have also a mortgage with them and I never missed a payment I am really unhappy with this story and I will try for sure to get a different mortgage with a more serious bank....

name: Giuseppe
review: This card is so easy to use and monitor that I wish I had higher limit to spend with and more rewards for either travel or points. This is my favorite card!

name: anthonye_39
review: Screw usbank horrible customer service and not doing what they are supposed to do I've never had a bank treat me the way they did me I wouldn't recommend them to anyone

name: Daniela Williams
review: Same here my friend the worst ever....

name: newworldtimmy48
review: Had a 3000 credit limit then they lowered it down to 250 without notice will never use again made payments on time never late I guess when I pay y'all off I'll go head and cancel I'll just find another jeweler to go to

name: Alan
review: It’s a great   credit card to have I recommend it to anyone trying to build credit. Professionalism is what comes to mind when taking about the customer service

name: Russ
review: I started with US Bank as a Rewards Card for Aero Mexico Airlines. They discontinued the association with Aero Mexico and sent me a new card with no rewards at all.

name: Chris C
review: **USB loan customers, simple daily interest - READ**USB customer for 15+yrs (CHK, SAV, CC + home equity loan) - unfortunately coming to an end thanks to USB looking out for their bottom line only. Why?1. I made a large lump sum principle payment. USB took $$ from this for interest? Only discovered by reviewing online payments - questioned, took 3 weeks to be reversed without reason.2. USB pushes us to setup automated payments to obtain a lower rate. They do this so they can easily increase their interest payment pull from the monthly  payment. How? They only allow this to be made on the due date, not the statement date. So as this outstanding payment sit's for 20 days, the interest is compounding, shrinking the principle amount shifting to the interest. WATCH your principle only paymentsCANCEL autopay and setup your own reminders to pay the amount due on statement date (refer to your statement). You'll see the difference.CONSIDER taking your business elsewhere. I am, moving CHK/SAV, cancelling CC and will pay off my loan 1 day after the required minimum.

name: Emily
review: I have not had any problems with us bank and they have been helpful when needed. They also had the best interest rates for what we needed

name: Liliana Woods
review: Hoping this helps someone make the right decision. Started our refinance app 4/2020 we’re now in August 2020. We’ve provided all the docs requested. All along through the app process have had issues getting a hold of my LO I was promised a call back by her Sup and it never happened. My advice go with a different bank. Considering cancelling my application. To bad I’ve already paid appraisal fees.

name: Imelda
review: Excellent online customer service! Setting up paperless billing, payment and navigating their website is super-convenient and easy. I especially like that you can turn the card on and off for personal reasons and identity theft protection. This card came with lots of perks esp being an REI customer! We’ve had this bank as well for our auto loans with great interest rates!

name: Katrina Fox
review: This company proved it is too large to provide individualized service. I was bounced to multiple loan officers with no real explanation, making it very difficult to complete tasks efficiently. Officers took days to respond and were behind with tasks, costing me time and a headache with every step. My officer was rude and often short with responses. I did not feel supported the entire process. This process is stressful enough and I felt I was being worked against, rather than with.

name: Larry
review: Paid initial amount and only have small about of 50 to 100 per month charged which is paid monthly. Good rating for this card as only had good working relationship. With it.

name: gtcprincipal
review: I called the bank regarding my late payment  and a representative by the name of Destiny assisted me. I must say that she helped me in this time of pandemic with the utmost courtesy and professionalism in the transaction.  I'm glad that she answered the call and would recommend her to other's.  Thank you Destiny.

name: diamondc3k
review: I am not a happy customer with US Bank. I spoke to a LO asking about rates to refinance a streamline loan going to a 15 year term and he going to tell me the lowest rate he can give me is a 3 875%.  . I am a FHA UW and they are giving a 30 yr fixed rate is 2.99% so why are they telling me the lost rate they can give on a 15 yr is 3.875...I will be contacting the VP regarding this matter.

name: cstrex
review: Had to activate my card 3 times. Then defective chip and it won't do tap to pay without fraud alert. Worst credit card I have ever had!

name: Carmenita
review: I love us bank they are amazing and Nanking with them is the best! They are very reliable and customer service is always helpful!!

name: Robert
review: Great Auto Lender. Easy to understand terms, monthly billing as well as speed in processing auto title work. They have very responsive employees

name: Genessa
review: great in a time of need. US Bank has amazing customer service!! I have always had a wonderful experience every time I have to talk to them

name: itwins91
review: Tried to close acct. we were forced to open to get home eq. (SEE other review) THIS IS A TERRIBLE EXCUSE FOR A BANK!!!!) We tried to close this account in the drive through as we thought the lobby was closed due to COVID. We were told we should have made an appt.--how would we know? They had trouble with their system so we asked for cash--it's our money we had let it go down to under $2K so we could close it--they were having trouble with their system but refused to give us cash--so we sat there for over 45 min!! It was a 2 hr. drive to that branch we had a 12h day with another appt. and things to do while we were in town. Once again--this bank screwed us for the LAST TIME.

name: Travis Hopkins
review: This is the biggest clown outfit of bafoons I’ve come across in a very long time. From the local branch in Jefferson City Missouri to regional manager based out of Illinois. These people are lost, as a matter of fact the sent me other people’s highly sensitive personal information through DocuSign that included income and the whole families social security numbers. Avoid this company and their employees at all costs. If I could give negative stars, I would. WORTHLESS!

name: Bud Baughman
review: NOT impressed with US Bank as trustee on the selling end of a townhouse purchase.  We made an offer nearly 2 weeks ago, that was above listing price.  We offered cash terms and short closing window. In the market where we live, there is presently a sellers market and a shortage of homes for sale.  When we made our offer we were aware that multiple offers might be made on this property.  Nonetheless, we received a verbal counter offer that was not acceptable to us, but our agent discussed the offer with the seller's agent and we were left with the impression that one key element of the offer would ensure an acceptable offer.  So we included that in our counter offer, confident that we were negotiating genuinely and would soon hear a positive response from the selling agent.  Nothing but crickets since then, over a week.  We learned today that it is suspected that the seller is playing multiple buyers, and will soon finally select the buyer they choose to work with and tell the others that their (counter) offers are declined.  Offhand it would appear that US Bank intentionally included a stipulation in their original counteroffer that they knew would be unacceptable to most potential buyers (VERY short due diligence period) so the buyer would make another counteroffer which the bank could then decline without another counteroffer.  We didn't agree to the short due diligence period in our counteroffer, so it became unacceptable for US Bank should they decide to accept another offer instead of ours. This process has prevented us from negotiating on other properties (since we consider ourselves ethically bound by the offer we have made, apparently not like US Bank's unethical practice of leading multiple buyers to believe their offer is genuinely being considered when in reality they are just holding out for the better offer just around the corner).  It has also left a bad taste in my mouth regarding US Bank and I will avoid future interactions with this company.I have an understanding of how to do my own online research to determine owners of properties listed for sale, and I will avoid dealing with properties showing US Bank as trustee or seller.

name: msladybabe01
review: I really dislike US bank! So far the worst bank I’ve ever banked with! I might as well be with BOA if I have to deal with the mess I’ve been dealing with! As soon as I get this deposit I will be parting ways of this bank! There not even available in all states and it’s called US bank how crAzy is that! I’ll advice anyone to stick to the credit unions if you have one, or get one!

name: af1859
review: The worst company in the world. During Covid-19, in the middle of the pandemic with business closings and hardships, they are unwilling to waiver a late fee. Payment was made 2 hours after cut off time but not willing to waiver a late fee. Shameful! Should stay away from this company at all costs.

name: hoffstem
review: I had an instance of credit card fraud. Someone who was not me purchased a ticket for a third party to South America. I pointed that out to them as soon as I saw my statement. Since then they have sent my constant tests and emails stating they are researching my claim. The texts pop up anywhere from 3:00 in the morning to 11:00 at night. I’ve spent probably 3 hours trying to get them to stop. They are incapable. It makes you wonder how screwed up the entire system is. And if they have a handle on how to control it. My next step will be to cancel my accounts and look elsewhere

name: Hattie
review: It’s easy to use and I get money back for using it. It’s Kroger cash. Which is fine with me. That’s where I shop.  They have a app you download on your phone and it so easy to pay your bill. No hassle. Very simple anyone could do it.

name: Tee X
review: Very low level customer service. Originator does not communicate with processor, and processor does not return emails or calls in ongoing loan application, when promised to do so.  No communication, no explanation, as long as a month with no answer to ongoing questions. Unprofessional and needlessly stressful. Have provided everything they need, emailed, the processor doesn't respond for a month, it's been over 2.5 months since this process started, I have to email them every 10 days and ask what is going on? I have banking relationships with Chase, Wellsfargo, Alliant, NewAmerican and others, USBank has been the most unprofessional by far.  I suspect USB stock is a strong sell.

so I've recently opened an account. And having problems with funds availability after making a paycheck deposit.   I've called 3.......3 times and gotten a different answer on when MY MONEY....MY MONEY will be available for use.  I had no idea a hold would be placed when I made the deposit.  That would have been nice to know.  I have bills to pay had I known that I would have done other things. I know the account is fairly new but the last check I deposited was available the next day.   Kind of making me re think using this bank

name: Angelo
review: Thank you US Bank for helping me with all i do with you guys. I can say this you all or on top of things and have good pople working for you all.  Thank you to all your workers that help me.  I give US Bank 5 Stars.  AC.

name: Dave Smith
review: This is a scam. You do NOT get fuel points when you get this card. You get REWARDS points that cannot be used for fuel.  I was told twice before I ordered the card that I would get fuel points for each dollar I spent. THIS. IS. FALSE.If you call U.S. Bank to ask about this, they will tell you that you have to talk to Kroger. No. I'm asking you about YOUR card and the fuel points I earn using YOUR card. They will then put you on hold and put you through to Kroger customer service. EVERY time you talk to Kroger about this, they will tell you, "This is not our problem. You need to talk to U.S. Bank about THEIR rewards point."When I got the card, one of the U.S. Bank CSRs told me he would connect it to my Kroger loyalty card, which I thought transferred the fuel points. Nope. You only get .25 cents a gallon off when you use 100 of your Kroger loyalty card points and pay with the U.S. Bank Kroger card.You do NOT earn fuel points using this card. A U.S. Bank CSR confirmed this today. Posters here who say they are getting fuel points (other than the .25 cents) are lying.

name: Jason Smith
review: I am/WAS a multiple account holder with US Bank - 2 checking accounts, 1-money market account, 1-credit card account, potential home mortgage account, 1-daughter checking account, 1-daughter savings account & 1-daughter credit card account. My problems have been mounting with US Bank: bad customer service, ridiculously long funds-holds on deposits, etc., etc. But recently I withdrew some money out of my money market account. US Bank wanted to know why I withdrew the money and I basically told them it was none of their business by saying the reason was personal. I guess they didn't like that answer so they closed all of my bank accounts and, in what I can only assume was just US Bank management being spiteful, they also closed my daughters account. US Bank's decision to treat me and my family badly has caused unnecessary stress, late payment fee's and delayed paycheck delivery. This is unacceptable US Bank! I spoke to a coworker yesterday and she experienced the same thing from US Bank a couple of years ago. US Bank closed her and her family's accounts without warning.Shame on you US Bank. Me and my entire family will never use any of your services again. I am in the process of cancelling my US Bank credit card as well.

name: doxley
review: We have been a US Bank customer for well over 10 years. Checking, Savings , Mortgage, Home Equity, HELOC, etc.  We have always had a great experience with them until recently.  I wanted to increase my existing HELOC approximately 15%.  I was told that I basically needed to reapply, which I did.  The experience has been a total nightmare. The local mgr. along with the so called loan officer were very unaccommodating, slow to respond, not very knowledgeable and refused to discuss concerns and questions, which is the complete opposite of what I experienced during my initial application process.  After weeks of frustration, I sent an email outlining my concerns and asking for assistance to the local mgr. where my application originated.  That was almost 3 weeks ago and I have yet to receive a reply.  I would suggest you avoid using US Bank to avoid unnecessary frustration and hassle, especially in the Cincinnati, OH market.  In the near future, I will be closing all accounts and ending my relationship with a company that shows no concern or appreciation for existing customers or customer service as a whole.

name: Tee X
review: Totally agree, same very bad experience.

name: Marvin Hamilton
review: $36 overdraft fee... I think this is absolutely ridiculous amount for something like this, $5 or even $10 is acceptable( specially during the pandemic ) but $36!? I understand other banks do you charge about the same amount and even then this is just way too much. Just declined the account simple I don’t lose money and you don’t look like a crook/bad bank.

name: jeanine
review: Do not open a business account with US Bank under any circumstances. Business services operate on "bankers hours" (East Coast), you can't pay yourself out of your business account, going "paperless" (which allegedly saves you money) can't be done unless you call a number (CRAZY), you have to create a personal account to pay with Zelle from your business account (insane!),  They didn't send us a debit card for 6 weeks and then got the address wrong. And customer service couldn't tell us how to pay bills online!  RUN DON'T WALK AWAY FROM THIS BANK!

name: Helen Fang
review: US bank overcharged my escrow account for property tax by 35% because they used the wrong parcel-ID for my house- they were charging me using another house’s tax bill!  They took $5967.31 out of my escrow for 2019 property tax of my house, while the tax bill of my house was only about $3800 and the City’s record showed they only received $3800 for 2019 property tax. Due to their mistake, my monthly mortgage payment ( mortgage + escrow) increased by about 28% every month since last June.  As a long time customer of US bank ( with two mortgages , one credit card), I was appalled at their customer service. I had to speak to SIX customer representatives today and finally the sixth one admitted they made a mistake - they used the wrong parcel ID for my house to charge my escrow( thanks to her).  The second representative was especially rude and unprofessional. After I identified myself and asked him to give me the Tax amount in US bank-issued 1098, he asked me “why do you need this”? Excuse me, aren’t you supposed to answer questions from customers? And the first person  I talked to in their tax department did not have access to my tax information or my 1098 so was not of help. Earlier this year,  I was also rejected a home loan, because US bank was using double standard counting income and expense, although I have years of on-time loan payment for my two mortgages with them and I technically can buy the house in cash.  They did not count my rental income in 2019 because that income was not in my 2018 tax return. But they counted a new debt in 2019 because one of my houses for sale was back in market.  I would advise anybody against getting a mortgage/loan from US bank.

name: John
review: This is US Bank, they are a very good bank to work with. After regular on time payments they say they will graduate card holders to an unsecured card.

name: Charles
review: Great card with great rewards love my us bank/Kroger  123 rewards MasterCard card is a must have for your wallet decent credit line decent interest.

name: Kemba
review: No issues.  I earn rewards and checks to shop at krogers.  I also earn extra points towards kroger and shell gas. Lots of coupons also.

name: Joe Joe
review: 10 years without a single increase.  Never missed a payment.  This week they sent me a notice that my already small credit limit was being cut in half.  Don't bother with this one.  Their website doesn't work most of the time and in general, this bank is a joke.

name: Ting Ting
review: I have been with US Bank for over 5 years, they all of a sudden decide to freeze my account because of 'fraudulent transactions' which in actuality, is just a simple transfer to one of my crypto wallets, that has been preformed out of this same account over 15 times before, and there have been no problems. However, as soon as I go on vacation and decide to transfer more funds to my crypto wallet, keep in mind, this is the same wallet that has been transferred to over 15 times, is suddenly flagged as fraudulent. Now I had no way to access my money whatsoever, and I called the fraud department explaining that they should not have flagged this transaction and they removed the freeze. This is where the problems should have stopped, however I go to transfer funds into the wallet and find that once again, the transfer will not go through because of my bank. This is outrageous treatment from this large of a financial institution. And if it couldn't get any worse, they froze my ability to transfer any money completely, as well as freezing my card once again. So now I am unable to even transfey own money to a useable bank account, while I am on vacation. This could not have come a t worse time I am outraged that I have been treated this way and fear others will be/have been already. I plan to cancel my bank accounts with them the moment I am back from vacation, incredibly disappointed at the lack of professionalism and trust on their own customers aga, yet again,

name: Scot
review: They offer a great variety of categories for 5% cash back that are unavailable on other 5% cards. You choose the category so there is less overlap.

name: ktmlogistics2015
review: Thought it was going to be a hood thinv. Had it bout year n a half. Never missed a payment. Paid it off and they lowered my limit by $3500 because they saw my credit acore drop a little even though i made all my payments and paid it off more then once. Just beware because they will do what ever they feel in necessary.

name: Anthony
review: No annual fee. Get 2% cash back even you user the card with yours phone's payment wallet. Get 5% for purchases made at REI. The cash back is in the form of REI Co Op rewards so you do either have to use it at REI or wait for a check the be sent annually. If you love REI though, this card is perfect.

name: Violeta
review: It was my very first credit card, Credit goes effective immediately after I pay,  Cons I still on the same $300 credit they approved 8 years ago

name: Amber
review: Thanks to US Bank on giving me the chance to prove I want to better my future... they call and check on how everything is going and if there is anything they can explain or help with

name: angldjhnsn
review: Cannot recommend. It's not for lack of giving U.S. Bank first, second and third chances with multiple accounts. Opened our business credit card in someone else's name.  Just a random person who then accused ME of identify theft for what the bank did. Asks us to upload docs that we download from U.S. Bank accounts to U.S. Bank for review on another product.  What? Like they don't them? Customer service agents hang up or dump call back into the queue. They don't care about their customers. That's for sure!

name: Salena Young
review: I left the required amount of money in a savings account to keep it open. $300. I hadn't used it in a while so they locked it up and started charging dormant fees. I called for days to get it unlocked and nobody would return my calls. I called the manager Joseph Dorman at the 6th Street, Springfield, Illinois branch and he was extremely rude. He asked why I even needed the money since I left it there so long! Unbelievable. It's my money. It's the bank! He didn't want my business and wouldn't remove the fees. A local bank is the way to go. Not this bank.

name: mberry2247
review: I want to switch banks but with everything that is going on its very bad timing.  I can't stress enough how poor my experience with this bank has been.  Their customer service might be some of the worst I have ever experienced.  I had two overdraft fees for example. like most right now I have been crushed by the current economy.  I was pretty much told tough luck and that there was nothing they could do.  This $60 some dollars for a huge bank was more important then me being a remember.  I spent over 20 minutes on hold to be given this short response.  It was almost like it was a huge inconvenience to even be talking to me.  If I handled a situation like this in my job I'd be looking for work elsewhere.  Save you self the frustration and pick another bank .

name: Jordan Moody
review: Recently finished up a lease with US BANK on a Jeep Grand Cherokee . No real issues during the lease but we paid to get things fixed up before taking the car back in, it was in tip top shape & under mileage by 4000 miles. They still charged the disposition fee &  no mileage credit for our pre-paid unused miles. It may have been contractual , but not the right thing to do. I called in and the response was “auto leasing isn’t for everyone” you know you’re correct , I don’t think it should be for anyone if they like keeping their money in their pocket.... I’m done with auto leasing for good as they just screw the customer at every turn and I won’t be doing business with US BANK in any form again.

name: Traci
review: My card from US Bank has been helpful.  I only use it enough to afford to pay in full monthly.  It has helped my credit score greatly.

name: kim_patterson1
review: I recently applied for the U.S. Bank credit card with approval. The U.S. bank held my car loan for 72 months in which I was never late for a payment and my loan is currently paid off as of 5/2020. With this in mind, I was late with my U.S,credit card payment on 2 occasions due to the effects of COVID-19 being a frontline healthcare worker. I conveyed this to U.S. Bank the reason for my lateness in payment. I received a letter stating due to my late payment, my revolving limit is decreased, which affected my overall credit score. Again, I notified the U.S. bank of my issues, I received a 21-page explanation and history of my account. In the end, a general statement from U.S. Bank "We regret to learn of the difficulties you have encountered as a result of the COVID- 19 pandemics" but based on the agreement the decision was still made to decrease my credit line that directly affected my overall credit score. I paid for my late payments with the assessed late fees applied. I find this action not empathetic, as a large company,understanding the struggles of their customers. As I have stated I am a frontline healthcare worker Registered Nurse still fighting the effects of COVID-19. This was an unintentional oversight to pay my bill on time.

name: Kaleef
review: Great Mortgage provider. Always willing to help with payment problems. Will give assistance information so you will have help when considering options.

name: richamiller65
review: I can not recommend these folks. I replied to every question within an hour. My credit rating is just shy of 800. Their appraisal  came in 45 k more than my debt.... before 20k in improvements.  I've been with the same employer for 4 years (25 in my industry).   I applied with them  because they're still running with covid .  I think they are just taking apps to drum up application fees.

name: deaters1980
review: After a few months of buying our house we were switches over us bank. Our loan person told us we have 15 daya to pay it after the 1st. Not even 3 days after the 1st i get calls about 3 to 5 times daily. Then when i answer they don't answer or hang up. Why call me if you wont talk to me. Yes i know need to pay my mortgage but give us our 15 day grace period then after that hound us. I do not recommend using them for your home mortgage.

name: porter39447
review: If u r a small business or not much income don't bank here they have misplaced my money on a few occasions (1000$) missing. They won't help with a credit card even if u have been with them for years all they care about is big wigs even on their website they show a picture of there app with a someone having almost a hundred thousand dollars in the bank so I would choose somewhere else to go than this piece of s*** company

name: Gabriel
review: this card does what you need. 0% interest for 18 (YMMV) months. the US Bank website looks like it's from 2006 but whatever. also US Bank is a little stingy about credit limits, but whatever

name: javier mendez monzon
review: i been with them for 15 years no complaints good service  high pay for credit card benefits and cash back bones almost  150 dollars every 3 months on purchase

name: lauravannozzi
review: Extremely inefficient and unreliable. We knew about the closing date for a month, and everything was done last minute, pushing the closing date by 5 days. I had driven from upstate NY to Alabama, paid for hotels, the movers had to move in my stuff on the day of closing. Extremely terrible customer service, never answering phone calls or emails. I’m informing the relocation company I work with to removed US Bank from their preferred lenders. Don’t ever use US Bank.

name: brittanydfox
review: A merchant forged a fraudulent receipt. US Bank did a very poor job communicating the status of the case with us then told us it was too late. Gave us absolutely no chance to defend ourselves. We even provided the correct receipt. The merchant agreed they were wrong. US Bank does not care. So long after 15 years of being your customer.

name: Lee
review: Too high of interest but was able to open an account when needed with good rewards towards grocery and gasoline purchases. They are not good about upping limits, though.

name: Darlene
review: It’s an OK bank. The branch in Sylmar is terrible.  The branch in Ralph’s Porter Ranch has great service. They are quick to help and do not act like you are boring them.

name: Steven
review: They have been ok! Interest rates high! They have been good to help in explaining things! Good communications! I haven’t had any problems!

name: Daven
review: Great card to use for ADT, PG&E bill as you can get 5% back.  You can aso use for your Xfinity bill and get 5% back.  You do have to activate the carefories quarterly and you can only select two categories to get 5%

name: JOSEPH
review: I love my FlexPerks Visa Signature joint credit card. Very low annual fee for a Travel Card which optimizes gas, grocery and airfare purchases. Cell phone bill purchased receive double points always. It is a very challenging approval especially without the banking relationship. My co applicant was instantly denied because of three inqs in one year (exploring purchase of second home) and no new cards or apps within five years. Her credit score was within ten points of 850. She qualified on manual review for 15,000 at the lowest APR. For comparison her Chase Sapphire which is 20 years old has a 40K limit. Use very careful judgment in putting in an application.

name: Joseph L
review: This is not so much a review as i don't have the card but I plan on adding it to my collection when I'm done gardening.  My credit profile needs beefing up a bit.  So the above review glances over the fact that you also may earn points my registering your Harley Davidson motorcycle at any shop, then you drive and for each mile you earn a point, so 2500 miles would be 2500 points and that's a $25 HD gift card.  So how many miles are you going to get out of your bike?  That could be a lot of extra rewards and make it worth the hard pull on getting this credit card for you if you have a bike.  That is all.  -Joseph L PetRiLJoe*edit 5/27 3:54pm Up to 50,000 miles per calendar year, $500 /year - still a good benefit on a card with no annual fee.

name: ofia02
review: US Bank reversed an electronic payment from my saved checking account from an external checking acct.  I have made numerous payments with this account so there was no issue with them not being able to take it.  I made the payment on the 19th with a due date of the 20th. Well today on the 26th I still noticed the payment hasn’t left my checking account.  I go online look at my account and they reversed the payment. ?Now they want two months of payments in order to make a payment online.  Now I have to go to a US Bank branch and bring my PYMT to them.  They tell you it’s not their fault I chose to make the payment online.  Seriously.

name: Rosell
review: Thanks for helping up to improve my credit. The customer service had been amazing. Each time that I called was a good experience for me. So, thanks again.

name: juichuyeh
review: I love US bank for their website and the services.  I wish we have US Bank around my area. I would switch all my account to US Bank.

name: Jas
review: I am very disappointed with US Bank and will no longer be banking with them after being a client for almost 20 years. In February we were 4 days late on a loan that we had with them for 15 years and therefore incurred a $29 late fee. Since USB had reversed ONE other late fee in the entire span of our 15 year loan (which will be paid off with our next payment), USB is not willing to reverse this $29 fee! This is after being on the phone for over 45 minutes and transferred to multiple departments. I found this to be absolutely terrible customer service during this COVID-19 crisis when many other banks are stepping up to help their clients regarding late fees etc. It’s always said to judge a business by how they treat their clients (and employees) during challenging times, and this says a lot about US Bank. I definitely do not plan to do business with them again, and will be closing the rest of my accounts. Shame on you US Bank.

name: Megan Jones
review: I have had so many negative experiences with US Bank over the years that I have lost count. They have unfair policies and have done things such as hold the funds of my paycheck I deposited on a Friday before an extended New Year's weekend (because I deposited my check after 2 pm), so I had no access to my own money for DAYS as the bank held it. They charge insane fees. I once accidentally overdrew my account by a few dollars and they charged a $36 fee. They basically prey on hard working people who aren't wealthy with their bad and predatory banking policies. This is clearly a bank that cares about rich CEOs and does not care at all about average people. Anytime I have called or gone in with a concern in the past 10 years, it has been unpleasant and my issues never got resolved. Truly a horrid company. I don't know why I haven't switched banks.

name: joeyfiedor
review: I have excellent credit, no missed payments, and have been an REI cardholder since 2013. Today, I received a letter stating that my account had been closed (effective ten days ago)! NO PRIOR NOTICE was given. I spent over 30 minutes on the phone and was transferred twice only to be told that “nothing” can be done. While this was not the credit line that I used primarily, it was a “backup” card. I am frustrated that no notice was given prior to closure. I do NOT recommend US Bank and will avoid using them in the future!

name: Teddy Jones
review: I've been a loyal HD Visa Customer for about 4 years now. I use the card to pay all my monthly bills plus travel and gas purchases. Harley just switched from the US Bank App and website to their own APP and website. The change is horrible. An unfriendly APP and when speaking with HD Customer Service, I was told to like it or use another card. They are loosing a really good customer.

name: mcmdean
review: I have yet to find out why but with a credit rating of 783! I was denied when I applied for their U.S. Bank Cash+™ Visa Signature® Card. I have two Amex cards, a Discover card and others.

name: Jason Angelicchio
review: Run as fast as you can!  Just can't say anything good about this bank, they are too large now and don't care about the customer.  Actually, I'd be surprised if they knew the definition of what a customer is!  Their customer service is very hit and miss, and their overall mortgage policies are very company friendly, not customer friendly.  I would run as fast as possible and get your mortgage through any other bank other than US Bank!  I will never give them another penny of my money!

name: dodofam489
review: Hello viewerI will like to educate you all more about an investment platform whereyou can invest funds and start earning 10 times your investment in 72 hours below is our investment package choose a suitable one so as to start earning$200 to earn $2,000 in 72 hours $300 to earn $3,000 in 72 hours $500 to earn $5,000 in 72 hours $1000 to earn $10000 in 72 hours $5000 to earn $50000 in 72 hours  To Start your investment now contact WhatsApp: +15022064419 Email: tradewithcarlos2156@gmail.com

name: Tim
review: Great card for great points!!!!!!!! You can not go wrong with reward points with this Kroger Master Credit Card. A++++++++ This is the best grocery reward point card on the planet!!!!!

name: al amith
review: Terrible customer service. I called to void a check and the customer service specialist couldn't help, so they transferred me to a tier 2 specialist where I waited on hold for 2 hours, so long that the repeating elevator music in the background stopped playing. I called from a separate phone where I talked to the customer service rep and explained what had just happened. I asked if they could please just let me talk to someone, but instead they put me back on hold where I waited on hold to talk to another specialist who that I never got a hold of.  So unhelpful and lack any desire to help their customers.

name: Beatriz
review: I do have very good experience from us bank. There are always there for any question. I do consider costumer service it is great as well.

name: Living Good
review: USBANK has "were here to help" during these tough times, I asked if they would reverse 1 overdraft fee, I've never asked this before. They said NO!

name: orlnme
review: Terrible support.  Website is complicated to navigate to find how to make a payment for your credit card.  If you don't have a checking account with them you are screwed. You need to have them send you paper work to fill out and send back so that they can know how to draft your balances.  This is the only card I have had this problem with.  If it wasn't for keeping my credit good I would cancel this card immediately.  So I'll do the next best thing, I won't use it for nothing.  Worst of all, calling customer service, be ready to spend an hour for support.

name: michaels_1247
review: the app is easy to use. The only thing that is difficult that you can't set up an outside account to pay the loan. I would recommend them fixing this so that it is easier to pay the loan

name: Robert
review: You have really cleaned up your app it’s a lot easier to use thanks, I use USBank app and really appreciate the easy accessibility to conduct mybanking

name: Alma
review: I love this card it’s improving my credit already and I haven’t even have it a long time I totally recommend people to get it especially if your credit is poor like mines was

name: Scott
review: Was quick and easy to apply. They have great customer support. If you use the card like they suggest, your credit will rise quickly.

name: Matthew
review: Have not had any problems with this bank.  Just a normal car lease that I pay on time each month.  Have not had any problems with this account.

name: jrose166
review: Do not lease through this bank. Upon return they will nickle and dime you with their independent inspection company AutoVin. I have leased vehicles for the past 30 years and have had zero issues upon return. I keep all my vehicles in pristine condition, including the one I just returned. Their definition of normal wear and tear is not normal. A minor dent the size of a dime and your on the hook for it. Which would explain the $244.38 charge I received upon return. Unsatisfied customer here. Stay far away from US BANK. Lease through dealer financing first if at all possible. Also US BANK has the added bonus of terrible customer service. Don't say I didn't warn you. Everything is great until you drop the keys off at the end of your lease.

name: mrangel9242
review: Too high of interest that's why we closed both accounts. At Ralph s they persuade you about this card which is deceiving dont bank with this company

name: Nicolas
review: I've been banking with US bank got years. I've had great experiences with them. No complaints . Thankful for a easy and fast banking .

name: pobox6484amt
review: This is card is the worst card ever. Customer is very rude.  I requested proof several times for an alleged mispayment. But U.S. Bank refused.

name: wlclifton
review: Six months ago I received a new escrow statement from US Bank with a property tax increase in excess of 70% of my previous years tax assessment.  Outrageous.  I have been trying to resolve this matter with U.S. Bank ever since.  Countless hours on the telephone on hold and talking to amazingly incapable and incompetent customer no-service.I am appalled at your company’s lack of cooperation, assistance, accountability or competence regarding this matter.  I have paid my home mortgage on time for more than 25 years and I’ve never dealt with a more unhelpful and disappointing group of “customer No-Service” representatives.Do not ever do business with this company.  They do not care about customers or resolving your issues.

name: james
review: Actually a Dillons visa card with way too high interest rate.  they won't lower rate for anyone even with 820 fica score.  All this has regulated it to a gas card because of Dillon points and an extra .05 cents off 1st gas fillup

name: Anthony
review: I have a 800 + scores on all three credit bureaus, and absolutely ZERO credit card debt. I recently applied for the US Bank Platinum Mastercard, and was approved, but it took about a week to find out.

name: Donna Bauer
review: I have worked with many loan mortgage companies and this has to be the worst. When they were processing our loan, they asked the same questions over and over that I had already answered. They asked for paper work I had already given them. They drugged there feet on processing even with an 850 credit score. Now I am trying to get paper statements for the last 4 months and they can not seem to make that happen. We will be moving our loan to another bank. I just wanted to warn people to think twice before using US Bank Mortgage services. I sure wish I had.

name: sshragg
review: Definitely has to be one of the worst reward credit cards on the market.  Customer service is awful, points expire.  I used some points to purchase Budget Car Rental certificates, and one place wouldn't take them and then I tried to use them again, and even though it clearly says to book online, they aren't valid for booking online, and then it costs more to rent at the desk.  In my case, 35% more.  So my $100 gift certificate was worth $65.  USBank wouldn't back it up in any way.  I gave them several opportunities to do something to make it right, and they never did.  There are so many options, stay away from this one.

name: Arthur
review: Late Fees 5.00 to process electronically takes 3 days.It not the 5 bucks..7days to process by mail .. late fees.They are bad with fees. I am stuck with them.

name: Magen Sodenkamp
review: during this crisis it is absolutely ridiculous and it's very obvious to me that usbank is not equipped or capable of handling its customers and or clients if I was the Utah department of workforce services I would pull all accounts from their service I've been on hold for the last few days over six and a half hours I have benefits already deposited to a card I have yet to receive and no customer service available this is absolutely ridiculous. No food and kids wtf.

name: timhubacek
review: There was  fraud and a bad check sent to my account for a scam attempt. The fraud department closed my debit card and said they will issue a new one. So far so good right? I talked to several departments and agents after that, and the story kept changing. A week later, they said they were going to close the checking and savings account completely. I thought it was a bit overkill, but was fine with starting a new account for protection. 5 days later, I go into the local branch to open my new accounts and the manager informs me that they "force closed" my account, meaning I cannot reopen an account at all.They are treating me as if I'm the one who committed the fraud and scam attempt. I was banking here for roughly five years and am a former Army Sergeant with no felonies, convictions, or even traffic violations. Perfectly clean record. This is completed B.S. I will NOT be recommending this bank to anyone, ever.

name: timhubacek
review: There was  fraud and a bad check sent to my account for a scam attempt. The fraud department closed my debit card and said they will issue a new one. So far so good right? I talked to several departments and agents after that, and the story kept changing. A week later, they said they were going to close the checking and savings account completely. I thought it was a bit overkill, but was fine with starting a new account for protection. 5 days later, I go into the local branch to open my new accounts and the manager informs me that they "force closed" my account, meaning I cannot reopen an account at all.They are treating me as if I'm the one who committed the fraud and scam attempt. I was banking here for roughly five years and am a former Army Sergeant with no felonies, convictions, or even traffic violations. Perfectly clean record. This is completed B.S. I will NOT be recommending this bank to anyone, ever.

name: Christopher M
review: Friendly and fast staff. At the local level they. Always know my name and glad I came. Security protect s like it should two thumbs up.

name: Donta
review: I absolutely love the credit card it’s been really improving my utilization and increasing my credit limit I know that if I stay on this path I’ll definitely be eligible for the regular credit card later this year definitely looking forward to it and I’ll try to remain within the bounds Of the 30%!!!!

name: Stacy
review: The greatest credit card ever. Will recommend this card to anyone I see in my family and it is awesome how you can use it at Kroger.

name: Jackleen
review: Great service! Highly recommend to whoever is looking to make some changes to their financial situation. Very satisfied with the banker!

name: Cerise Alexandria
review: I have been a customer for years but I will be ecstatic when I can break my association with them. I am sick and tired of them fiddling with my payments and changing when the withdrawals are posted just so they can charge fees. I have had over $200 taken out in this past week and I suspect things are on autopilot because I sent an email to them this past week when I discovered that I was overdrawn when my student loan payment (which had shown as pending the previous Friday) was taken out the following Monday when I had $15 left because of other juggling of my bills.I told them in the email that my work has shut down because of the current situation and that I really did not have the money to spare so that they could reap a profit. I have had no response to that email.So I escalated it and filled a complaint with the CFPB and mentioned the fact that the institution extorting fees from accounts in this current situation--especially when most other businesses are waving fees, is in very poor taste. I received an email from the CFPB stating that my complaint was forwarded to the company. No response as of yet but they charged me another fee.So much for being the ethical company they claim to be and considering they are one of the largest banks in the country, I cannot be the only one they're bleeding dry during a global health crisis. I have seen this company's true color and I will never recommend them to anyone.

name: none of your business
review: Once this whole virus mess is over I can assure you my mortgage with US bankI will be moving my mortgage to another bank who care about their customers in a crisis. US banks program of a 90 day grace period is a joke, as after the 90 days they are looking for those 3 months of payments in one shot. Of course if you cannot do that you will be jumping through hoops to modify your loan or set-up extra payments.
