Instead of just adding to the end of your loan those payments missed like Bank of America is doing and other banks are doing, US bank is too greedy to do that as that might help their reliable customers. No wonder they are doing poor and closing locations in Chicago. HEY CEO it's CALLED BAD KARMA!!!!!!!!!

name: shereen_habbal
review: So I deposited money for my dad yesterday because he, like many of us, isn’t working right now. I deposit the only $200 I have and then this bank blocks his card and says he can’t use it for a few business days?! This is over an $8 transaction by the way. Wow now I’m worried about how my father will survive since I live in another state?! Shame on you US Bank , it is obvious you don’t stand with your customers in times like these. My dad said the Customer service Rep Tachea was very rude, inept, and unhelpful. Worst of the worst, will be posting this on all my social media- but it does seem to be the common consensus about this bank anyway now I see why. Blocking people’s money, what is the point of your business? It’s my money I put in cash to his account he should be able to spend it! That’s just common sense. It’s not credit or borrowing from you but you put a block

name: Joseph
review: The U.S. Bank Credit Card is a excellent card . I would highly recommend this credit card to all new users. The customer service is excellent.

name: Nicole McKean
review: During this tough time around the world (Cornonavirus) I called to see if I could possibly  defer my mortgage payment due to loss of income in my household.  They have what is called forbearance. Yes they say! I can skip three months of my mortgage payment, great I'm thinking... Here comes the but... BUT they say on the 4 month I have to either pay it ALL back, apply for a repayment plan or modify my loan.  Which will have a negative impact on your credit. How is this helping?  How will I have $5800 in 4 months when I'm losing an income in my household due to a pandemic?  Glad to know they care about their customers!

name: ankurnv
review: ****NEVER TRANSACT WITH US BANK FOR LEASING A VEHICLE****The worst bank to transact with for buying out the lease of vehicle. I got into a lease agreement for my Ford F150 in 2017 with US bank. I made all the payments and the lease ended in Jan 2020. After that I purchased the truck from them. I applied for an auto loan to my credit union and they sent the check to US Bank. First US bank acknowledged that they recieved the check and everything is good. Later I was seeing my lease statements getting generated and showing I still owe monthly payments to US Bank and my lease account is delinquent. So they report it to credit agencies to screw my credit. Now they say that they have not recieved any check from my credit union. I am paying my monthly payments to credit union, but US bank is saying that they did not recieve any check. After the first inital call US bank told me that a document is missing from my credit union. I asked my credit union to fax that document to US bank, but still US bank is screwing me. I urge to everyone that never ever transact with the US bank in your life, especially for leasing vehicles. They don't have basic digital services to send and recieve documents via email, all processes are so ancient. I have spent hours and days to resolve this but it is still not resolved.THE WORST BANK AND SERVICES EVER - US BANK YOU SUCK.

name: aliciavantol
review: Legit the worst service I've ever had. They didn't release holds totaling over 200 dollars had me on hold for over an hour to say system is down and to call back. Why is getting money you've ripped me off  so hard so no I have to call back again even though they could've done that due to their error and the manager I spoke with Steven was a joke I'm some doing business with them.

name: Larry
review: Every card I have reports the balance on my statements to the credit bureaus except u.s. bank. They pick a random date every month and report the balance on that day.

name: Kidon Iran
review: Worst bank experience ever. Applied to open a business checking account. Officer said should be open in an hour or so. He never called back. I called to find out about the delay the next day, he said he will find out and call me later in the afternoon. Three days later he tells me everything is approved and asks me to come in and sign for the account but he will not be in so he made an appointment for me with another officer. I come in to sign and the new guy says he needs to call in for approval. He keeps me at the bank for about an hour and then tells me it will probably take until tomorrow morning and he will call me. As expected, he never calls. I call again and the new guy tells me they decided not to open the account. No reason was given. went across the street and opened an account in 45 minutes. Thanks for wasting my time US Bank! You are on my Blacklist for life!

name: sabbath08
review: Terrible company. Took months to figure out how and who to talk to and pay off my lease. Then they sent me title still in their name so had more fees to transfer it to my name. They would not expedite any of the process. Almost lost the car buyer cause of them.

name: Beatrice Severn
review: U.S. Bank is using the Corvid-19 situation as an excuse to lure in new customers to open new accounts. I've had U.S. Bank Visa and MasterCard for over 25 years. U.S. Bank just sent me an email inviting me to discuss solutions for hardships caused by CORVID-19 fallout. They offered 0% APR on a Platinum Visa (which I have) for 20 billing cycles. When I tried to use it to transfer a small balance from the MasterCard to pay it off slower and without accruing interest, it turned out to be a promotional offer available only to new accounts. To existing longtime customers? No help at all. Good time for profiteering, U.S. Bank!

name: Madilyn Lasher
review: I wish I could give them no stars honestly. I've always had problems with this bank. The most recent being a "glitch" in their system. I deposited a check and after a few days of it being approved they are now seeing that they "can't read the check" so it bounced. BUT I HAD TO LEARN THIS THROUGH A DIFFERENT SAVINGS APP. They didn't email me, they didn't call me, and I rarely check my account because I haven't had this sort of problem before. I was lucky I had enough in my account where I wasn't scrambling to find funds to make it up. Their hotline is good customer service I will give them that, but their bankers just try to upsell you everything. I was there for almost 40 minutes one time just trying to get my husbands named added to my account, but no they had to make me open a new account, which lead to 40 minutes worth of questions when it all could have been avoided with what I originally wanted. Their bankers are just pretentious when it comes to customer service. Every year I swear they upcharge the overdraft fee as well, because when I first signed up it was only about $15. Now its almost $40 and when you only go over by a few cents it really sucks. Especially if you aren't check the app every few hours to actually know whats going on in your account. I don't understand what is going on over there and their mobile app just makes everything worse.

name: Ilea
review: I have been very pleased with the services and rewards made available to me from US Bank! I'm especially pleased with their customer service department! I'm one happy customer!

name: ajitc
review: It was error by US bank. I thought that they take care oflate fees when I paid my balance alfer dicussed with their agent. Next time when I called to remove as I was promiaed, agent was very rude as well her supeevisorI paid the balance of $79 after discussing with US Bank So it is solved and fix it

name: William
review: Cannot use mobile device without first setting up banking information through a main computer. The layout of their Splash screens and orders that they ask you to do thing is not easy to do.

name: stat11
review: Harley has advertised all over their magzine you get $175 gift card afyer spending $500 but US Bank wont issue more than a $150 gift card.  US Bank forces you to prove it to them when they admit they already know about the error!  Its just a way to cheat customers by US Bank!  They suck.  Rates even w top credit score are a rip off plus thwy offer not fraud protection!  WTF?  What cards dont beside this sorry card?  Skip this card!

name: Ralph S Fink
review: I do not recommend not banking with them because of my experience with the bank. 2 times they accepted my information for opening a checking account. The first time I was declined for the bank account. The second time I was accepted for the account deposited 25 dollars that was required to open it up and I went to get some money out of the account I found that it was closed 4 days later after it was opened and was told I need to call the main branch they said talk to the branch where I opened up the account all the person could say was read page 26 that explains the reasoning for the account closure. If I was able to open the account then why did they say I did not meet the Requirements?

name: Rosalyn
review: Outstanding service of the best kind was delivered every time a representative assisted me with my concerns. Very pleased with the professional customer service I’ve received

name: Joa
review: Us bank is a very good bank best bank to bank with the tellers are very polite  and the bank is always clean they are always ready to help you

name: Anika Dashay
review: Dont bank thru them unless ur rich!! I banked with them for 5 years and they could care less about u. They denied me of loans credit cards and everything and my check goes to them faithfully  and they denied me for overdraft protection

name: richardd_258
review: I enjoy the cash back categories, it saves me a fair amount of money. I recommended this card to any that look for cash back benefits

name: Jon Dough
review: False advertisement about checking account $300 bonus: made two deposits totaling more than $2000 in Dec 2019. Three months later, I called 24/7 service and got no help. Then I called local branch, and after two hours of "brief hold," I was told my deposits aren't qualified. Wasted my time and lost interest earnings. This bank will wane and die. Congrats, you have a lost a client forever.

name: Catherine
review: Opening a secure visa debit card with my USBANK was the best thing it helped me raise my credit points from under 300 to well over 650 in just a year and a half. Makes me very happy.

name: trevans159
review: Please heed my words and do not open anything with this bank or you will regret it.Here’s my story and honestly told:I have two checking accounts and two credit cards with US Bank and until I made my first “check” deposit using the mobile app, I did not have any issues with them. Given I only use the checking accounts as my personal spending accounts since this bank is not local for me. My main accounts I have are elsewhere, but I wanted to test the limits of this bank since I was considering them for a prospect mortgage. So, I decided to test my limits with the US Bank checking accounts and really give this bank a try before possible moving everything to US bank. I did this by making a deposit into both of my accounts at the max daily limit. Which was 2,500.00 in one checking account and another 2,500.00 in the other checking account. Another full disclosure, this was the first deposit I made. Because again, these accounts were not my primary account and I really wanted to test my limits. I anticipated the obvious, “a hold”. But, since the checks I deposited were local and a largely known bank, I didn’t anticipate a 10-day hold. All and all, I was fine with that. Until not only did they not inform me of the hold, they disabled my online and mobile access, locked both my debit cards, and even after the 10 day hold and long after the checks cleared/funds obtained by US Bank, they still kept these status on both my accounts.  At this point, I’m pissed! Because I have now called US Bank three times now. The first time to inquire why I can’t access my account. A second time five days (3 business days) after I knew the check should have cleared US Bank. Which in fact did, and US Bank confirmed and offered to transfer me to the fraud department to have the hold taken off. But I didn’t have time to speak to the fraud department at that time and was told that the hold was fall off after 10 days. So, I decided to just wait. So here it is, 11 days of not having access to any of my accounts, funds reflecting in US Bank, and still no access. I called customer service to ask why the hold didn’t fall off automatically. No answer. I asked him to please remove the hold since clearly the checks aren’t fraudulently. He answered, “we here at customer service have limited access and can’t remove the hold”. I further explain the situation and ask, why wasn’t I told this from the other two people I’ve spoken with. And then I proceeded to the next basic request, please transfer me to the department that has access to remove the hold. His response was unfortunately, you will need to go to your local branch in person to have this removed. I informed him that this bank is not local. He replied, they “may” be able to help you over the phone. He further read generic responses as why he can’t help me as well as refused (I asked at least 7 times) to transfer me to management. So, let me summarize. At this point, US Bank is basically holding my account on lock down without any cause or reasoning, still without any access, refused to take the off the hold of my money, refused to give me an explanation of what’s going on, refused to transfer me to management, and only thing I got was a phone number to branch that I’ve never been because the account was opened online. This is a very long review and my first review I’ve ever written. But this bank is so horrible, it literally drove me to write this review. I couldn’t rest without getting this voiced and hope no one else have to experience this unnecessary &amp;#*!.Oh, if you’re wondering if this resolved, I’ll be calling the branch tomorrow and shortly after closing everything I have with them. I definitely have my answer to whole test!! Bypass this bank if all possible!!!!!

name: marianellanovoa
review: I've used them for far too long because of convenience. Interest rates are too high, ethics are very low. Their ATMs have eaten up my deposits twice and they make you file a claim that takes FOREVER.  What happens if you need that money? They don't give you credit the same way they don't hesitate to charge you a fee. Plus I recently read that they fired an employee for giving a stranded customer a 20 dollar bill out of her own pocket for transport.

name: Kaili
review: It's a good card seems slow at building its through a bank. Good way to start building your credit. Theres no interest if you pay off every month

name: Van Do
review: A friend recommended their mortgage so we gave it a try.  I love to support the smaller company because I want more competition in the market.  Looking back the few dollars we try to save ended up costing us more than using bigger bank.  Mortgage process was a big mess.  I shouldn't have but I gave them a second chance.  The second time was even worse and we ended up with another mortgage company instead.  After approval, how can you deny the loan?  Their front end and back end mortgage people don't work well together so at the last minute we ended up loosing one of the house we liked.  We did ended with a better house six month later but I imagine if you don't have the resources we do it would have been pretty sad.  We had income and cash that we didn't use for the mortgage application since their us bank mortage specialist said my income and smaller down payment alone was enough.  They didn't tell me that they were going to deny my loan and not tell me and stop responding to my call at the last minutes of closing.  Unbelievable!  From my experience that I learned stick to the bigger bank.  They are bigger for a reason!  Trying to support smaller community bank didn't save money or time or make me feel good after all the headaches and little fees that they are trying to get you for.

name: Van Do
review: We start a checking account with them because of slightly cheaper mortgage payment.  That was their promotion use their morgage and open checking account and you save a small amount of monthly payment.  They are supposed to not charge monthly fees but after a few month all the sudden they charge for who know how long.  I am talking probably a year or more.  When we caught it, they only refunded 6 months when it is clearly their fault to begin.  The fees and the way they set it up like charging you a monthly then refund it make it harder to spot them after a few month of keep refunding you then stop.  Transfer to other bank are harder and longer.  I had time when I withdraw and they didn't have enough cash and offer a cashier check but they forgot to tell me that even if it is their fault for not having enough cash they charge me for the cashier check.  I had multiple bank account from chase, bank of america, wells fargo and us bank.  At first glance, it seem like it isn't too bad.  Their fees seem to be lower, their minimum balance is lower.  After using them for a while you will quickly learn that, they have all these small fees and the inconvenience quirks quickly added up to not worth the savings if there is any savings at all.

name: chosen37
review: 20+ year customer, multiple accounts,  they have closed all nearby branches (nearest 110miles away) I have $12k in monthly direct deposits. I recieved a check by mail over the $2500 limit to take a picture and deposit ,I  called and was told no problem they would double it in 3 to 5 business days, later unable to deposit it I find all the request were sent to a home branch that had been closed months earlier. On that call I was assured that in 3 to 5 business days the problem would be taken care of...17 total day later it is still in the hands of a closed branch and I am opening an account in a local bank and moving all my accounts. Every customer service person I spoke with was friendly , polite,  professional and I have no issue with them it is the policies of this Bank that has sent me to do business elsewhere .

name: kbkimes
review: Transferred money from PNC bank.  Initiated transfer through US Banks online portal.  The funds vanished from PNC yesterday.  According to US Bank I cannot have my money for 3 days.  US Bank has my money.  They acknowledge it.  But will not let me have it for 3 more days.  If I had simply written a check from PNC Bank, and then did an online deposit they would have given me the funds the next day (assuming done on a business day which it was).  I am a former employee with and currently am a center of influence for a large Foundation.  I am telling everyone I know what I experienced.  They are currently holding my money, making money off of it, and they will not give me access.  This is 2020.  Customer service is making a comeback.  Screw them!!!

name: zupernivrej2
review: They won't remove the PMI even if you reach the 78% remaining of the balance. They insist that the only way to remove it is thru refinancing.

name: Stephen Baker
review: Us bank is great as long as you want to be charged to cash a check drawn on the bankCustomer servicer is not to be found here.  Just disserviceThis bank is a ponsi  scheam pulling little tricks to milk you dry

name: Nick Travers
review: This was my first credit card, and it is not a great card at all. I’ve had it for I would say around 9 years. They’ve never once allowed me to increase the limit. I have problems with purchases with it all the time. I’ve had them replace the card with a new one, and surely enough it still declines all the time. It’s completely unreliable no matter what the balance on it is. I’m not sure if it’s a processing issue where it takes along time to process the payment and reflect on the cards balance, but if this was my only card it would’ve left me stranded at the gas station many times. There are a lot better options out there for cards.

name: stefanieruoff
review: US Bank is a joke of a mortgage company. Every month we pay our mortgage faithfully online, and every month they have something new to try and make our payment late. It has ranged from system down for weeks at a time, our payment info disappears after it’s put into the system so we have no way of knowing if it processed, to so many other things. Tonight was the last straw. When we went to make our payment the system would not let it post today saying Friday was a weekend. The payment is due tomorrow, which is a Saturday, and Monday is a holiday. They would not allow to even pick a date that wasn’t for another 4 days!  US Bank has sent no correspondence to us making us aware of this change and now want to stick us with a late fee. I would seriously be interested in working with a law firm to stop these predators from stealing money.

name: Robert B
review: You can really take advantage of the cash back rewards 5% on Fast food and CATV bills.  There are other reward choices but this works best for me.

name: dscott237
review: Poor quality service high payments fees for no reason automatic withdrawals from ur account and it’s pretty much a scam to come here they make money because u go broke

name: Dan Schlemper
review: My value to mortgage ratio is well below the 80% loan to value. US Bank partnered with a bad appraisal company and won’t release it.  I’ve paid for three appraisals, two of which value the home well under the 80% loan to value. Their appraiser has it around 85%. Looking for a new bank.

name: James V Keller
review: card associated with mortgage lender. This card is very secure due to  USBank monitoring my transactions and notifying me of any suspected fraudulent activity.

name: Kris Duttlinger
review: Terrible customer service, my credit card payment was minutes late and they've charged me $68 in fees. I've asked for a courtesy waiver because I can't afford to catch this up but they keep adding more and more fees

name: Jose Q
review: Super awesome and really love the opportunity I had with them at us bank. I appreciate the advice and honor to be part of the family.

name: Wesley
review: Great card! Excellent rewards and service!! Easy credit increase experience! Great account start up rewards!!! The phone app is great!!

name: tabithaboyd79
review: I purchased my home 2 years ago. US Bank is the holder of my loan. Since my purchase they have yearly increased my mortgage payment . Placed forced insurance and never notified me. I was unaware of any concerns with my Mortgage insurance. The mortgage company has has increased my payment in total of 563. Initially the original increase was due to an increase in my taxes, so I placed a Steadfast on my property so that my taxes were projected to be 788. However they charged me 993. The mortgage company has all of my contact information (email, phone, mailing address) the mortgage company did not assure that I was giving the adequate information within a time frame to adjust any and all issues. In addition the rep states the initial insurance company had an underwriting issue and the policy was dropped 3/31/18. Again, please remember I NEVER received notification. The rep stated a letter was mailed on 1/29/19, I questioned (why would it take 10 months to mail a notice?) no answer given. I requested to speak with a supervisor and was denied, the rep for the team lead on the line and then I asked him 5 times to get a supervisor in the line. At which point the line was disconnected.

name: Glen
review: I haven’t received the Card yet and they say I have a balance of $29.00 ? I applied for the card in Dec they took it upon them selves to send the card to the wrong address  . I had a secured before they didn’t look to see I had a different address they just assumed everything was the same

name: Patrick
review: US Bank stands in violation of Minnesota consumer protection laws. USURY is illegal in Minnesota. It is illegal to charge consumers over 6% interest. USBank has done this. The debt is paid in full. USBank farms out itscases to states like South Dakota which does not have strict consumer protection laws.

name: ahmedchronic
review: So it beings, I opened an account with usbank and got approved. I even used my preferred customer card to make transactions at a local grocery store and everything was going right. Literally the next day I tried to deposit money into the ATM at the same branch I opened the account in and it declined my card. Fast forward I came to find out my account was closed for no apparent reason. Nothing fraud no previous problems with prior banks just a new customer looking for a bank that would set up my financial life. The branch manger said that I would have to wait for a check in the mail from the bank because my account was closed. So that’s probably going to be another 3-4 business days til I receive my “money” in the mail. You feel pretty hopeless and weak in situations like this because the banks really don’t care about you. They just show you That they’re in charge when it comes to YOUR money.

name: Kathleen
review: Always promptly apply rewards, and never any kind of hassles, or refusals to pay, because of suspicious activity for major purchases.

name: Alyssa G
review: If you research them, you will see they were fined millions for adjusting people's accounts; basically moving money around to make nsf fees. Guess what? They are still doing it. They say they charge a maximum of 7 nsf's and that is wrong. They recently got us again at the end of the year and charged 8, and then their "extended" nsf fee just to get more money out of you. You can never change the monthly automatic savings withdrawal, which they make you do to take your banking fee away. You can also never call or visit another location as they said you didn't open your account at that one, and can only talk to the actual location you opened your account. If you need a different location, you actually have to open another account and close the original. They are always rude, never work with you on nsf fees even if you try to show them how they manipulated your account to make more fees on the lower amounts that supposedly came in afterwards. Run. Just run. We are now considering Capital One and Chime for our new account as we cannot deal with this bank anymore. We have had them for at least 5 years and have never been happy. Ever! You can't even choose your own login info, they set that up.

name: steven_vho
review: Stay away from this bank, they are thieves!  I had an escrow account for my home mortgage with them and they collected every month up front.  Recently I refinanced my mortgage with another lender and paid off my mortgage with US Bank but the money sitting in my escrow account is not released.  I have made 7 calls and still nothing happens.  They hold my money hostage!!!!  Stay away.

name: Don Wilcox
review: They jacked my rate to over 20% without warning say they sent me a letter informing me months ago. Since I pay my bills on time and by balance is below 30% of credit limit, I was shocked. When I called them to get it back, they said they do not have any "promotional rates" available. Today I closed my savings and checking account with them. I will pay the card off in 3 months and avoid them. There are too many other options in my local market. My local credit union (AK FCU) is a far better choice. Originally stopped doing business with them when they messed up my mortgage escrow. Took 3 months and 12 calls to get them to finally correct their misapplication of funds to someone else's account. When I refinanced a year later I specifically avoided them. Unfortunately a year later, by loan was sold back to them, which is what "re-established" me with them."

name: Shelley
review: I love this credit card becase its easy 2 use and there is no annual fee 2 apply for it. I also love it because it has different designs 2 choose from. It is 4 anyone struggling with credit issues it has online banking

name: Raphael Bernstein
review: I didn't receive the first invoice on my car loan, they admitted it sometimes happens with new accounts, and yet they reported it as a late payment to the Consumer Reporting Agency! Upon calling I was told that the contract included the Monthly payment and I should have been alert and sent it in even without receiving the 'courtesy  invoice'. That is not reasonable.

name: Leah Jahnke
review: I made a payment and this low class bank cashed the check and proceeded to charge me a late fee and NEVER credited my account even though they cashed the check Way before it was ever late.  They still haven't credited my account they are thieves!!!!

name: Marcia
review: They are great and watch for fraudulent spending and always answer all of my questions there is someone to help me with questions and I love my financial advisor who helps me out when I was hacked they paid back all the money that was stolen from me

name: no thanks
review: Id give you no stars if it were my choice. You screwed up my mortgage then denied it, customer service is nothing but a wall when trying to get things corrected. Still missing $300 from my escrow. I just spent $3k to refinance to another bank so YOU LOSE MY $350 a month in interest, and EVERY DAMN PENNY WAS WORTH IT. You guys are nothing but thieves. You seem to fit right in with how the government works, liars cheats and probably a bunch of pedo's. You are a disgrace to the United States, you should NOT have that in your name.

name: brow0203
review: I have had checking, savings, and credit card accounts with US Bank for decades, but this week I am thinking about taking my money and going to a different bank. The reason is that I have had to call the bank 3 times to ask when my soon-to-expire credit card replacement will arrive. I was told on the 3rd call to give it one more day and call back if it has still not arrived. In the past, expiring credit cards were replaced well in advance without having to call to inquire. Many monthly auto-charge merchants are contacting me asking for my new credit card information (Apple, Paypal, health club, online publications, etc.). The whole thing has been a real nuisance. I wish US Bank would go back to sending the replacement cards 2 months before they expire--my estimate of how far in advance they used to send them. If I have to call them a 4th time, I'm closing my accounts and going elsewhere.

name: hancockfranklin
review: I always pay over the minimum by at least $75 and in each of the last three quarters my interest rate has gone up. They absolutely DO NOT want you to get your balances down or paid off. Tried to talk to customer service on two occasions, that's a joke. I've been with US Bank for 18 years. Closing all my accounts. I'm done.

name: cdingmancaroldingmancdingman
review: Hands down the WORST customer service I have ever encountered. Rude, inexperienced and always full of excuses when they make a mistake. Never again. I'm taking my business to another bank.

name: Sara Rothman
review: I had the FlexPerks Visa since it switched from being the credit card for Northwest Airlines back about a dozen years ago.  I wish that I had replaced it years ago.  Their customer service ranges from acceptable to miserable.  I have had many challenges with traveling, even out of state.  It's a joint account and I've had them lock down my card when my husband is in another part of the state.  And trying to deal with their points is a real hassle, particularly when you compare it to American Express and the Chase Sapphire Visa card.  Those cards make the experience seamless.  Not Flexperks.  They are just too much hassle. Other cards have much better customer service and amenities.

name: Tammy
review: Great card.  Good rewards,  gas & dollars back on groceries.  I wish interest could be lower,  waive a finance charge every now & then

name: tbenoit1970
review: This has to be the worst bank and a thief, They sent the payoff in writing now the want 81.00 more dollars. they have done this twice you just cant pay these assholes off.????????

name: Brian Nate
review: Not as ethical as they say they are.I've been banking with US BANK for years. I had a 401k Rollover into a IRA. The wealth associate recommended me AGTHX. He took advantage of my inexperience because the fund is 5.75% front load with a .65% expense ratio on top of it. To make matters word the Fund has been under-performing the S&P 500 index for the past 5 years... I'm sure I funded his kid's braces with that transaction. How can any ethical company get away with that and call themselves "ethical"?  Maybe the guy use to work for Edward Jones or some other crooked establishment ramming AGTHX down new naive investor's throats. Oh well, you live and you learn.Don't invest here unless you're just doing a  US Bank Self-Directed Brokerage account (The mobile app and website are pretty good). These wealth advisers are just like half the banks these days, taking advantage of the inexperienced by selling them mutual funds that line their pockets instead of actually looking out for the client's best interests.US Bancorp doesn't like the word "index" here. See where I'm getting at? Fire them promptly and sail with Vanguard. It's never too late to get out of the sinkhole that is US Bank Wealth Management and invest in a world where you aren't getting fucked six ways to Sunday.

name: boomenone
review: Opened an acct because my payroll check is through US bank and wanted funds available immediately instead of waiting. Stood in line to deposit check and one of the cubicle ladies walked up to me offering me not to wait if I wasn't getting cash back so I accepted. Made the deposit and went back to work. Checked my balance an hour later to find out I was negative the amount of my check. Called us bank and told them the situation. They responded that they couldn't do anything because my acct was on hold due to fraud prevention. Needless to say, I had my rent payment due that day. Had to wait 3 days to get problem fixed and here I am today having to wait on funds because their system is backed up from the new year. This bank is a joke!!!

name: Saturnino
review: Crappy cards not worth a crap. Bank has issues from time to time with internet or pulling your information up to get money out. Canceled my accounts there

name: zvixon2010
review: It would be nice if u had a site as easy to use as discover they really have there site so user friendly. I want to be able to pay my card on time and same time every month with ease and discover is the easiest app i use bar none.

name: Jordan Larson
review: REAL U.S LIKE US BANK. THEY ROB YOU GO SOMEWHERE ELSE.The absolute worst bank in america. Dont go through us bank they rob you and take your money regardless. Have overdraft protection still cost money to protect. A Customer service lady i talked with even said she does not agree with the policies and agreed that i am getting robbed. If i wasnt pay check to pay check like most americans i would pursue legal action. I used the atm outside to pay for my stupid FEE now i cant close my account because the CASH SOMEHOW IS PENDING AN THE TELLER INSIDE SAYS I HAVE TO WAIT 3 DAYS TO CLOSE MY ACCOUNT.

name: kd88976
review: Horrible horrible card and terrible customer service. I paid on the due date but it was after 6:59 and got a late fee. I called customer service and they are not going to take off the late fee. I do not recommend this credit card.

name: Edna
review: Thanks for the 5% cash back rate: hadnt used it much but sure plan to from now on. 5% 2% and even 1%  cash back on items ranging from groceries to fuel; all with 0% apr for the first 12 months-as long as $500 is spent initially

name: Quadonda
review: They opened me a card without my permission,  however when I called them to close this account I didn't open they did it immediately without a problem. I appreciate them just closing it without any problems.

name: clark123113
review: Do Not Waste your time with this company i wasted 15 years banking threw this company and various hours on a regular basis during those years on the phones trying to fix issues in my acct with them.

name: Joyce
review: I use this periodically for meals. I like it because it is associates with my bank where I do business and I always pay it in full.

name: Jeff Katz
review: Your overdraft policy is ridiculous. You think a large company would be able to handle a small overdraft  when I have plenty of money in other accounts in your bank. I simply lost track and forgot to transfer funds. Never overdrafted before and I won’t again because I’ll be moving my money to a different bank. The least you could do is notify the customer if he’s over drafted instead of just racking on overdraft fees each transaction. I hope you enjoy the robbing of my 36 dollars, you could have made more over the years by just being decent enough to keep my business. I will also be spreading the word about avoiding business with US bank. Hope this is all worth the overdraft fee you collected from me. US bank is the definition of greed.

name: Allen
review: Went to cancel, instead kept, because card services offered incentive, incentive made keeping the card worth keeping at least another three months.

name: Dennis
review: Fought for over a year to have fraud credit hit removed. Closed my account. I pointed out the fraud. Do not bank with them. Stoped them from sending fraud card out. Then they forgot the word of the bank. No right. Bad bank

name: James
review: This is a great credit card it helps your credit. I pay on my credit card online with the app. This is one of the best cards to get

name: Ashley
review: I wouldn’t recommend this card. The rewards rate is only .5 points per dollar. It’s basically useless. I would have to spend so much money and wait ages to have enough points for anything, especially since the minimum to redeem is 5000 points. There are much better no-annual-fee cards out there with better rewards. Use them.

name: Miguel
review: Sweeps money into “suspense” account when you pay in advance for the next month.  So when you think you’ve paid.   You’re really charged a late payment.  Horrible costumer service

name: Denis Vas
review: Just got my card in mail and tried to activate it. Not a biggie right? Wrong! Their app rejected data I entered. Okay, called their card activation line which after I entered my card number put me through to an agent, who asked my card number and transferred me to a voice mail.  Okay, called them again, automated system sent me to an agent again, gave my name and card number again, got transferred to another agent. Waited on hold for 30 minutes (oh my, do you absolutely have to repeat that your agent will answer my call soon every 30 seconds?), gave my card number and name again to be told to call back In two days (on Monday) because they only activate credit cards during business hours? I haven't used their card even once yet, but I am already annoyed with their level of customer support.

name: no thanks
review: It ONLY gets worse. Cut the card up before your missing hundreds!

name: superskramman
review: It was good the 1st week of being a new customer at us bank.  Then I made a mobile deposit for $250 that was a gift from grandpa for Xmas.  Received email that it was accepted.  If course I knew it would take a few days to clear. But this is what US Bank did instead.  They locked my account completely up.  I couldn't log in on apc or the app on my phone. I couldn't even call to get a balance from the automated system.  I couldn't buy gas for the car that morning.  After I call and find out they locked my account completely so I have no access to my funds, my money. They claim the account is new and this is to prevent fraud. So why not just hold the check?  I'm not even notified that my account has been locked up and I can't even use my debt card or log in.I highly suggest you seek out another financial institution.

name: Bruce Scharf
review: Credit card services are absolutely horrible. The people don't know the product and give out bad information. Customer service does not try to please the customer.made many mistakes that cost me lots of money . Open your account with another bank stay away from this poor excuse for an institution

name: jashley1213
review: They treat me as if lm a thief and they are doing me a favor instead of respect as a customer. Avoid this bank for business accounts

name: lgbontheroad
review: Issued a counterfeit $50 and refused to be held accountable for their poorly trained teller. Checking and savings customer for a number of years.

name: Robert
review: U S Bank is the Best They will have my business account when it goes online I will set up account which will be a direct deposit account.

name: Nathan
review: This was my first credit card, it helped me understand the importance of finance managing especially sense the full amount of credit came from my own cash

name: Amy
review: I was never given the chance to use it because I was never sent one and I didn't know i had one frankly so I'm sorry i cannot tell u much

name: Alice
review: So far great the process was easy.  I like the app on my phone and the customer service is great when you call very nice and knowledgeable so over all very happy

name: babyoku988
review: Horrible when it comes to fraud! I’ve been waiting 3 MONTHS to get my money back from a check fraud when they told me 10 days and already arrested the lady in the first month.

name: Elizabeth Morgan
review: The credit limit does not increase even with good credit and consistently pay payments before purchase and it is continually declined. What is the point of having a credit card when you can't use it and then pay the amount back the same month. I would not recommend this company credit card.

name: Carlos
review: Great for daily expenses and get miles from AeroMexico, if you travel a lot down there then this is the credit card for you, and has a decent anual fee

name: nixonouray
review: This card works at our Kroger affiliated grocery store at home, but rarely anywhere else. We, too, have spent hours on the phone with both US bank and Kroger. Very frustrating. We have given up! Not even going try try away from home again.

name: valeriem_61
review: Well they cancelled my card due to my purchase of CBD oil that is regulated by the FDA and they want to say that they can close my account due to my purchase- so, you telling me that I cannot purchase what I want to purchase. Whaaaaat??? So, if I wanna by my girlfriend a dildo then they can close my account bc I want to explore other things than vanilla sex with her!

name: Pedro
review: Very easy to use and keep track of transactions. Would definitely recommend to help on improving your overall credit score. Thanks

name: Alfie DiCarlo
review: This bank is worse than a loan shark. My kid was charged $5000 in overdraft fees in the past year. Even when his debit card was declined this poor excuse for a bank charged him $35. They took everyone of his last three paychecks. They are incredibly rude and unhelpful. They come up with a fee for everything even with an account there. DO NOT even consider using this bank!

name: jmatthes3
review: This bank is the worst bank I have ever dealt with.  Terrible customer service and ridiculous wait times on the phone to speak with a representative.  They owe me money and have lied to me for the third time today about when I will receive this refund.  Upper management is condescending and unsympathetic as well.  I would not recommend this bank to anyone!   Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere for your banking needs.

name: Sikandar
review: The worst bank in the USA the service is not helpful the credit card is fully confused the car loan is so highly interested you can not get anything loan from us Bank less then 29%99 $ you will work the life for us Bank

name: Nasar
review: Service is not helpful they don’t answer phone you can stay one hour when you call us Bank I have credit card with us Bank from the last 12 year no increase & 29%int

name: Joyce
review: I have to thank WalletHub for bring it to my attention to get a lower rate on my loan. I called USBank and got a lower rate and smaller payments.

name: thepumpkinqueen113
review: I absolutely love this card!! I was surprised to get with a credit score in the 600’s. But I have had a checking acct with them for almost 3 years. Got approved 6 months ago with a 2000 CL and after 6 months approved immediately for another 2000 CLI ! Love that I can change my cash back choices every quarter.  Customer service was so nice I had to call once and get a new card due to ordering something from a website and finding out it was a sham site.  Got my card fed ex for free had it in 2 days. Overall love this card.

name: Travis
review: They said i had a 628 from transunion! They gave me a 7500 limit! I have another credit card with them and checking and savings account also!

name: garywilliamson44
review: I would not recommend US Bank for business or personal, I currently use them extensively for both (not for long) and when presented an opportunity to treat me unfairly and unethically but within their "legal rights" they exercised it. Charging some $150 in fees over $10 in short pay. They could have notified me in any one of six different ways but did not, they just continued to apply fees.

name: Peter Cull
review: This company allows charges to your card that you do not even make. They will allow people to make charges from bogus companies and will not refund it even when you prove it wasn’t you who put the charge on it. They are scammers and customer service is useless! Rude! All the above! Stay far far away from this company! Unless you just want to give your money away.

name: sara
review: Easy bank to contact and get answers quickly no hold time- good follow up- well informed customer service and managers.  Great experience!

name: Latecia
review: Us bank is a great bank We are well pleased with all the services they have provided. Definitely recommend this bank to any home owner.

name: john
review: Great service.  I can get EVERYTHING done with my online account.  I have other cards but the online experience is lacking, follow-up calls are most-time needed.  : )

name: Lisa
review: I have been with US Bank for many years, and find their credit card fraud protection is very good.  I did have a checking and savings account with them, but found another place I preferred.  I have kept my credit cards with US Bank and paying my utility bills with the card regularly has brought in a good return on rewards dollars.

name: mario watkins
review: This card is okay and I have carried this card for about 8 years and have used it many times over and never really over spent and have never been late. The real problem with this card is they have never offered me a credit line increase. Its a unsecure card and when I confronted the bank about this neglect they became very uncomfortable and all they said was, well we can run a credit check on you again and see if you qualify for an credit  increase. No thank you! WOW, guess I will be using my Discover card instead.

name: Barry
review: they are prompt and friendly.... but I paid off my balance on Nov. 1st; statement is due on Vov. 9th.... so I should show balamce of zero

name: Alexis
review: This card doesn’t really do much for me the spending amount is low they always slow sending info about your payment history I’m going to close this account because it really serves no good purpose I have much much better cards that work in my favor not impressed with this card

name: Danny Lightfoot
review: They post to the 3 credit agencies half way through your allotted time to pay your new monthly balance rather than after the due date. They have to do a hard pull of your credit report to give a line if credit increase. They give a Vantage 3 Transunion score to customers, over the FICO you can get at other bank cards.

name: Ryan
review: US Bank gave me an awesome rate an easy company to work with. I appreciate the time they take to explain everything in the beginning of the loan. Thanks US Bank

name: oneshotatlife
review: Absolute garbage reward card. I would never get my $0.25/gallon discount at Fry's fuel stations. That and the $100 credit were the only reasons I opened the account. The points system is essentially worthless when compared to other reward programs. I just closed my account, and I suggest you do the same immediately after you get your $100 credit. Oh yeah, and when you have problems, don't even bother trying to get assistance. I was on hold for 60 minutes while the associate tried to contact Fry's Fuel program. Then she told me to try calling them back directly at a later time.

name: John
review: Us bank did all the leg work when I refinanced and I love having everything in one place on the app. I can see my balance going down monthly and it motivates me to pay it off faster

name: Hilda Lou
review: This account was paid in full on 10/10/19. I had a good account with them and if I needed anything in the future I would definitely contact them.

name: Dean
review: I been either bank for only a short time but have had no problems I had my loan some where else and it was transferred do you have any programs that might be able st save me any money that aren’t overly costly

name: Keon
review: This card has some great benefits for 5% cash back, but the limit initially given is very low, and a inquire is required to raise the limit.

name: Kenneth Weston
review: Excellent banking experience- prime credit cards with good startup limit- an actual person looks at your credit and determines the limits etc...

name: Anamarie Waite
review: My local branches are ill-maintained. More often than not, I can't get cash from the ATMs at either location closest to my home on any given day of the week. Lines tend to be long, both inside and in the drive-thru lanes. Any time I need to do any banking offline it's a hassle.

name: Yana Garipova
review: Opened the second account more than a year ago. Now they call and say something on the paperwork doesn't match up and I have to run to an office ASAP or my accounts will be closed. What was the year about? and the time they took to "approve" the account? Brainless annoying beaurocrats.

name: Gregory
review: Very pleased with how US Bank has treated us since establishing a relationship with them. I’ve banked with WF and other big banks and CU’s and can say that this has been the best overall experience! We started with a mortgage refi because our local CU financed my home purchase at a much higher interest rate and PMI (less than a year ago). US Bank now has our Mortgage (without PMI), Heloc, and Credit Card. Highly recommended!

name: Joshua
review: Unlimited rewards earning power. If you shop at Fred Meyer for groceries and for fuel, you should have this card. I got $50 free!!

name: hcincali
review: Basic cash-back card with excellent 24x7 US-based customer service. Can be paid online, over the phone or at a U.S. Bank ATM. I was told by Customer Service that online or over-the-phone payments post quicker.

name: Danelyn
review: I really like this card, especially because I get 55 cents of every gallon of gas when I redeem 100 fuel points. This has added up to a ton of savings.

name: ciao_ml
review: US Bank changed my credit card program from PLATINUM to CASH + card without any notification or consent.  My Platinum card had a $0 balance and was not scheduled to expire for almost 2.5 years.  I called and explained I was not interested in a CASH + card or the features and was told the transfer could not be reversed.  Obviously something that benefits US BANK, but not the customer.  Will throw the card in the drawer and not use it again.  Am also filing a complaint with other review sites to warn other customers about this "upgrade" scam.

name: lrs44
review: Honestly they have, for lack of better words, really shitty customer service. I've never had a good call with them. I seriously can't wait to leave this bank.

name: mpclark1
review: US Bank has been okay to deal with over th years, but when I had an issue with a webpage that seemed to be a bank issue, they were very inflexible with an internal policy about its bonus rewards.  As a result, my opinion of them went from fine to not very good.  It would have been easy to make me a happy customer, but, like I said, the reps were inflexible.

name: Armen Masrejian
review: Another Dumb bank run by brainless IDIOTS! Check gets deposit, email received that check is processed successfully  and funds are available. Week later received a letter stating that that check has been returned for insufficient funds and $19 fee was charged to the account. Question: You Brainless Imbeciles, why would you email that that check was deposited successfully in the first place???

name: Mark Guglielmo
review: Horrible, horrible company. Stay FAR away. With no warning, they suspect your card if you miss the due date by 1 second. Yes 1 second. Even if the due date is on a weekend. My wife tried to pay for medical services, and with over $5,000 available on the card, was declined. Forgetting about the embarrassment that caused her, I called their "customer service" which is anything but. No one more "important" than a team supervisor would get on the line, and all he did was parrot out the same "talk track" nonsense they all use. They offered to waive my late fee. I told them to shove it up their ass. JUST BE WARNED, THERE IS NO GRACE PERIOD. Despite the fact that I made 30 consecutive payments, on time, and then was late once during a very difficult time personally. STAY AWAY. Unless you have a burning desire to work with one of the shittiest banks in the country.

name: mirage_ema
review: They damage your credit score by mailing you a card with high available credit line and before you activate it, they close it. This is due to their inefficient system of verification of credit card approval. They first give you a credit card then they cancel you. Denial of credit card does not damage your score as much opening a credit card and canceling it especially if the bank closes it. They report it to all 3 credit bureau!! A week after you get your card they mail, you a letter asking for a copy of your social security card, driver’s license, mortgage statement, past 2 years of tax return ( as if they are approving you for mortgage not a credit card!!!). Who wants it!! Save yourself, apply for a different card.

name: Kerri Quarles
review: All I can say is don’t use US Bank. You will get bad customer service and charged a lot of fees. Worst customer service. Will be closing my account today!

name: iatwoodf
review: Avoid this card at all costs simply due to customer service. If you ever have to reach someone with an issue, you better have time. I have been unable to use online bill pay  for 3 days now. The drop down does not show my checking bank account even though it says I have added it. When I click on payment accounts I get a response that the system is offline. It's been offline for 3 days. The last 3 times I've called the help number I've had to wait 15-20 minutes to reach an individual. I just called this time and it said I had to wait 15 minutes to reach a banking individual. This is the worst service I've ever had with a credit card. I'm extremely close to cancelling and never doing business again with US Bank.  Every other credit card I own, I have to wait less than 1 minute to reach a customer service representative.

name: drpiercy
review: I needed to open a checking account for my new LLC and after researching online the different Banks, decided US Bank have the best price for my needs. I would like to give a special shout-out to Saraya for her help and friendliness while setting up my new account! She has a very positive personality and I enjoyed working with her.

name: daniellabalabolina
review: Please, save your time and nerves. I got the card in the store because the clerk told me I can do direct deposit right away. They never told me that I need to send them my ID, Social Security Card, Utility bill for the Direct Deposit to go through. Now, I am sitting without money to pay my rent and my child's daycare. The direct deposit is cancelled and I need to wait 3 business days for it to bounce back AND ANOTHER 3 BUSINESS DAYS FOR THE ACCOUNTING TO RE-ISSUE IT. I am done with them. They messed up my life.

name: rlb5x5x5
review: I purchased an rv through US Bank and for the amount of money being THEY REFUSE TO SEND AN ENVELOPE WITH MONTHLY INVIOCE which is absolutely ridiculous and not normal, I have notified them multiple times and have been ignored, I don't  have time to prepare an ENVELOPE with every payment because US bank holiday holdings is to cheap to include an ENVELOPE without postage

name: kd88976
review: Horrible customer service. $38 late payment fee and they refused to give a one time waiver. The person on the phone was rude and did not care about the customer at all. I have had the same experience with Harley Davidson directly, no wonder they are losing money

name: kristinam_41
review: Horrible Bank. Customer service is far from outstanding. Charge 36.00 for overdraft fees. They do debits before deposits. There overdraft pertection is promoted so much because they want your money. This has to be the worst bank I have ever used. Look into all the reviews before opening an account. I wish I would have noticed the 1 star reviews before opening a bank account with them.

name: averyjocelyn19991
review: Us bank is the worst bank to deal with. Ive been a customer for 10 years and its always a issue ever so often and the customer service  team are very incompetent. Today i will close my account and withdrawal all my money.

name: donnalindseylg
review: This bank has the WORST customer service and procedures of any bank that I have ever done business with.  I have called US Bank over 8 times, and left messages for supervisors to call me bank to help with my issue.  Not one phone call has been returned and even thou I got direct phone lines for some of the customer service reps that I spoke to, none of them would get back on the phone with me either.  I have spent today trying to get a phone number to call the corporate office.  DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS BANK.  THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT YOU!!!!!

name: Samantha Rulffin
review: I am so beyond ticked off with this US Bank!I had a Kroger card and the Max limit was $500,, I only had a little over$300 on it, I was paying eirly each month and they started charging me late fees just 2 months after getting the dang thing. Then my credit score started to drop like crazy and then I see that I have over charged my card? How could I do that when I stopped using it? Imagine having a good credit of 780 in November and by May your score is 560 Bad credit!!!Calls 4-5 times a day and your bill is up to, $600+ telling you that the minimum amount due is over$250!!!!¡ Why are they still available to the public! This company needs to be shut down and give our good credit back to us. Is there a C. A. L. Open related to this one?!!Do not apply for anything through this greedy scammer bank!!!

name: christine_verploeg
review: We have maintained huge balances in order to obtain free checking, and US Bank has made a fortune on us.  Stumbled on fact that maintaining that balance provided us with absolutely no benefit.  Plus, bank mistake caused overdraft payments they won't rescind.  The final indignity: US Bank informed me that millions of ids hacked but no worry--today, and today only I can check my credit for free.  Ha!  Checking credit locks you into $20/month credit monitoring fee unless you cancel.  Took me 45 minutes to cancel.  What a scam.

name: dnomura91
review: I was just on the phone with one of their “supervisors” for their 24 hour customer care service. I was calling them about the absurd FOUR overdraft fees I was charge over the course of three days. All he said to me was “it’s the bank’s policy” and how “the maximum caps out at four a day,” and that there was nothing he or anyone else could do about it. Completely shady. No compassion at all. I will be moving banks as soon as I possibly can. Untrustworthy snakes if you ask me.

name: Sunny Day
review: I agree with many other customers, no rewards,high interest and dishonest overall. Similar when shopping in store .they pay most employees minimum wage.From what I understand they are separate from each other. No one held accountable. They locked ,limited acces and function my account without explaining anything to me. I had received texts for codes. They didn’t inquire to find out what type of code it was for( purchase, log in, in store,payment or anything) they punish the consumer and if I thought it might be a Kroger employee I would have to do something they won’t.They didn’t even take note of the information I did have.Funny thing is they just set it up to where the Kroger employee could go ahead and steal.This really ticks me off. Steal and ruin other hard working peoples credit and money.

name: Ladys Rodriguez Martin
review: Don't get this card, no reward, very high interest and for the first time I miss a payment that I tried to make and was pretty sure it went through but maybe since lately I'm always on rush I made a mistake and it didn't went through they charged me the late payment fee. capital one get my husband a credit for his first late payment since he is a great client always making his payments on time, they don't have that courtesy in US Bank. I'll pay off this card as soon as I can to never hear from them again.

name: supernursejo
review: Absolutely terrible experience! I’ve acrually had several unhappy dealings with usbank but this tops the cake. They disconnected my debit card while my husband is getting the oil changed. I call and they tell me there was a vendor compromise and they may have my card so they jut turned it off. No email no text message no phone call just disconnect. I’m a traveling nurse and the only way to MY money is with that debit card.   I’m 24 hours from home and do not get my mail so won’t receive my new card until I drive 24 hours home and pick it up. Thanks usbank. I’ll be switching to wellsFargo when I do go home.

name: Stephanie Heacox
review: I opened an account for my nonprofit about 6 weeks ago, and it has been a complete nightmare from end to end.  The only bright spot is the staff at this branch, who were lovely, but can't overcome the disaster that is US Bank.  When I opened the account (at the branch), it took a while, and rather than keep them past closing time, I told them they could just send me my debit card and PIN, which I didn't want anyway.  What they apparently didn't know was that without a PIN, you can't set up your online account or anything else, as it is core to their security protocols.  When the password I was given for the online account didn't work, I was stuck.   After many phone calls trying to get that straightened out, I gave up and waited for the PIN to arrive.  Then it didn't work.  More calls, more snail mail, finally got a PIN that worked.Then began the saga of trying to get my nonprofit accountant set up for shared access to my account.  Turns out US Bank had just released an updated web process for that, and it didn't actually work (and they acknowledged this).  Apparently they don't actually test features before releasing them.  Six times I had to register her for access, then discover that the system had messed up, then unregister her.  Many, many hours spent with Customer Service.  Finally, after several weeks, my accountant was able to log in to my account, only to discover that she did not have access to my bank statements.  I called Customer Service again to discover that US Bank does not include bank statements in shared access.  They allow access to all individual transactions, but not to statements!  No one could explain this idiotic policy.  So that was the last straw for me.  I'm closing the account and looking elsewhere.

name: Chris Najem
review: Fantastic travel card geared towards the new age way of paying for things, mobile wallet spending. 3x points on Mobile wallet spending makes this card an absolute no brainer along with real time rewards. Trading in points for travel at 1.5x makes every mobile transaction worth 4.5%, and in the ever expanding world of apple and Samsung pay, this card is super valuable to have as long as you have excellent credit

name: Peen Winkle
review: The branch is maybe fine, but this is the worst bank I've ever heard of. You are only allowed up to 1000(at best, 500 if you want cash) dollars of your own money at a time. Also, they regularly take over a week to "clear" the full amount of checks.Who are their customers at this point? Closed account immediately. GO TO PNC INSTEAD (or ANY other bank.

name: Peen Winkle
review: This was ment for a specific area, bit I'm sure their practices don't change from state to state. STAY AWAY, BIG TIME

name: Kalyan K
review: The customer service is horrible. I am trying to get out of their clutches. They have a phone wait times based on the time of the day lasting at least 15 minutes to few hours. So you are screwed if you have to reach to them. Pretty callous attitude from the customer service people. They treat their customers as trash. Looking forward to closing the accounts. Multiple bad experiences with this bank1. They make policies in the branch to discriminate based on race. I was told by one of their employee who is a friend that they put a policy to not attest documents to shoo away middle eastern customers. 2. Phone wait times are terrible. They will ask you to fax documentation but their is no confirmation from their end as to if they received the fax. Their turnaround times are days each time you have to find information from them. Wait time on phone can last hours. So you can pretty much forget about whatever you want to do. 3. They have a very callous attitude and pretty much treat their customers as trash. Most horrible customer service and the worst bank ever. 4. After closing a CC, there was a refund. Called to get it refunded into a checking account. The guy got information and said it will be deposited. I am past 7 days from the time I put in a request, but nothing happened so far.If you want your sanity, do not deal with this bank.

name: Danielle Monroe
review: I have been banking with US Bank for only 3 months and my experience with the branch In Chandler on Alma School Rd and Queen Creek has been so awful I’m shopping a new bank. Has anyone else had to deal with this bank manager? She is a try B**tch. She is so miserable and unwilling to extend any assistance it really leaves a person to want to dash out and change banks immediately. The other folks that work there were nice, I must say. But this woman needs to go. I can’t imagine they are not losing business with this manager in place.

name: Farrah King
review: 819 FICO Score and $1,200 limit?!! Tuh. I have 10k with discover it card! Waste of hard pull.. btw the pull Equifax in Georgia, not Transunion like the blogs say. I will bought visa signature cards came with a minimum 5k... clearly I was mistaken!

name: Jesn Mcclendon
review: I Just took about one hour of Zach Schultz’s time.  He is St. Louis tucker branch manager of sales and service.  Very courteous and patient.  Looked up all info that I needed.  All of the staff at that branch bend over for me EVERYTime I go in the branch.  Love them. Def a five star bank.

name: Michael Sanford
review: I would never ever recommend using U.S. Bank their online banking app is ridiculous their customer service is the worst I’ve ever had I’ve had better from Chuck E cheese’s ridiculous air charges that they make a mistake on and charge you for it there deposit getting it back takes for ever never ever use U.S. Bank I am pulling out my money and never going to them again

name: sheilaector
review: I have been with this bank for over 24 years when they were St. Paul, then they changed the name again to Charter One, now they are called US Bank, the worst. I didn't leave them after all those changes, now I'm having hardship and I explained my situations to them, the Branch manager on west 63rd in Chicago, his name is Emilio refused to speak with me only sending his goffers to assist me. The whole time he told them to tell me he would be on the phone for 20 minutes. I said I would wait, he never got off the phone. I was forced to file bankruptcy and they had a lot to do with my decision. I'm going to contact the new media about this sorry bank. I would not recommend anyone to bank there?

name: David Paneth
review: Had prefect credit (800 range) for 20 years until US Bank ruined it. They reversed 3 of my car loan payments for no reason (not one of the 25 reps and mangers I spoke to over the pat 2 weeks can explain why) and then notified all 3 bureaus that my account is delinquent and is not Paid As Agreed for 90 days. Every call to their customer service in attempt to get an explanation and a resolution turned out to be futile. After more than 12 hours of phone time including alot of hold and transfers from one person and department to the next (Customer Service, Credit Dispute, Lease Solutions, Loan Support, Lease Maturity, End of term, Total Loss and more). The best answer I was able to get was we will open an investigation that can take up to 30 days. Its more than 30 days later and still no explanation. Stay away from this bank until they figure out how to balance their business. Obviously the system or someone at US bank made a mistake which should have never happened but is understandable . What is not reasonable and inexcusable is the inability to fix it. If not after the first call then the second or third communication. Does this kind of customer service still exist in 2019! STAY AWAY FROM US BANK.

name: Eric Julier
review: Horrible customer service, horrible turnaround times once loan was paid in full for lien release and title. Avoid like the plague! I would happily pay a higher a rate in order to never deal with them again.

name: Henry Swanson
review: Spam!!They mail you 3 letters a month about thier credit cards and now spam email to boot about he same damn card I don't want 7 years ago and dont want today. I only have a morgage with you, leave me alone!!

name: myresume_02
review: My first statement had only balance of $36.xx and they kept sending statements that looked like their marketing material with no indication outside that these were for the Academy Sports credit card. I never opened them until mid Jan 2019 and the card was opened in June 2018, now the balance is $260.xx. When I called them next day they refused to waive any of the late fees or finance charges. They are trying to make lots of money on $36 balance first statement for the credit card. The phone numbers they have are old phone numbers before 3.5 years I don't know where they got those numbers.

name: Trevor Farmer
review: Banked with them for over 20 years. Just closed all my accounts because they had charged me a $25 annual fee on a credit card I had never once used. Then on top of that there was a $19 per month late fee. I had the first late fee reversed and they put in a request to take the $25 annual fee off, by the time I got the declination letter for removing the $25 fee they had charged me another $19 late fee, keep in mind this was a week and a half after I first had went in to inquire about the fees. Never again will I bank with them. Only Unitus from now on which has been absolutely amazing. Stay away. This bank will go out of buisness in the next ten years if they don't change their practices.

name: j10monroe
review: I have an auto loan through US Bank and have had struggles every step of the way. When setting up automatic payments online the system failed on two separate occasions leaving a note that it was successful but later we found no payment occurred, we were then charged a late fee. After the 2nd time of this happening and after calling customer support on both instances I was finally told to submit the request for automatic payment through a paper request and that I was then caught up. I found later that we were in fact late again and am now in collections. Speaking with a rep today I asked to speak to a manager and was told none were available. Asked if I could go to someone higher and was told "there is no one higher." Reportedly I am supposed to get mailed statements and have not received one in the 5 months I've had this account. When bringing that up US Bank states that is an issue with the post office and not them...sorry, but I expect a little more than that.

name: Bob Stanley
review: Useless card. I've had it since July '18 and still have not received any "rewards." Even if I had received them, the fact that it's 2019 and they still snail mail paper gift certificates in $5.00 increments, 3-6 months trailing (if you even get them) should tell you everything about how they do business. Oh and BTW ... their "points" are actually 1/2 a percent. So when you get their ad flyer promising "3 points" on Kroger purchases, that's not 3%. It's 1.5%. Pretty sneaky huh? Scumbags. Everything else that's "2 points" is actually 1%. That's the same as every other rewards credit cards, the exception being that with the other cards, you actually get the rewards. Stay far away and save the hit on your credit report. This card is a complete scam.    ***Update***  The BBB should get 0 stars as well.  They are toothless and completely useless.  Kroger’s excuse for my complaint (That the certificates were never mailed … to the tune of $100 bucks or so) was that they must have been “lost in the mail.”  Seriously.  The “USPS was at fault” was their excuse for the THREE times I never received anything by mail.  And the BBB closed it with no action.  That is why Kroger snail mails the certificates … because they can blame the postal service and get away with it.

name: Lisa Walters
review: I have been profoundly disappointed with the REI Mastercard and strongly recommend against it to anyone. I have been a member for several years with no issues until a month ago. I first noticed that the app I used to make payments was down due to technical issues; I was told to call customer service for assistance or try again later. I was also unable to make a payment using the online banking website due to technical issues. So, around 12/11/18, I called the 24-hour customer service line and was on hold for over 20 minutes until I was connected to a representative. During the call, I made a payment, and was also informed that my card had been shut down due to fraudulent activity. I waited for my new card to be mailed to me a few days later, and I immediately activated the new card and mailed in the requested documentation about the fraud. During these past weeks, I still have been unable to manage my account using the app or the online banking website due to technical difficulties. (My bank account is not an available payment method; when I try to add it, the website says that it's already added, but I cannot access it). Today, almost a month after the initial call to customer service to make a payment, my card is still declined when I try to use it and I am still unable to manage my account using the app or online banking website. I called the 24-hour customer service line today to get assistance with the technology to manage my account and with my card itself, and I was on hold for over 1 hour and 15 minutes before finally giving up. I have neither the time nor the phone battery power to obtain assistance. I have spent hours of my time and still have not been able to solve the technical issues or the account issues, AND I have been deprived of increased dividend due to my REI shopping during the holidays. My next payment is due soon and I will have no choice but to call customer service again when I have more time (how much time will be necessary, I do not now), or I risk penalty for not making a timely payment. I have requested assistance by email, having no time left to wait on hold by phone, but have not yet received a response.

name: iatwoodf
review: I currently have this exact same problem with consistent terrible online waits. I'm never using this card again.

name: Frank Sperandep
review: Had an auto loan with US BANK. Got in an accident. Not my fault. Insurance said dealing with US BANK was an ordeal. Insurance was finally able to send them check covering my loan. Everyday called to see why hasn't posted. Finally I learn they don't post for ten business days. Other banks do it in 1-2. This is over holidays. Bank paid on december 21st. Now January 2nd and I'm thinking it's going to be stretched to maybe the 7th? Won't give me a loan because of insufficient credit history which is absurd because got loan with them before. And because loan still on books I can't get a loan from someone else. It's now January 2nd and my car rental expires tomorrow and so when look for car I'll have to do without a car in winter. Will also have uber bus or bike to my two jobs. US BANK is the worst. Please let me know if this deterred you from joining us bank. Would give me some happiness.

name: bokim312
review: This is the most ridiculous bank! My parents made a credit card account over 25 years ago when living in California but has not used the credit card over many years. Im now trying to make them an online account so they can easily check transactions but it wouldn't let us. I call US bank for help and this is when the nonsense started to happen. The rep asks for credit number and social security number which we provided for them and then asks what our credit limit is which my dad cant remember. The rep tells us to go online and check the limit. I tell her we are calling because we are trying to sign up for an online account then she tells us that she is sorry and cannot help us without that info. She tells us that we can go into the branch for help but i tell her that we are in NY now and there is no US bank branch anywhere near the tristate area. At this point I am trying to have them understand that there is no branch near us and we dont have an online account and how else we can proceed with this situation. I have never spoken to a bank that couldn't help us with their own system. In the end, they apologized for not being able to help us make a simple online account and they will try to reach back to us with a solution which i highly doubt they will call back. I will try my best to CANCEL our account for their lack of responsibility and for whoever that is contemplating making an account with US bank, DO NOT make an account. There are plenty of other great banks who are much for sensible and helpful and reasonable and aware of their system.

name: michael weiss
review: Horrible in every way. Hurt my business and evil customer service. As a business owner, definitely stay away and I simply cant believe they are in business and haven't been sued yet. Beware and find another bank at all costs.

name: Limary Michaelis
