Never received an immediate approval Have to call Verify info and have never been denied.    Nice Bank Appear to be very loyal to their customers.

name: Ryan Dilger
review: Absolute worse banking experience I have had. I have multiple accounts with other banks and being an entrepreneur it is good to have a few accounts for multiple reasons. I have had nothing but problems when using my cards and business cards with this bank. For my personal account I will order something online or make a purchase and the bank will deem it "fraudulent" and put a freeze on my card. The problem is their customer service and lack of controls in place. I have been a customer with them for more than 11 years since they changed from StarOne Bank and they just continue to get worse. I often don't realize my card is frozen until my wife and I try to use the account again, in which we can't because we have to call in to verify that we attempted to make purchases or made purchases days prior. This institution is going into the toilet and I am proud to say that I have some personal accounts with the local credit union and Huntington Bank, Huntington, though I have had my account with them a little over a year I have slowly begun transitioning my business to that bank. Soon I will have no business or funds going through US Bank, they lack intelligent employees whom can't do their jobs, their customer service is horrendous, and they attempt to control when and where you can make purchases(free country?). It's good to have parameters for fraud activity, but how can I approve transactions with the bank more than 20+ times for ordering and things and it still be fraud? Why do I have to find out my card is denied trying to make purchases for my business and then have to call in to get it resolved? Shouldn't the fraud prevention team suspect fraud and be proactive to notify the customer? Apparently not.

name: Lori Root
review: Customer service on the card is horrible. They will talk over you and hang up on you when they don't know the answer to your question. Then you start all over again and get no where. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!

name: y3k
review: I hear you. Absolutely true.

name: Jerbedaih J Kermann
review: Locally, the branch staff is awesome. The branches here in Seattle are well run and efficient. The staff is very friendly ... But holy cow, whenever you have to deal with any centralized service, like account setup, credit/debit cards etc... These guys are basically just incompetent. Their customer service strategy seems to be to alienate and anger their customers. Their web app is wobbly and only offers basic functionality. The Android app is horrifically slow and for some reason that escapes imagination, is set up like a social media app.If you live in Seattle, live near a branch, and do most of your banking the old fashioned way with a small number of accounts and no need for international banking, they're a respectable choice. If, on the other hand, your life is less localized, you have a need for regular international banking, and have need of a variety of accounts and products, keep walking. The idiots at USBank HQ will take years off of your life.

name: larakenny3
review: I'm an avid outdoorsperson so the REI credit card is a great tool to use and utilize when I buy gear. As an REI member, I already get 10% back on my REI purchases and with this credit card, I get an additional 5% back which is a fantastic deal. As far as other, non-REI purchases go, this card is okay. It's 2% back on gas and 1% back on everything else. I have other credit cards that have better perks than that on gas, etc, so I really only use this for gear, but it that category this card is excellent and definitely worth having to purchase REI swag.

name: Jake
review: I got the card because my bank offered it and I wanted something to passively improve my credit score. I have had no issues with the card but, like anyone, more cash back would never be a bad thing. The customer service has been great and anytime I have had to call about going overseas or whatever my problem was, it was taken care of quickly and the wait was minimum at best.

name: Marietta Roberts
review: My wife had the prepaid debit card the Fry's 123 Rewards Card.  She had for four years.  It was NOTHING BUT A HASSLE!!!!  In the beginning she wasn't getting her grocery coupons for the points she had accumulated.  She could only load $1,000 at a time.  In the last few months it wouldn't giver a point balance. For over a year she couldn't access the point balance website as it would not give her any detailed information.  She called numerous times on this problem and NOTHING was done nor accomplished it fell on deaf ears!!!!  The customer service reps are in Alabama and are horrendous to deal with.  The were EXTREMELY rude, inefficient, unprofessional and other nouns I cannot say as they would be inappropriate to put down.  It was not only the reps but the supervisors as well.  It has been very discouraging, frustrating and I am begging you to NOT get the prepaid card it will only be aggravation. On December 23rd of 2015 she called about unrecognizable charge and inquired on the protocol to dispute the charge; the inept agent told her that they have to shutdown her card, I quote her she told them "NO!!THAT CAN'T HAPPEN!!!DON'T DO IT!!!"  She went to the store put funds on her card which they gladly did and than went and got her items went to pay for them and she couldn't.  She called customer service and they told her that her card had been shut down.  She was told in the Terms and Conditions they can shutdown her card at ANY TIME!!!!!  She called customer service back and begged them to release the card to no avail they DID NOTHING but were robots "I am sorry" "Sorry for the inconvenience"!!!!!!!  At one point in the four years of her having this card she dealt with a Nancy Fields and Greg Thompson a Fry's Personal Finance and they are diabolical don't return calls...blah blah blah....  So my wife spoke to Greg Thompson and explained everything at which point she was hysterical.  She called every 15 minutes and he COMPLETELY blew her off and never called back!!!!  The lack of empathy, the callousness and unprofessional manner sent my wife over the edge and drove her to suicide.  I BEG OF YOU DO NOT GET A REWARDS CARD WITH FRY'S!!!!!!

name: Karen Krusa
review: This card is excellent for a gas purchase at Kroger.  As far as rewards are concerned, forget it!!  1,000 points gets you 1  $5 check to use at Kroger.  You can do so much better with other credit cards when it comes to rewards.  If you want great rewards, put the Kroger 1-2-3 Rewards credit card away!!  In fact Kroger should take the word "Rewards" out of the name of their credit card.  There are almost no rewards.

name: James Mears
review: The card has too high of a annual fee ($50) and they also charge a 2-3% fee for foreign exchange. The bonus miles are okay, but there aren't many options outside of Korean Air Lines to redeem mileage. I like to buy Korean Air tickets to get double mileage.

name: Christopher Baer
review: Applied online based on the following statement online from REI.com : "Upon approval, you can use your instant credit limit to shop online at REI.com and start enjoying the benefits of the REI MasterCard—you don't have to wait for your card to arrive in the mail."I was approved immediately and then never given any option during checkout. Checked my email to see if USbank sent an email with the required information and they had not. So now I can't use the credit card until in comes in the mail and USbank has another subscriber...jokes on me I guess. Well, that is until I get my card and call to close it down. Do yourself a favor and don't fall for the trap.

name: Michael ORourke
review: REI's software is buggy, but if you contact an online chat, they are pretty good about walking you though their site.

name: Holly Woods-Maffei
review: I have had a Hobby Lobby credit card for two years now!  All I can say is...AWESOME!!!!!! I pretty much decorated my entire house in FREE Hobby Lobby products. I pay all my monthly bills with the card and when the bills comes in I pay it off.... then redeem all the FREE product from the store!!!

name: Jeremy Suntheimer
review: I am so pleased with this checking account!  After having difficulty obtaining a checking account, I was approved by US Bank.  Two months ago I had insufficient funds in my account to pay my account fee.  I was contacted by US Bank by phone, who left a voice mail alerting me to the problem, but was unable to get to a branch to make a deposit until the next day.  When I applied for the account, I opted not to carry overdraft protection, but I was virtually certain I would have to pay some sort of penalty.  To my surprise and delight, US Bank charged no additional fee, just the remaining balance of the account fee which I owed.  Thank you, US Bank!

name: Shawn Harris
review: Does anyone know if you can combine your Kroger Plus card points with your 123 Rewards credit card points?

name: WalletHub
review: Yes, you can link your two accounts to combine any existing fuel points, as long you haven’t linked them before. For help with this, you can contact Kroger Card customer service at 877-373-6192.  Keep in mind that gift certificate points cannot be pooled between card accounts.

name: Sharon Poole
review: This is a decent checking account.  The cons for this type of account through U.S. Bank is that the interest is only 2%.  So, unless you have a lot of money in your account on a regular basis, you're not going to make much money.  But, that's true with most any checking account.  The good thing about this account is that upon opening the account (because we've been customers for along time... we have another account with them), they offered to wave the $10.95 monthly fee.  We thought that was kind and were thankful!

name: Amanda Dunning
review: I didn't really know a lot about U.S. Bank until I bought a new vehicle. The car lot suggested that I use this bank over the bank I was with due to better interest rates. I was so impressed I moved my checking and savings accounts over to U.S. Bank. The staff is very friendly. The branch that I am with is small. They know me by name and greet me when I walk in. I have access to my account 24 hours a day online. I also have a phone app that I can use. There are lots of ATMs around that I can use. I have never had a problem with this bank.

name: k P
review: Predatory overdraft fees - some of the highest in the industry $36 per transaction and, to make it worse, they apply the highest purchases first, regardless of whether other smaller purchases were made first. This way, they eat up your balance faster and put you in the red faster. It used to happen a lot when I was in college and it terrible - always made things so much worse.I understand that managing my account is my responsibility, buy why would I, as a consumer, allow a company to profit off my mistakes.The only reason I stay is because I have a student account and I don't pay any checking account fees.I also have a CapitalOne360 account that is AMAZING!!! They only charge a small interest rate on overdrafts instead of a flat fee, which turns out to be only pennies. This is a much more reasonable and modern solution.  The second I figure out how to make cash deposits to this online only account, I will HAPPILY drop US Bank.

name: Yasin jasbin
review: i find this to be a pretty low interest rate for a savings account however the convenience that it provides me to put money aside from my paycheck automatically every month is just great; also, CDs restrict me of when i can use the money, so i always like to have some at hand for emergencies, as soon as my savings hits a certain amount, i will be opening one with some of the cash. it is a pretty convenient product to have if you want to organize your personal finances if you already bank with U.S. bank. i give it a four star rating because the interest could be higher.

name: Jamie Wasson
review: On Sept 6th my wife and I went on vacation to Southeast Asia. A week prior I called Bank U S to give them my itinerary, so I would be able to use this credit card to pay for hotel expenses and larger purchases. One week into my three week trip my card was declined. I called  Bank U S, at my expense as the toll free number did not work. The representative informed me I would not be able to use my card in Myanmar. His only explanation for me having received prior approval was that his customer service representative was unaware of the Bank's policy. He assured me I would be able to use it at my other destinations. I borrowed-money to pay my bills and planned to get cash and repay the loans in Thailand. Upon arrival in Thailand I tried to get cash at the airport, and again my card was declined. From the hotel I called Bank U S. (Still no working toll free number.) The representative asked me if I had made a purchase in Luxembourg. I said no and pointed out that Luxembourg was not on the itinerary I had provided; but, Thailand was. He told me he would have to terminate my card; and mail me a new one. Of course I would not be able to use it until I returned home. The inconvenience this level of incompetence has caused me, not to mention embarrassment and the inability to buy souvenirs and pay my expenses, made me realize this card cannot service my needs. Fortunately for me, others in our tour group told us which banks sponsored their MasterCards and Visa cards, all of which worked in all locations we visited.

name: mary row
review: I have traveled to a lot of places, and when I was in Phoenix Arizona, I had this U.S. Bank card,. The thing about this card id that it is really easy to use. One time, for some reason my card was not working, and I was blocked from using the card too much. I ended up having to call the company, and when they answered, they immediately fixed the problem. They removed the block and cleared my history so that I would be able to use the card. It took them a couple of minutes, but I was very happy in the end.

name: Yasin jasbin
review: I am really bad with overdraft fees, and the U.S. Bank personnel are great with me by helping me; if I ever go on the negative, the reps will contact me and let me know so that I can deposit as soon as possible, and bring my account to the positive again. I usually choose banks based on number of branches, so it was a pleasant surprise when the first over draft fee issue arose because it was very pleasant to deal with them, and now I can say that I am a loyal u.s. Bank customer. They also have a branch at my school campus which is pretty convenient, when I need to deposit or withdraw while at school, for I do not have to leave campus in order to run most of my errands.

name: John Allen
review: This review is on 11th September 2015 for the new REI U S Bank Mastercard coming from a REI member from late 60's & having had the REI Visa from which this morphed for at least ten years.  After spending first hundred w /card I was to receive a $20 gift card if I spent $100 dollars in the first month..I satisfied the expenditure part and arrived a day late to redeem my certificate in hand. No Go.. I was also presented w /  the proposition of spending $2000 within three months following receiving the card ( non REI items ) which I did and attempted to redeem ( or receive offer ) bonus and they came up w /   an arbitrary date of having to satisfy those purchases before 27 July -  1 / 2 the time detailed in their promotion as they even had on record I had received my card in early June.   And the third strike for me is my payment due date is 10th of month.  I paid between 10:30 and 11 pm on the 10th and they record that as the 11th as is stated ( quoting Mastercard rep ) in the fine print that is included in my contract  that payment has to be received by ( something like ) 8pm central time for it to count as on time.  He said one more contributing factor to not eliminating the charge was a couple months earlier they had credited me for a late fee & interest because of my day late payment.  I will definitely be focusing on other "outdoor" stores and never use this card again.  Chase Freedom & Capitol Credit cards are where I am going.

name: Ian Smith
review: I've been banking with U.S. Bank for about 6 years now. They have been invaluable in helping me rebuild my credit and hit savings goals. They even let me know when my credit score enables me to get more rewards, which is such a great feeling. I would recommend this bank to anyone.

name: Katherine Williamson
review: I have had a silver checking account with US Bank for seven years, and I have been very satisfied with it. US Bank's customer service representatives have always been friendly and helpful. At one point I had an erroneous overdraft charge, and this was quickly remedied and the money refunded to my account. I am no great fan of the $7 a month service charge, but overall I have been very pleased with my checking account and the service provided by US Bank. I would recommend this checking account to anyone who needs one.

name: Susan Hibbert
review: We are big on putting our money in many varied places. So we decided to open a “fun money” checking account with US Bank located right down the street from us. It has been a very pleasant experience and we love checking account. I’m thinking of  getting a second checking account(free easy checking) and an upgrade to Gold. I’m also thinking of getting a US Bank credit card. At the branch they treated us well and they are always friendly. I highly recommend US Bank.

name: Katherine Williamson
review: I have been banking with US bank for 7 years. They have always, without fault, been courteous, friendly, and helpful. Honestly, I did not expect to be this happy with such a large bank, and certainly not for as long as I have been. I do all of my banking there-- savings, checking, credit card, childrens' savings accounts, and safe deposit box. I have rarely had any issues with them, but when I have, the person on the other end of the phone (or the other side of the desk) has been extremely polite and helpful. I highly recommend US bank!

name: sarah crawford
review: I have had nothing but excellent service from U.S. BANK in Oshkosh, WI. Everyone is always so friendly and eager to help. Julie walked me through the entire mortgage loan process and took the time to explain every detail on the application. She worked hard to get me the loan amount that I needed for my dream home. I will definitely be doing service with U.S. BANK again in the future!

name: Holly Garnett
review: Moving across the country for college meant having to sign up for a new bank account, and US bank made it a simple and easy process for me.   In addition to having helpful representatives, they got back to me with the application process within a day and had me up and running by the second day.   In addition to this, they ran a promotion where if I put at least $70 in my account, they would give me $70 once I spent that $70.  I'd forgotten all about it when I checked my account balance a month later and saw money magically appear!   I've never had a problem using my checking account here,  but be warned that outside of a few select states, US bank atms are hard to find so you'll have to pay a fee to get money out!Another nice perk they have is their mobile app, which allows you to deposit checks using your phone into your checking account,  a great feature if you don't have transportation too and from the banks every week!

name: Michael Grindel
review: terrible tried to online card, 800 number was of no use.

name: Jane Gasch
review: I am fairly new to U.S. Bank as far as savings and checking, but so far, so good! The customer service department was wonderful in helping me get set up, and I like that there is no required minimum in case I have an emergency or want to go on vacation and use much of what is in there. It is also very easy to transfer money from one account to another! My reason for giving four stars instead of five is only because there isn't a location close to me. This doesn't bother me too much, though, as they make it easy to do everything online.

name: Sara Weiler
review: The WORST waste of time on hold for CS that has no clue about rewards. I earned 1500 points. No gas discount and used the card exactly as I was told by CS. NO Gas discount NO free groceries!! Biggest scam. Do not waste your money to reload. I got absolutely nothing. They should be shut down for false advertising.

name: Jennifer Link
review: I've had a US Bank Easy Checking account since 2013 and have been neither impressed nor unimpressed with their service. Their online banking is easy to use and the app is very convenient, however physical locations are somewhat hard to come by. The employees at my local branch are always very helpful but it’s pretty hit and miss when calling for customer service.  I appreciate having the monthly maintenance fee waived with my direct deposit but I think their overdraft fee policies are a little unfair. One real problem I’ve had with them is when I’ve had to replace my debit card, waiting 5-7 business days for a new card is simply not sensible.

name: Lisa Villarreal
review: I have been a member of the US Bank for over 10 years.I absolutely love this bank and I have never had an issue getting the help I need whether online or in the bank itself. I highly recommend using this bank. I have used the customer service countless times and the wait has been very minimal. The service reps are sociable, knowledgeable, and easy to understand. I love their online banking options and I also love their banking apps for phones and Iphones. I have used multiple services they offer such as savings, multiple checking accounts (opening and closing), and savings accounts. Opening accounts is easy online and closing accounts is just as easy in person at the bank. I have never had any issues using this bank. I love banking here.

name: Nichole Matteo
review: I try not to use credit cards in general but when I saw the perks of having a 1-2-3 rewards card I didn’t hesitate to sign up! The fuel points alone make it worth it for me. Plus, Kroger is the only grocery store I shop at so I feel like it really helps me save. The benefits of this card definitely outweigh your regular credit card and customer service has always been top notch!

name: Dave Smith
review: What fuel points. This card does not offer fuel points, only "rewards" points that cannot be redeemed for fuel at Kroger locations.

name: Constantina Hauser
review: I previously had a secure credit card from USBANK, that was back in the day when I was trying to build my credit.  3 years later I established a 700+ credit score, by paying on the time all the time and keeping low balances on card.  I had 9 credit cards from different institutions, but they had high APR, so I applied for this card and got a 15% APR.  I transferred my balances from 5 other card and started paying off the whole balance.  Overall this is a great card and offers great perks for travel.

name: Emilia Campbell
review: My U.S. Bank Premium Checking Account has always been convenient, communicative, and reliable. I've never had a bad experience with customer service, even with high-stress situations like a lost/stolen card. I love living near so many branches, never having to search far for an ATM, the intuitive online banking options, and the fact that I don't pay any monthly fees. Whenever I have questions whether it is on the phone or in person, U.S. Bank answers them in a timely, friendly, and informative manner. All in all, they are a business that I trust with my money.

name: Daniel Espinosa
review: I've been a customer of U.S. Bank for a couple months now. I joined after a good friend of mine recommended the bank since he's been using them once he got out of high-school and got his first job. I wanted to bank service that wasn't part of other big banks, and most of the credit unions around my area are known to be somewhat questionable in quality. I signed up for their basic account with a single checking and savings account. I haven't had any problems with any kind of fees and there's plenty of locations around my area where I can take out cash if I need to. They have great customer service and their employees are very helpful when it came to setting up an account.

name: Tyler Jones
review: I've been with US Bank for about 10 years now. I've gotten used to their online system for managing my checking account. They have made it easy to pay other people and to pay my bills. I can also easily transfer money from my checking account to my savings account. They don't have the best looking website or customer service, but it does get the job done with limited hassle. I will continue using US Bank until I find something better.

name: Samantha Gil
review: I have a 123 rewards prepaid card...2 weeks ago I bought a recharge card to load the funds onto my personalized card however numbers were missing off of the card. I went back into the kroger and they call the most useless card services department. They had ne faxe in all my reciepts and everything showing that I purchased it. I did that. $500 is missing and they won't give it back!!! I am beyond pissed. Every day I call these people and get the run around...at first I was told 1 business day and then 4 business days, and then 8 business days. Now they say the don't even know, that I have to wait on the bank. That is MY money and they are liable for it, yet won't give it to me!!! I strongly advise EVERYONE to never use Kroger 123 rewards, or any of their affiliations which include US bank. They don't do anything to assist their customers. It looks like I am going to have to reach out to my lawyer at this point. Please save yourself a headache

name: Sara Weiler
review: Oh yeah. Sounds just like my experience. If I could only have the mmoney I spent to reload this useless card...earned almost 2000 points..got nothing

name: Jason
review: I have been a customer of US BANK for a long time.  The checking account that I hold has been easy to manage and the customer service I've received from them when needed has been top notch.  My local branch is way easy to work with as well as anytime I've called on the phone.  While the interest rate isn't that great, it really isn't all US BANK's fault there as the interest rate is at least competitive with other banks checking accounts.  I do not have to pay the monthly fee as I have that all set up.  I would continue to do business with US BANK unless I ended up in an area where they were no longer local to me.

name: chelsey
review: I mostly liked US Bank in the beginning after having used some other banks with bad practices before. However, as time has gone on, I realize that US Bank is just like the other banks. Most banks will reverse 1-2 overdraft fees in a 6 or 12 month period out of good faith, but that is not the case with US Bank. I asked for 1 fee reversal and I was told that unless it was a banking or merchant error that they would be unable to reverse it. I honestly feel like that is a bad practice. Also, when my account first opened, my direct deposit was not set up yet and I had to deposit a paper check. US Bank held my funds for over a week and did not release any amount to me. This also happened to be around the first of the month when rent was due and when my rent check went to my account, they rejected it for "insufficient funds" even though it had been 6 days since I deposited over $1,000. The next day the funds were released, but I still had to explain why my rent check was rejected.

name: Arlene Imlay
review: discounts on fuel and food

name: Diana
review: US Bank has been good customer service. I remember having my checking account closed because it didn't have funds in it, but I had to find out the hard way when I deposited money into the account. To be fair though, they did apparently try to contact me. The lady at the counter was very kind, assisted me with reopening my account, and we also chit chatted about movies to about our dogs. The part I didn't like was the higher monthly fee associated with the account, after the student account was over for the two months.

name: Joseph
review: I mainly use this bank to transfer money over to family bank accounts easily. Everyone that I have had conversations with at this company have been very friendly and helpful. I have had no problems with the company, and flow of money has been smooth and efficient. I can't say too much bad about this bank, which for any bank, is a really good thing. I really haven't over-drafted or been involved in those type of situations so I am not sure how they would handle that, but I also haven't received any weird fees either.

name: Josh Quick
review: This has happened multiple times with them but i give them my paycheck on friday and they can only cash out 250 dollars that day. So they hold on to the rest of my money which is a lot of money. I should expect in my account on monday. It doesn't show up.. then tuesday rolls around and still nothing. By this point i am very familiar with calling them to fix the issue.They apologize and still cannoit give me my money. Their explanation is they dont have one. I am switching banmmks as soon as its convinient these guys have toyed with my money long enough.

name: Jon Pipgras
review: I've been a member at US Bank for 15 years. I got my first credit card through them, and my first loan. They've always been honest, forthcoming, and very helpful. I deal in mostly cash so I go to my local branch often, and even though I'm not a huge customer to them they still treat me great. I highly recommend them to anyone who'd looking for a hassle free personal banking experience.

name: nesha
review: I like my US Bank account. I actually first got to know the bank with my child support payments as that is the bank they automatically send it through. While using the features of my card, i opened my own account. It was not only easy, and the people are helpful, but it was a breeze to get all my accounts linked, direct deposits changed, etc, in a short period of time. I wish there were more locations, but otherwise I have no complaints!

name: Trish Dish
review: I gave US Bank four stars because although they had a tough time dealing with my issue and coming to a fair resolution, the customer service they provided through the whole thing was absolutely phenomenal! I am not at liberty to discuss my issue, but I will say that US Bank handled it with the utmost care and consideration. They are known for being the second chance bank and that is why I went to them, for my second chance. I still have a savings account with them and I would still rate their customer service at five stars every time I go there!

name: Angie Chaimouni
review: Absolutely the most horrible service and credit card ever. I was a regular customer at Fred Meyers and my husband and I made all our purchases from here, but because of the awful service that the credit card company provided. I will never shop at this store again. Never get a credit card because they are not very honest with you about the interest charges. If I could give negative stars I would.

name: Becky
review: We have had an Easy Checking account with U.S. Bank for 15+ years. It has been a good bank that does the job for us. We use it for our rental house and used to take the monthly check and deposit it through the drive through. Rarely would I need to go into the bank to make a transaction, but when I did, the tellers were friendly and the lines were short so I got through in a speedy manner. The drive through lines are also short and I never had a long wait time. In the past 6 years or so, we have gone to direct deposit and the bank does a great job for us. We get our statements regularly and there has never been a problem in all these years. We do not have a fee at all because we keep enough in the account so the fee is waived. Easy account to take care of. Good bank.

name: Hunter Lee
review: Harley Davidson offers the best credit card in my humble opinion.  The VISA logo is accepted anywhere and this card is an asset to have.  I highly recommend the card to anyone interested in credit cards.  This card offers points and chances to win motorcycles, and it also has zero annual fees, there is no logical reason not to have one!

name: Hunter Lee
review: Harley Davidson offers the best secured credit card and its not even close to others.  One can build ones credit with zero annual fees.  The VISA logo is accepted anywhere and this card is an asset to have.  I highly recommend the card to anyone interested in secured credit cards.

name: Wade Fuller
review: I haven't had any trouble with my Gold Checking account. I didn't even know I qualified at first. A routine trip to deposit some cash ended up with me getting a second checking account(free easy checking) and an upgrade to Gold. I think I got it because of my US Bank credit card. In branch I'm treated very well and they are always kind. I don't know what more I could ask for. I would appreciate the ATM fee refund more, but I don't even use ATMs anymore.

name: Elizabeth Barnes
review: US Bank is a horrible institution to have checking and saving accounts through. Their customer service will blatantly lie to you to keep your business there. When I opened my account in 2012, I was told there would be no fees on my account. They lied. There were fees for not having a direct deposit into my account. Then there were fees for having a balance below 300 in by checking. Then there were fees because I didn’t transfer between my savings and my checking. After dealing with their customer service, I have decided that they all need to go to school for etiquette. I kept all my original documents and was pretty much accused of forgery. My accounts are no longer with them and I advise everyone to find a new bank.

name: James Follic
review: When I first got my bank account I decided I didn't really want to go with one of the big banks to hold my money. There weren't any credit unions around my area that had a good reputation so I decided to go with US bank. So far my experience with them has been nothing but positive. I have a standing bank account with a checking and savings with them and have had no problems with them so far. There's plenty of locations in my area that are widespread enough where I don't have to drive over 5 minutes in order to access an ATM and pull out some cash directly from a US Bank ATM. They regularly send me e-mails regarding my bank balance and or whether or not I'm eligible for a certain offer, etc. I've never had any problems with this bank when it comes to depositing or withdrawing money and I will continue to use them until I encounter severe problems with them. To people reading this review, I would highly recommend US bank.

name: John Mund
review: First I would like to say that I am a very happy with my U.S. bank checking account.  I have been a consumer with them for 5 years now and I couldn't be happier the services offered by them.  The employees at my local branch are very easy and don't try to pressure you into opening up more accounts, and they are very knowledgeable with products and services.  I have had many other checking accounts with other banks and it can be very annoying and almost frustrating when you walk into a branch and every employee is basically interrogating you to open an account, when all I wanna do is deposit my check , with U.S. Bank it's easy because they don't try to sell you products or services.  Overall  I highly reccomend this bank to anyone who is looking for a checking or savings account , very easy and straight forward accounts !

name: Milly
review: While my experiences with US Bank have been about average, I have had some frustrations with their customer service, particularly navigating service over the phone. One particular time, I called US Bank to find out why my Savings account had been charged a small fee monthly for several months. Their phone options were a pain right off the bat, with it taking some time to be able to access the option to talk to a person. When I did, I was placed on hold for about 10 minutes before a customer service representative was able to talk to me. The representative was pleasant enough, but she informed me that I was being charged because I didn't have enough money in the account to have a free savings. I was upset because I didn't receive this information about maintaining a minimum balance amount when initially opening my account.

name: Robert
review: I just opened a checking account with US Bank because they had an awesome offer if I attached direct deposit for at least $500 per month for 2 months, I get $200 free cash.  You are limited on the amount of your initial deposit during the application process (I think it was $500).  The only thing that keeps it from 5 stars is the fees unless you have a certain minimum balance or a minimum amount of direct deposits per month.  I do not like fees and don't like the fact if I really need my money, I have to worry about paying fees if I go below a certain amount.

name: Charles Tidwell
review: Well About a year a go I started moved my checking to US Bank.  I had miss understood the rule that all checks that are deposited are held for 7 days for the first 30 days of deposits before they give me access to the funds.  I thought it was just for the first check which i was fine with but when my 2nd check didn't show up that day or the next i called and they explained it to me.  It put me in a bind really bad with my bills.  I called them and talked with them again and they called corporate and got them to go ahead and release my funds to me.  I am not sure if they explained it wrong or I miss understood but they fixed it for me and i appreciate that they went to that effort with me having to fight them.  So in all they have been there for me.

name: Charles Tidwell
review: I love my US bank.  My saving account is free no min.  There is no fee to transfer from  my savings account to my checking account which is great.  My old bank use to charge me a $1 to transfer money. I love that there is no min so when I transfer all my money from savings to go on vacations I don't get penalties. Also the transfer is instant from my savings to my checking or checking to savings. I Have access to it online or on my phone thru there app. There phone app is also very secure and i feel comfortable using it on my phone.  I have never had a problem with the account.

name: Kelsey
review: I have been a customer of US bank for quite some time.  I have a checking account with them, and I can say that their customer service is very great!  When I go in there, it is always very fast and they make sure every customer is taken care of.  I also can say that they care a lot about helping their customers and answering their questions.  I have been a US Bank customer over ten years and have always had a great experience.

name: Samantha Taki
review: My husband and I have had this card for almost two years and I absolutely love it. We filter everything that we can pay with a credit through this card and we usually get about $50.00 a month in rewards. It’s a real nice treat to look at your statement and see a credit. I would suggest this credit card to anyone looking for a reward card.

name: Emily Rhoads
review: I was a little skeptical about getting a credit card just for the rewards, but I have been nothing but pleased with my Kroger 1-2-3 Rewards card.  I shop at Kroger all the time, so I figured why not? The card provides me with coupons and rewards that I can use when I go grocery shoppingIt has been easy and pleasant to work with this credit card company. I have it connected directly to my online banking,  so it is easy to make payments and manage my account. It is super convenient to have the Kroger rewards and my credit card connected so I only need one card to check out at the store!Make sure to take full advantage of that 0% interest rate for the first 9 months! I highly recommend this card!

name: Wing Suit
review: I recently applied for the REI Visa Card.  they sent me an email telling me that I would be e-mailed their decision.  never received any email, but today I received my card.  I have a credit score of 790, which is excellent. the card they sent me had an interest rate of 19.99 per cent.  with a limit of $22,000.  really?  19.99 per cent?  the application said that the best rate was 12.9 per cent, for people with excellent credit.  I called, to see of they could lower that rate.  I was told to re-apply. not to mention they didn't send me my REI $100 gift card, which the application said that I would get.  so I closed the "account" the same day i got the card.  their loss.  pathetic.

name: Jeff Fisher
review: I absolutely love the Kroger 1-2-3 Rewards Visa Credit Card! It's very easy to apply for and has a ton of rewards and benefits compared to other credit cards and reward cards. Variable but low interest and a very wide range of benefits. Rewards points for Kroger-brand purchases, points for shopping at Kroger, and even points (though not as much) for shopping anywhere else. Add that onto a low 9-month intro apr and 5 dollars off for every 1000 points on groceries and these deals really add up as you go along.If you're a constant Kroger customer, this card is perfect for you and has served me well. There are also travel and emergency assistance services available to you which can be a lifesaver if you find yourself stuck on the side of the road.Even for a store-based card this card beats out a lot of the other entry-level cards. You should definitely apply.

name: Randi Kurliak
review: So far so good! The rewards on this card are fantastic if you shop regularly at Kroger stores. Plus, the rates are quite comparable to other cards. It's very convenient to just scan your Kroger Plus card with the same card you purchase your items, and bonus points for free groceries? Even better.

name: Laurie Joseph
review: I was with US Bank for at least 4 years, and I made the mistake of putting someone financially irresponsible on my account. Two times in a single month, this person sent me into overdraft, the second time racking up fees over 500 dollars on less than 20 dollars worth of purchases. I called US Bank, and made a trip into the office where I had opened my account, and even though I had been a customer in excellent standing the entire time I had been a with them, they refused to reverse any of the overdraft fees, and I had even deposited cash into the account to bring myself back into a positive standing at this point before I even asked for the reversal. So, their greeediness cost them all of my future business as I immediately closed my account, and of course I no longer share any accounts with my financially irresponsible acquaintance.

name: Nathaniel Pegg
review: I've had this card for about 4 months now and couldn't be happier. I had a rough start as far as my credit goes and have seen some improvements to my credit score since I've been using the card. The interest is very low compared to other cards and I like the option to take out a cash advance! I was also late one month on paying my bill and wasn't overwhelmed by a big service fee. It has helped me in emergencies twice so far and I look forward to using this card more and more.

name: Maranda Brannon
review: I have been a member of us bank for years i like that my monthly fee is waved because I use direct deposit. I also like that there are branches in most states. once when i was on a trip i could use us bank in that town. the service is always great when i enter the bank im greeted with a smile and theres always stickers for my kids. also they offer coffee and tea

name: Cody Sorrell
review: When I was looking for a bank, I didn't know where to go. I had some friends recommend US Bank, and I opened a student checking account. They have been excellent to work with! With the student account, there wasn't a monthly charge, and there wasn't a minimum! At the time I didn't have much income, so this was an awesome deal. Very satisfied with US Bank!

name: lisa nyangau
review: At first when I joined US BANK,I was not a true fan.I had transferred banks and did not really feel as if this bank had what it takes to make me feel comfortable and become a bank of my liking. After a few months of using this bank, I got comfortable and realized that the people are very professional and helpful. The online banking is free and  The bank itself is top notch.

name: Laura Kasko
review: I have had this card for many many years. At first it was a great card. I appreciated the fact that I could get my rewards at the end of the year in cash, which I used for Christmas shopping, from an REI store. I didn't want gift cards or VISA cards, just something straightforward. Later it was fine that I had to request a check in the mail. Then my transactions began to be denied--at Trader Joe's and other stores within a ninety minute drive from my home. I had to call several times to complain (and be embarrassed several times while standing in line at a busy store) before they finally stopped doing that. More lately, when I was very concerned about a dubious company I had charged something from, they didn't seem that concerned. Although in general over many years I've been fine with them, and they have  been my major credit card, and althought he customer service is generally easy to access, polite, and professional, now that they are changing to a kind of cards rewards, I'm not going to renew, but will start using a different rewards card which it is easy to get rewards directly into my account, and which gives me higher percentage rewards at other stores than just REI.

name: Pamela
review: I have been with this bank for many years and I love the free checking and the customer service is always outstanding. They used to have a program where you earned a certain percent of your purchases that were processed as credit and that could be deposited into your account periodically. I was very upset when they discontinued the program but they still had a line of credit that was attached to your account if you had direct deposit but they have since done away with that feature as well so now I feel like they are just another bank with nothing that makes them stand out any more but I have never had any problems or negative experiences with the bank as a whole

name: Nesha Robbins
review: I love US Bank! They are so helpful and fast, and the work with my comany as well! I never have to wait days on transfers, deposits, etc. Every problem I have ever had was solved quickly by their wonderful customer service! I especially love the fraud protection. My wallet was stolen and I received a new card, and also was not responsible for ANY of the charges made! Love them! 5 stars!

name: Robyn Lattimore
review: The card for the jewelry store is awful! The customer service is unwilling to work with people and unhelpful! They obviously don't care about customer service or keeping customers business! I'll be taking my future purchases elsewhere that's for sure!! I'd give it zero stars if I could!

name: Zack D
review: We have been with US bank for a little over 5 years. In that time, we have our monthly checking maintenance fee waived, which is a bonus. Overall I am fairly satisfied with Us bank's service. The employees are nice and efficient, the access is good as there are lots of US banks in Minnesota, and ATM's are also easy to find if we need one. I see myself staying a customer for the foreseeable future. We are planning to apply for a mortgage soon and will most likely head to our local US bank for a quote first before we go anywhere else.

name: Zack D
review: I had a US bank checking account for a little over 5 years now. It's nice because the monthly maintenance fees are typically waived for us so it's essentially free. We have experienced no problems so far. It is nice to know we won't be unknowingly charged random fees, there is always a US bank nearby, and ATM's are plentiful.

name: Rich
review: I have been using US Bank for about four years now and I couldn't be happier with all of the services they offer.  The staff at our local branch are very knowledgeable and do a great job at explaining new services that can help me out.  The customer service group always does a great job at troubleshooting any issues or answering simple questions about my account.  I highly recommend this bank to anyone.

name: Ben Dorothy
review: The monthly fee that was introduced a couple years ago is frustrating but overall I've had a positive experience with this account. There was an instance when my account information was not updated in a timely manner and I over drew by accident but after calling customer support and explaining the situation the overdraft fee was waived. Overall I would recommend this account.

name: Aaron Wade
review: I LOVE this card.  I drive as part of my job and I can't count the number of gas stations I've been to where there's an option when you pay to enter your "Kroger Rewards" - so the card does you good even when you aren't shopping at Kroger.  I like the fact that it's 3 cards in one, including a "regular" Visa card.  The no annual fee makes it where there's really only positive things to say about this card.  If you're shopping at Kroger I don't know why you wouldn't use this card...points on buying groceries (which you're going to do anyway), which turn into FREE groceries!

name: Ben Dorothy
review: I've had this card for a while and I love it. The interest rate is reasonably low, and was 0 for the first year that I had it which was very nice to have while paying off student loans. The rewards are pretty nice.  This was my first credit card and I've held on to it. My limit was low at first but it's been raised a couple of times since I got it. I mostly use the card fro small purchases that I pay off later but occasionally I'll buy something big with it and the reasonable interest rate makes the payments much less stressful if I for some reason don't manage to pay it all off at the end of the month.

name: Billy George
review: I have used this card as my main card for a while now, mostly because it is really easy to pay it off if you are already a US bank customer. The no annual fee is also huge for me since I mostly use it for emergencies anyways. Honestly the rewards are not that great and the cash advance rate seems steep, but I don't use it enough for that to be a main concern. Would reccomend

name: Christina Fernandez
review: I have the student checking account with US Bank, and so far so good. I do not have to pay monthly fees, and there are a LOT of US Banks in my area, so it is really convenient. However, once I leave my town, there are not a lot of US Banks in other places, which makes it really inconvenient when I visit back home or go on vacation. Every time I have called for customer support, they have been really friendly and nice. Every time I have gone in to deposit a check or make a withdrawal, the bankers have been really nice and have always tried to offer me student loans or other specials that they think could help me. I also have another bank account with another bank, and that experience has been a lot better, because there are a lot of branches for the other bank, unlike US Bank.

name: Rachel Dotson
review: I have had more issues with this bank than any bank I have ever been associated with.  The customer service to deal with the issues I have had has been horrible as well. The customer service representatives have been condescending, and some of them have actually been absolutely rude. I was told the company was going to eliminate my monthly fee and it never happened, and when I had some issues with overdraft due to some problems no fault of my own, they were less than helpful. In fact, they were rude and condescending. The problem did not get resolved and I am still trying to get them to remove my monthly service fee. It doesn't make any sense.

name: Luke Bauserman
review: This seems like a good card for people who do most of their grocery shopping at Kroger. The late fee looks normal, the interest rate is similar to other rewards cards I have, like the Citi Forward. The rewards look decent. Personally I prefer a rewards card that doesn't tie me to one retailer.

name: Joe Bee
review: I have had a checking account with US Bank for several years, in fact it was my first bank, but as soon as I was out of school I had to switch banks. They changed my account from a student checking to a silver checking and would not budge on waiving the monthly fee. I don't think it is right to charge a monthly fee for only holding on the my money. I had poor customer service and don't feel it warranted me paying them for this kind of service.

name: Quincy Lee
review: I have had a US Bank Easy Checking account for many years now. Recently I was low on funds and wrote a check with a specific day and told the person that they could not cash it until that day. They agreed and I thought the matter was taken care of but the next day I was online checking my account and saw that they had cashed the check the same day. There was a $36 overdraft fee on my account. I called the bank and explained to them that I had dated the check and they shouldn’t have cashed it. The bank customer service rep apologized and immediately fixed the problem. I am happy with their customer service.

name: Quincy Lee
review: I have had a US Bank checking account for many years and recently decided to open up a Standard Savings Account. Opening up the account was very easy – I logged into my online account, applied and was approved very quickly. It seemed very easy and hassle free because I could transfer funds with a click of a mouse. The following month however I saw that there was a monthly free. I called and talked with customer service and they said that you had to have monthly deposits to avoid the fee. I do not recall seeing this information when I signed up, otherwise I would not have opened the account. I closed the account and would not recommend this account to anyone.

name: Christian Betancourt
review: I have had many different accounts with many different banks for checking.  I have been very unsatisfied with all others. U.S. Bank is hands down one of the best due to their great customer service. Their checking accounts do not try to suck fees out of you like some of the others. I would recommend U.S. Bank to anyone that wants honest and courteous service. Compared to any other bank, this checking account is in a league of its own. A customer for life. I even made my wife switch when we got married.

name: Dwight Ash
review: Kroger has it name on it but has nothing to do with it

name: Sara Weiler
review: Right..it's a huge scam!!!

name: Tony Lau
review: I first opened a U.S. Bank Student Checking Account because it was the only bank located on my campus. Four years later, i'm still happy I did. They are always happy to help me, and the account is very simple. My best experience was definitely setting up the account, as I was able to walk right in on my first day, sit down, and have the branch manager guide me through the sign-up process. Everything went very quickly and easily, including setting up online banking. This experience has never wavered, whether it was setting up direct deposit, ordering checks, or any other banking needs I had that I could not manage on my own.

name: Lauren Lang
review: I've had this account for awhile and overall I have been satisfied with the services provided.  I am about to access all my account  through a single login on the website.  The checking account allows you to earn points that may be used in the future for purchases.  There is a bill pay option which is beneficial as well.  I have the option to use overdraft protection from my savings and I like having that ability as it protects me in the event I make an error.

name: Stephen C
review: I had an account with US Bank for close to 4 years, during that time the majority of my experience was pleasant up until last year. My problem with the fact that they decided to charge a "monthly maintenance fee" on my account. I have had the account with them for 3 years at the time and never had or heard of these fees before. They did not exist when I first signed up. To not incur these charges you either have to have direct deposit or keep a specific amount of money in your account at all times. I get paid once a week by check, I work for a small construction company so they arent set up for direct deposit. With bills coming in and going out all month its also hard to keep a specific amount of money in that account. I later closed my account with them after no resolution to the problem and switch to Discover banking with who I have a credit card through. Best part, NO MONTHLY FEES!

name: Nick Stojsavljevic
review: This checking account has never steered me wrong. The card has overdraft protection and the everything is laid out and straightforward when you sign up for an account. My debit card was sent to very soon after I signed up for the account and arrived in a timely manner. The checking account has no minimum balance so it's good for students like me who don't have a lot of money to put into their checking account. I would recommend this card to anyone who needs a straightforward account with no secrets.

name: David Shelton
review: My experience started with a typo in my address and it took several phone calls and several months to actually get a statement delivered to my home. After nothing but headaches, I called to close my account and I was told that I had a balance of $400+ from two very large Jimmy Johns purchases! Now I can't even close my account until the fraud department finishes their investigation. Bottom line: The $100 certificate and points looked attractive but it wasn't worth the headache.

name: Megan Willesen
review: Although I like all of the perks that come with this account, including free foreign ATM fees and online bill pay, I am regularly annoyed by the fact that every month my account shows a monthly maintenance fee of $9.95 that is immediately credited. But the online access is great, there are plenty of the bank's ATMs in my area, and I've always received consistently good customer service whenever I've had to deal with a teller or banker in person.

name: Tyler
review: My wife and I have been US Bank customers for a number of years. So, we decided we should go to them first when shopping for mortgages. The shopping stopped there. The customer service was great. The terms were agreeable. We were pre-approved for much more than we planned on spending, but it was nice to know there was a buffer. If we ever decide to get another mortgage, or if there are other financial products we need, US Bank will be one of the first options we look into.

name: Mallory Pando
review: I Love this card. However my card was stolen today and while fraudulent charges are being made I am sitting on hold for going on 40 minutes now. I have been transferred two times, been given incorrect numbers to call. How in the world can this be acceptable. I am extremely upset that this process is taking this long. My other card holders canceled the card in a matter of seconds and shipped a new one.

name: Jessica Klemp
review: I love having the US Bank FlexPerks card and think it has really helped our family take control of our debt! We first started using this card when we realized we needed to transfer some high interest debt to a card where we could pay it off quickly and without more interest building up. This card gave us 18-months interest free on our balance transfer as a special promotion when signing up. It was incredibly helpful and allowed us to get rid of our debt completely. Since then, we've been using this card to make small purchases, gain the rewards and we simply pay off the balance every month. Easy to use, great rewards and perfect for our family!

name: Delia Dahm
review: I have had this card for 9 years. Last month, someone living in Oklahoma (we live in Austin) called this bank and succeeded to not only add a new person on the account but to have a new card shipped to them in Oklahoma. Please note that we have never been there, nor do we have any family or connection to Oklahoma. We didn't loose the credit card, nor are we cavalier about our credits (they both are above 800). We also use encryption program for all our online accounts. What happened after was a mess: we were not allowed to make payments on the card, we were blocked even $10 transactions at our regular grocery store. Everythime we called, we were placed on hold for 15- 30 minutes at a time (even for making payments) and the managers in the call center were rude and unappologetic. What was worst, they changed the story about how our date was compromised 2 times: at first, it sounded like it was their fault for sending a card there (and we do agree they did it way to easily); but after that, they started blaming us. Last call with the manager Dina was the worst: "we are going to block you for making payments every time". "Your data was stolen and it is not our fault "(aka it is not the credit card company's fault for sending  a card to a different state, for adding another person we a different last name on the account account AND for allowing the address to be also changed at the same time). It was an REI card and we will never going to use it again.

name: Laura
review: I recently discontinued my savings account with US Bank because I was dissatisfied. It wasn't made clear to me during the account opening process that I had to maintain a minimum of a $300 balance to waive the $4 monthly fee. As a result, I ended up paying several of these fees before I realized, as I had to take money out of my savings account for moving fees. This wouldn't be a big deal if their fee system had been made clear to me while opening the account, but it wasn't. Additionally, the interest rate they offer of .01% annually is pretty lousy compared to the alternatives out there. Since opening a savings account with a credit union instead, I've been making far more in interest. While US Bank has been fine for my Checking Account needs, I don't recommend investing in a Savings Account with them.

name: Roskie Smith
review: CARD IS GREAT IT GIVES EXCELLENT REWARDS , I SHOP AT KROGER AND I BUY GAS AT KROGER . WE RECEIVE REWARD CHECKS FROM THEM AT KROGER FOOD MART.WE ALSO GET COUPONS EVERY WEEK FROM KROGER DUE TO USE OF THE CARD.WE GAT DISCOUNTED GAS EVERY MONTH DUE TO POINTS WE RECEIVE FROM USING THIS CARD . SOMETIMES AS MUCH AS 35 CENTS OFF A GALLON OF GAS.WE LOVE IT.

name: Tom
review: This doesn't seem like a bad card. Standard late fee, middling interest rate which can bounce higher, and a decent rewards system.When it works, it works. I've used rewards points at my Kroger store but I had some security issues on mine. Dealing with customer support was a huge pain and it took a day on the phone to get someone to clear it up.If you're a big Kroger customer, consider it. Otherwise I'd pass.

name: Christine F
review: We have a savings account with US bank because it is convenient for us and there is no monthly required balance. I am very satisfied with the fact that there are no monthly fees and it is free to withdraw or transfer money when we need. My biggest problem with this account though is the fact that no matter how much money we have in the account, the interest incurred is minimal. I think the most we've made is like 2 cents so far. Otherwise another pro to this account is the fact that I can use it to prevent over drawing my checking account. If for example, I over draw my checking by 2 dollars, instead of charging me the full overdraft fee, US bank will instead just automatically transfer money from my savings to checking in order to maintain a positive balance in my checking.

name: Christine F
review: We've been using USbank for 5 years now and are pretty satisfied. I love the fact that they refund the non-USbank ATM fee of 2.5 dollars if you've been a loyal customer for years. We also have our home mortgage through USBANK so we are able to avoid the monthly account fee of 10.95 which is awesome. The only reason I cannot give them 5 stars is simply because when we went to open a college savings fund for my son, they insisted we had to invest 5000 immediately otherwise they could only open a regular savings account with no interest being built in the long run. Over all though, we are happy with US bank, they have good hours of operation, friendly staff, and have always been willing to work with us.

name: Mara Alexander
review: I've been pleasantly surprised with US Bank. After having checking accounts with almost every other bank (BofA, Wells Fargo, Washington Mutual, Union Bank, Chase), US Bank is a keeper.Their policies and fees are very straight forward, and though I miss having free checking (Washington Mutual, which got bought out by Chase), I also know that probably wasn't a sustainable business model.I've never had an overdraft, but once I came close. US Bank sent a text alert of a check I'd forgotten about, and I was able to rush to the bank and make a deposit to cover it. Any other bank would have charged an NSF fee (even if you made a deposit immediately), but US Bank's policy is if you make a deposit to cover it before 5pm that same day, you're good. That peace of mind alone would make me want to stay with them, but the fact that all their tellers and managers are always so friendly and helpful cements the deal. US Banks online banking, online bill pay and website work well, which I also can't say for other banks. They also don't play games with my deposits (yes, I'm looking at you, BofA). Overall, I've found US Bank to be honest and above board in all their dealings with me.

name: Laura
review: US bank offers a decent, basic free checking account for students. I've had my account for about five years and haven't been displeased. While I've been disappointed by other aspects of banking with US Bank, their checking program is satisfactory. The biggest draw for me initially was that the account costs nothing to open up and keep maintained, and since US Banks are all over the place, it's quite convenient. I also don't have to keep any minimum balance in this checking account, which is useful for my current lifestyle. Their online banking for accessing this account is also quite convenient and easy to use. Unfortunately, the overdraft fees ($36 each) and negative balance fees ($25 each) are quite steep, so be careful to avoid these. That's my only major complaint with this account. They're alright!

name: Javier Orellano
review: My wife and I have this checking account with US Bank. It has been a very good experience so far. The few times that I have had to talk to them about an issue have been remarkably painless considering that they are a bank after all! I think that the monthly fee should not apply to a checking account but as long as you have at least $1500 in your account it gets waived. I would recommend this US BANK checking account to anyone.

name: Aaron Bronson
review: U.S. Bank Visa Platinum Credit Card has been my absolute favorite credit card that I have ever had.  The reason for this is not only their incredibly low rates and low fees.  If I am going to be completely honest, the reason I like this card so much boils down to two things.  This first and foremost is the trial 0% APR fee on transfers and initial purchases; that enabled me to get a lot of things I wanted without having to save up first.  Second, their customer service is second bar none.  Anything that may come up will be swiftly handled.

name: Tom
review: U.S Bank is a good option if you're not interested in Credit Unions or other small banks.They have locations nationwide and offer competitive interest rates and good services. They also have a strong online presence which is very nice in today's world.Setting up an account with them wasn't a trouble at all.They're friendly, efficient, and care about the consumer. That's a lot more than you can say for a lot of banks. You can't go wrong.

name: Jen Bresson
review: I signed up for this card because of the "0% Intro APR on purchases and balance transfers for 15 billing cycles." That feature helped to pay off another credit card. Their website also makes it easy to make payments and do balance transfers.

name: Michael Kern
review: No smart chip, don't like the fact I can't just come in and use coupons.  Please offer pay with debit card option, so I am not tied in to your "Card"  I am a US Bank customer, should have the option to use my existing US Bank cards.

name: robb
review: This is a wonderful bank and checking account option for those that are lookin for an efficient and well laid out company. From the first day that I ever did checking with them to today they have presented a customer service quality that is difficult to surpass. The customer service agents treat you like family always ready to help and tackle even the toughest of issues. This company has it all, great rates low fees, quality service and a reputation that is strong and long lasting. Thank you for making the checking experience that much easier and of course better for me and my family. I have tried other banks and checking options but these folks have a versatility when it comes to making a choice, that was something that I had run into with my other bank. US bank the bank for those who love easy banking.

name: Brian Hausman
review: if I could rate this card a negative 5, I would. fight for your cash back rewards is an understatement. I've called at least 4 times now and been told that "they are looking into it" or " it was already sent out". this was about 6 months ago. I do not think it is us bank's fault since I applied for an REI card administered by us bank and received the rewards almost instantaneously. conclude what you will...

name: Natalia Stuart
review: If I can give you a 5 stars review , I would ! Worst customer service ! The representative made a mistake registering lousy $100 card , and to get your money back you have to fax them  your ID . The question is why do I have to punished for this ?

name: Sara
review: I recently obtained a personal loan through US Bank to pay off some credit card debt.  The application process was an absolute breeze, which made me wish I had done this months ago.  I was able to secure an interest rate which was a third lower than my credit card rate.  The US Bank representative really made the process clear and easy, which I appreciated.  I'm always a little worried about missing something huge when it comes to loans and financing, but she answered all my questions and I felt confident.I also signed up for a checking account in order to get 0.5% off the interest rate.  I'll be able to deposit money into the checking account to automatically pay my loan payment each month.  Overall, a very easy process and totally worth the money I'll be saving.

name: Robert James
review: The U.S. Bank Visa Platinum Credit Card is available to those with excellent credit (a FICO score of above 720). This card does not offer rewards, such as cash back for purchases, which is a major drawback for many card users. However, if you have excellent credit, as is required for using this card, having the funds to make purchases and payments isn't an issue. The interest rates are low, with 0% for the first 15 months you use the card. Based on your creditworthiness, you may start with a rate of 10% after that period, which is fairly competitive. Some smaller, lesser-known cards offer slightly lower rates, but can be harder to get. Additionally, there is no annual fee.If you have a US Bank account, you can view current statements, account history, make a payment from your U.S. Bank Checking or Savings account. There is a 24 day grace period, $0 fraud liability, Fraud Protection, and online account alerts. One's credit limit can be raised over time, and shouldn't be lower than what one needs to start with. Customer service for this card is generally good, with help knowing what to do and helping resolve the issue. US Bank also offers additional benefits. One is FlexControl, which is a free online tool that can help you avoid interest fees and late fees with automatic payments. This is designed to help you pay a balance faster. U.S. Bank also has Overdraft Protection, which can automatically transfer funds from a U.S. Bank Visa Platinum account into your checking account. Balance Transfers to a U.S. Bank Visa from higher interest rate credit accounts are also possible. Online banking customers can receive an  Experian credit score for free. while this is nice, it leaves out reports compiled by TransUnion and Equifax, the other two major credit bureaus. Consequently, it is not going to be a complete overview of your creditworthiness, and it is recommended to check your FICO score and Vantage Score as well, as they are the two most widely-used scores. Last, cardholders can pay bills online to a variety of companies that do not normally accept credit cards including insurance companies, electric utilities, and telephone service providers. This bill pay service is free.A drawback of the card is the Balance transfer fee. The U.S. Bank Visa Platinum Card charges a 3 percent balance transfer fee, something that other cards do not. Also, this 3 percent fee is only for the first 30 days. The card also offers car rental insurance is useful, but this benefit is also available with many other credit cards, and has been known to have strict rules that, if not followed, can cause confusion. If you have fair credit and are looking to pay off large credit card balances, can deal with the transfer fee, and appreciate a free credit score, this card is a good choice. If you have excellent credit and little to no credit card debt, a card with a rewards program is a better option.

name: Pamela Colliver
review: .....for the love of God and also that you are a very smart consumer and credit card participant.  DO NOT EVER, p l e a s e........request a 123 Rewards Visa ,   IT IS ISSUED BY US BANK.  THEY ARE THE WORST BANK IN AMERICA TO OFFER CREDIT....... THEY LIE WHEN YOU FIRST APPLY, LEADING YOU TO BELIEVE THAT YOU WOULD PAY A MUCH LESS INTEREST RATE.  NOT....IF YOU TAKE ADVANTAGE OF A YEAR INTEREST FREE.  THEY IMPOSE INTEREST MUCH EARLIER THAN ONE YEAR.THEY ARE NOTHING BUT VULCHERS AND LIARS............IF YOU ALREADY ARE A VICTIM, CONTACT THE FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION FOR THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. COMPLAIN!THANK YOU,Pamela S.

name: Sara Weiler
review: I am right with u guys!!! Terrible!!!

name: Rachel Wimberly
review: This is a great card. I don't really know if there is a rewards program, because I do not use it. But, this was the first card I had and it really helped me to build my credit and helped me become responsible with a credit card. I would recommend this card to a friend.

name: Sean Trease
review: dissapointed,  we applied for this card to purchase supplies to repair our roof with outstanding credit and having been in business for 8 years.  should have went with a different bank.

name: Horace Breece
review: I have been well served by my U.S. Bank Visa Platinum Credit Card mainly because they have kept the interest rates pretty low.  I was late on one of my payments and was pleased with the fact that they did not charge me an arm and a leg for it.

name: Sharon Poole
review: I began a checking account with U.S. Bank when I was in college.  It's been a great account.  I've had many benefits over the years by having it.  One major benefit is that it costs nothing to use it.  Another benefit is that I have overdraft protection.  Thankfully, I don't have to use the overdraft protection much now.  However, when I first opened the checking account I benefited from this protection many times due to my immature spending habits.  I would encourage any college student to apply for this checking account.  It's definitely been an asset for me.

name: dominique
review: Me and my boyfriend had a joint checking account with u.s. bank for about a year and i didnt really like them. The reason is every time i would go to draw money or put money into the bank they had to take a fee out so we could use the money. the other thing i did not like is that when you deposited your check or if you got it direct deposited they put a hold on the money for 24 to 48 hours and i had never seen a bank do this before. I dont understand how a bank has monthly fees if your account is inactive. They told us that we had to make so many transactions a month in order for the fee to be waivered but we were just trying to save money in that account. I can honestly say that i would not use this bank again for checking accounts.

name: Jammer Jay
review: It is not in your best interest to apply for this card.  As you go through the process of getting this card the terms will mysteriously change.  The 50$ cash reward they offer you will have to be fought for.  Ask yourself one thing.!  If they do this before you commit!  What more will they do after you commit to their card and after you owe them money.  I know, you may need some credit.  But, ask your mom, your brother, your friend or someone you just met for money if you need it that bad.  Thank you.

name: Sara Weiler
review: Agreed!!!

name: Sam Kirb
review: Although I really like this bank, there are some downfalls to it. The customer service is good at explaining the rewards of my account as well as some things I need to look out for, like too many withdraws. However, the interest rate is pretty poor in my opinion. It is so low that I hardly see any interest being deposited into my account, which has prompted me to look at other options for saving my money.

name: Kaley Davis
review: My bank approved me with this credit card, and I am very happy with it so far!  For starters, there is no interest for a year.  That was what attracted me to this card.  Also, you can accumulate points based on your spending, and you get to choose rewards for those points.  Some of those rewards include gift cards to places like Best Buy, drink ware, cameras, and even cash back.  For every 5,000 points you get, for example, you are eligible to receive $50.00.  You can put this toward your credit card balance, or receive it as a Visa gift card.  I really do not have any complaints about this card.

name: Erwin Zipfel
review: Saving 25 cents a gallon on gas with the Kroger 1-2-3 Rewards Credit Card is a very good deal, especially for some who drives a lot like like me.

name: Sara Weiler
review: If I actually got the rewards then u must be very lucky

name: Helen Beaufort
review: US Bank has been better to me than some others (Wells Fargo and Bank of America, I'm looking at you). The staff at each branch I've been to have been very pleasant and friendly without overly trying to sell me things. Once, a deposit I made didn't appear in my account for a couple of days but it was resolved fairly quickly. The application process to set up the account did take over an hour but I get the sense that every bank in the USA takes forever (I still can't understand why) so I don't know if it's fair to knock stars off them for that.
